title: Best Manufacturers Flat Roux/Gravy Whip 12-inch
description: This durable 12-inch flat roux whip provides easy access to the good stuff on a pan's bottom and corners, which translates into more-flavorful gravies. Its flat 4-wire design is also great for mixing roux--the butter and flour mixture used in thickening sauces--and stiff batters, or use it to deglaze. The high-tensile stainless-steel wire is rustproof and epoxy sealed for sanitation, and the chrome handle is weighted to give you better mixing control and comfort. Best of all, it's dishwasher-safe.--Doree Armstrong

title: Chicago Metallic Baked Taco Rack
description: Chicago Metallic's baked taco rack is an excellent way to cook low-fat taco shells. Simply place one flour or corn tortilla over each panel and bake for seven to eight minutes. The tortillas will cling to the rack as they bake, making flawlessly shaped taco shells. The nonstick surface requires no greasing, is easy to clean, and releases shells without a fuss. Unlike the deep-fried variety, baked taco shells turn out light and crispy--not heavy and greasy.--Jane DePaolo

title: Chicago Metallic Non-Stick 12- Cup Mini Popover Pan
description: Regular muffin tins can't make a perfect popover--the classic American pastry that requires just the right heat circulation to inflate and pop over without overcrowding. Chicago Metallic has engineered this pan to ensure that every popover gets a big rise. Each 2-1/4-by-2-inch cup is suspended from crossbars and has an extra-wide lip so  popovers can spread out and up. Properly puffed, popovers are a quick breakfast indulgence with butter and jam, or a savory surprise for dinner when stuffed with a mushroom filling. This pan is made from the same professional-quality steel and nonstick coating as Chicago Metallic's full line of bakeware, which is designed for the home cook who has high standards.--Lynne Sampson

title: Best Manufacturers 12-Inch Balloon Whip with Metal Handle
description: Get maximum aeration action with this 12-inch balloon-style whip from Best Manufacturers. Crafted from gleaming 18/8 stainless steel, the impressively sized piece makes quick work of blending sauces or whipping eggs. Its ten wires are securely fastened to the handle and finished with an epoxy sealant for sanitation. The weighted chrome handle adds comfort and control, making the whip feel like the professional-grade instrument it is. Safe in the dishwasher and made in the U.S.A., the whip also comes in a 14-inch size for larger hands and tasks.--Emily Bedard

title: Best Manufacturers Light Design French Whip 8-inch
description: This small but sturdy 8-inch mini-whip will help you whisk up fabulous salad dressings, marinades, glazes, and syrups, no matter how small the bowl. Sporting an 8-wire design, this extra-small whip gives you optimum blending without letting any lumps through. The high-tensile stainless-steel wire is rustproof and epoxy sealed for sanitation, and the chrome handle is weighted to give you better mixing control and comfort. Best of all, it's dishwasher-safe.--Doree Armstrong

title: Chicago Metallic Professional Nonstick 24-Cup Mini-Muffin Pan
description: From quick snacks for kids to dinner party hors d'oeuvres, this mini-muffin pan adds versatility to a baking repertoire without crowding the kitchen. Twenty-four tidbits bake all at once and evenly in bakeware tested and used by professionals. The aluminized steel pan provides superior heat conductivity and durability, and with the bonded nonstick surface, any tiny treat---from healthy bran muffins to indulgent chocolate mini cakes--pops out of the pan without a struggle. After baking, it slips away with all your other baking sheets.--Lynne Sampson

title: Kuhn Rikon Auto Deluxe Safety Lid Lifter, Red
description: The Deluxe Safety LidLifter is the perfect 7-inch kitchen tool for anyone tired of dodging the jagged edges of cans and lids. Unlike conventional openers, the Safety LidLifter cuts into a can below the rim of the lid, so there are no sharp edges, the blade never touches the food, and the final turn of the crank doesn't inconveniently drop the lid into the can's contents. The turning mechanism works smoothly for both right- and left-handers, and the soft turning knob provides a comfortable grip. Best of all, the cute puffin-beak-shaped lifting clamp means you never have to touch a lid.--Emily Bedard

title: Best Manufacturers Standard French Whip 10-inch Red Wood Handle
description: If you want to feel like a professional chef, grab this sturdy 10-inch standard French whip and have your way with eggs, puddings, sauces and gravies. The 10-wire design of this small-size whip provides optimum blending capabilities without letting lumps through, which results in better taste and presentation--no more lumpy gravy. The high-tensile stainless-steel wire is rustproof and epoxy sealed for sanitation, and the red lacquered birch wood handle is weighted to give you better mixing control and comfort. Best of all, it's dishwasher-safe. French whips come in several sizes, so be sure to choose the size that best fits your hand, as well as the mixing bowl or pan.--Doree Armstrong

title: Chicago Metallic Gourmetware Nonstick Make N' Take Pan with Lid.
description: Ideal for travel, this ingenious standard-size pan from Chicago Metallic makes messy food transport a thing of the past: its handy plastic lid keeps liquids from splashing on clothes or car seats and protects cake frosting far better than clingy plastic wrap. Combining the needs of a modern lifestyle with time-honored quality, this versatile pan also offers the strength, durability, and reliability professional bakers have come to expect from Chicago Metallic for more than 100 years.Once available only to commercial kitchens, the pan is made of professional-weight aluminized steel, so it won't buckle or bend under intense heat and consistently provides fast and even heat distribution. Foods brown quickly and evenly--there's no need to turn the sheet midway through baking. Bakers new to aluminized steel should pay extra attention at first, since this heavy-gauge sheet bakes quickly than lighter-gauge varieties. The nonstick SilverStone surface allows cooking without butter or oil, and ensures easy cleanup of even over-browned cheese or caramelized sugar. As with all nonstick surfaces, be sure to use nonabrasive sponges and cleansers only, and choose wood, nylon, plastic, or rubber utensils to prevent damage to the coated surface.--Emily Wolf

title: Chicago Metallic Professional Nonstick 9-Inch Round Cake Pan
description: When you pull lovingly made baked goods from the oven, be sure you find consistent, golden crusts; level surfaces; and thoroughly cooked interiors by using professional, heavyweight metal bakeware, such as this versatile Chicago Metallic Professional round cake pan. Guaranteed to distribute heat evenly, this pan features rolled rims and superior construction to ensure it stays level--no warping or buckling when hot. The bonded, nonstick surface makes for easy release of baked goods and fast, carefree cleanup, and the rich, dark gray surface will get even darker with age. Because it readily retains heat, consider lowering your oven temperature 25 degrees to prevent overbrowning delicate creations. Treat this one right--don't cut on the surface and scrub only with a nylon cleaning pad and soap--and you'll never buy another cake pan again.--Marianne Painter

title: BonJour Polished Stainless Steel Monet French Press, 3-Cup
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso', 'Coffee Makers', 'French Presses']]
description: The vivid hues of the Monet French press will brighten up your morning toast or after-dinner coffee in vivid style. A gleaming dome caps the traditional stainless-steel frame, and the colored handle and knob provide accent. Simply add your favorite coffee (using the handy, color-coordinated measuring scoop included), pour boiling water over, and let sit for a few minutes. Pressing the plunger with its fine mesh screen presses the grounds to the bottom, leaving rich, robust coffee ready to serve. Though pieces are top-shelf dishwasher-safe, hand washing is recommended. If you sometimes brew coffee for a crowd, consider also getting an 8- or 12-cup press.--Cynthia Nims

title: Looney Tunes PC8LT Taz Popcorn Popper
description: Set the Tazmanian Devil loose in the kitchen with this conspicuous two-piece hot air popper. Families will delight in watching fluffy, fresh-popped corn froth out of Taz's immense, voracious maw. Just make sure that the serving bowl placed underneath him is a large one. Because of his wide mouth, Taz can be a spaz when he spits out the corn; unpopped kernels in particular can become little flying missiles expectorated across the kitchen. The head of this frenzied, whirling cartoon dervish lifts off for loading and cleanup, and it sits on a hard plastic base with zippy white and lemon yellow stripes. Because hot air popping requires no fats or oils, each kernel emerges light and grease-free. The popper includes a recipe booklet with exotic popcorn flavoring ideas such as curry, lemon, hot sauce, and cinnamon.--Carol Gnojewski

title: Frieling 8-inch Round Brotform
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Bread & Loaf Pans', 'French Bread & Baguette Pans']]
description: This traditional bread rising basket lets you bring a taste of Europe into your kitchen. Just dust the 8-inch round basket with flour, put your kneaded dough in, and watch it rise. The natural cane coils shape and decorate the loaf the old-fashioned way. When it's done rising, remove it from the basket and pop it in the oven. The final result? A country bread with a great texture and crunchy crust. To remove any remaining flour, simply tap the basket on the counter. The only other maintenance is an occasional hand washing in warm water. This sturdy basket is even attractive enough to double as a serving piece for outdoor meals and entertaining.--Irene Svete

title: Chicago Metallic Non-Stick Large Tortilla Shell Pans, Set of 2
description: Use this two-piece bakeware set to make professional-looking, fluted tortilla and taco shells for taco salads and fancy tortilla dips served inside the shell, without the fat of frying. The SilverStone coating is permanently bonded with the steel for maximum durability and easy cleaning--these pans won't rust or corrode, and are dishwasher-safe.

title: BonJour Caffe Froth Monet Milk Frother, Black
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee & Espresso Machine Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee Machine Accessories']]
description: Turn nonfat milk into a wonderful foamy topping for your favorite coffee drink, adding richness without the fat. (Whole milk may be used, but nonfat really does give the best results.) Just add milk, pump, and serve. Don't be tempted to overfill--and be sure to pump gently to prevent the milk from spurting out. If you prefer hot froth, remove the plunger after pumping and pop the carafe into the microwave. A fat-free topping for fruit or dessert is just seconds away, embellished with sugar and/or vanilla if you like. The long-handled scoop lets you get every last spoonful, and the color-coordinated coaster provides a protective perch. All pieces of the set are top-rack dishwasher-safe, but hand washing is recommended. Before washing, unscrew the screen assembly from the frother rod so that you can wipe off the milky residue thoroughly.--Cynthia Nims

title: Emsa Perfect Beaker with Seal
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Measuring Tools & Scales', 'Cups']]
description: This is a single measuring cup that will replace the others floating around your kitchen--even the teaspoons! Cone-shaped, with a sturdy base and tight-fitting lid, this little beaker is perfect for those recipes with odd amounts, such as "two cups plus one tablespoon." There's a lip around the top edge that acts beautifully as a spout--no dripping when pouring liquids, from water to beaten egg yolks. Measurements include pints, cups, ounces, ml/ccm, tablespoons, and teaspoons, and all are written clearly in black print. The lid fits snugly enough that you can snap it on and shake the beaker for easy mixing of ingredients.--Jill Lightner

title: Frieling Oval Brotform 1-Pound Bread Rising Basket
description: This traditional bread rising basket lets you bring a taste of Europe into your kitchen. Just dust the basket with flour, put your kneaded dough in, and watch it rise. The natural cane coils shape and decorate the loaf the old-fashioned way. When it's done rising, remove it from the basket and pop it in the oven. The final result? A country bread with a great texture and crunchy crust. To remove any remaining flour, simply tap the basket on the counter. The only other maintenance is an occasional hand washing in warm water. This sturdy basket, 10-1/2 by 7 inches, is even attractive enough to double as a serving piece for outdoor meals and entertaining.--Irene Svete

title: Mason Cash Cane Mixing Bowl, 5.35-Quart
description: This handsome 12-inch version of the traditional and original English kitchen mixing bowl is built for thorough mixing as well as serving. Its ample size, sturdy construction, and glossy surface make it ideal for stirring sticky cookie doughs. But it's also great for serving green, fresh fruit, or pasta salads. The inside glaze is classic white, while the outside sports a historic relief design under an elegant sandy glaze. Three evenly spaced notches in a prominent outer lip make it easy to hold onto while mixing. The chip-resistant inner and outer glaze protects the bowl and makes it easy to clean. --Matthew Evans

title: Kuhn Rikon Duromatic Energy Efficient Pressure Cooker - Frying Pan
description: This is not your grandmother's pressure cooker. After two generations of busy cooks employed pressure cookers to prepare family meals, the next generation--with memories of valves dancing and hissing on stovetops--then snubbed pressure cookers. Now pressure cookers have come back, those old valves replaced by modern versions that ensure safety while delivering the speed, ease, and nutritional benefits of pressure cooking.This heavyweight 18/10 stainless-steel beauty is a fine example of contemporary engineering and style. Its mirror finish gleams, and its black handles stay cool. Its spring valve doesn't hiss unless too much steam has built up and the heat needs turning down. Two other valves offer backup safety, and the top automatically locks until all pressure has been released. Pressure-cooking traps steam to heat foods at temperatures higher than boiling. This cooker has an aluminum disk sandwiched by stainless steel in its base to speed the process even more through fast heat conductivity. Little water is required, so nutrients, flavor, and color are not boiled away.At 9-3/4 inches in diameter and 3 inches deep, this 2-1/2-liter (2.65-quart) cooker resembles a deep frying pan. A waffle pattern on the bottom releases food quickly after browning. Cleanup is a bit involved: hand wash the cooker, rubber gasket, and lid with a mild detergent; lightly oil the gasket. Minor cleaning inconvenience, however, should not overshadow the major convenience of pressure cooking. Accompanying the cooker is a 92-page pressure-cooking recipe booklet.--Fred Brack

title: George Foreman GR10AWHT Champ Grill
description: This smaller version of George Foreman's famous "as seen on TV" Lean Mean Fat-Reducing Grilling Machine is perfect for preparing quick, low-fat meals for one or two people. The double-sided grill surface heats in less than five minutes to an even temperature perfect for grilling most foods. The high grill grooves and slight angle allow fat to run off the grill as food cooks, and the nonstick surface requires little or no additional fat for cooking. The plastic, grooved spatula works well to scrape off any bits that may have stuck to the surface.Meats and fish are the obvious choices to take advantage of the Grilling Machine's fat-reduced grilling, but vegetables and tofu dogs work well too. The double-sided grill means food cooks twice as fast, leaves attractive grill marks, and generates surprisingly little smoke.--Julija Gelazis

title: Kuhn Rikon Stainless-Steel Pressure Cooker
description: Beginning in the 1930s, two successive generations of busy cooks used pressure cookers to prepare family meals. The next generation, with memories of valves dancing and hissing on stovetops, snubbed pressure cookers. Now pressure cookers have come back, those old valves replaced by modern versions that ensure safety while delivering the speed, ease, and nutritional benefits of pressure cooking. Pressure cooking also saves 70 percent of the energy normally consumed while cooking.This heavyweight, stainless-steel beauty is a fine example of contemporary engineering and style. Its mirror finish gleams, and its black handles--including a loop handle for two-handed lifting--stay cool. Pressure-cooking traps steam to heat foods at temperatures higher than boiling. An aluminum disk in the base, sandwiched by stainless steel, speeds the process even more through fast heat conductivity. It's safe on electric, gas, ceramic, and induction stovetops. Little water is required, so nutrients, flavor, and color are not boiled away. Vegetables emerge vibrantly colored from the steamer insert. Stews, soups, beans--even meat loaf, pork chops, and desserts such as bread pudding--come out tasty and nutritious. (A booklet containing dozens of recipes is included.) You can brown meats in the pot before the lid is locked on, or use the pot without the lid. The stem of the operating valve shows high and low pressure so you can adjust heat for different foods. After cooking, the pressure can be reduced slowly (just let the cooker sit for a while), normally (press the pressure indicator), or quickly (run tepid water on the lid's rim).Safety measures abound: the lid twists onto the pot; a rubber gasket ensures a tight seal. A vent releases steam if pressure builds too high, as does a valve that also locks the lid when any pressure whatsoever is inside the cooker. Cleanup is a bit involved: hand wash the pot, gasket, and lid with a mild detergent, then lightly oil the gasket. Normally the valve is self-cleaning, but if food passes through it, disassembly is required. Minor cleaning inconvenience, though, should not overshadow the major convenience of pressure cooking.--Fred Brack

title: Chicago Metallic 69610 Professional Nonstick Perforated French Bread Pan
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Bread & Loaf Pans', 'French Bread & Baguette Pans']]
description: Having trouble getting French bread to look and taste like the local baker's? This professional perforated French bread pan is the answer. With two 16-by-4-inch curved holders, it's ideal for making two loaves of French bread. The perforations in the curved holders promote a crisp crust and even browning by allowing the oven's heat to reach the bread directly. Heavy-gauge steel and a Silverstone nonstick surface deliver a quick release and easy cleanup.--Jane DePaolo

title: Best Manufacturers Balloon Whip 12-inch Red Wood Handle
description: If you want to whip up breezy meringues, soufflés, and cremes, this wide 12-inch balloon whip is the tool for you. Its 10-wire design gives you optimum air incorporation when it counts, and a loop secures the wires near the working surface. The high-tensile stainless-steel wire is rustproof and epoxy sealed for sanitation, and the red lacquered birch wood handle is weighted to give you better mixing control and comfort. Best of all, it's dishwasher-safe. Whips come in several sizes, so be sure to choose the size that best fits your hand, as well as the mixing bowl or pan.--Doree Armstrong

title: Kuhn Rikon Stainless-Steel Pressure Cooker
description: Splendid examples of why modern, safe pressure cookers are popular with contemporary cooks, the 5-1/4-quart pressure cooker and 2-1/8-quart pressure frying pan in this set quickly and healthfully cook foods with trapped steam at temperatures higher than boiling. Two lids, which fit both pans, are included--the pressure lid and a glass lid--so one pan can be used to cook under pressure while the other is used conventionally. Made of heavyweight, mirror-finish, 18/10 stainless steel, each pan has two handles and an aluminum disk sandwiched in stainless steel in its bottom to quickly and uniformly conduct heat.Using a pressure cooker saves time and 70 percent of the energy normally consumed while cooking. Pressure-cooking requires little water so nutrients, flavor, and color are not boiled away. Vegetables emerge vibrantly colored. Stews, soups, beans, even meat loaf and pork chops and desserts like bread pudding come out tasty and nutritious. (A detailed instruction booklet containing dozens of recipes is included.) Meats can be browned before the pressure lid is locked on. The pressure lid's valve stem shows high and low pressure so heat can be adjusted for different foods. After cooking, pressure can be reduced slowly (by just letting the cooker sit a while), normally (by pressing the pressure indicator), or quickly (by running tepid water on the lid's rim).Safety measures abound for the pressure lid. A silicone gasket ensures a tight seal. A vent releases steam if pressure builds too high, as does a valve that also locks the lid when any pressure whatsoever is inside the cooker. Cleanup is a bit involved. The pans, gasket, and lid require hand washing, and the gasket needs a light oiling. Normally, the valve is self-cleaning, but if food passes through it disassembly is required.

title: Chicago Metallic Professional Nonstick 15.75 x 13.75 Inch Cookie Sheet
description: Cookies, crescent rolls, and even florentines slide off this pan without sticking, bake at 25 degrees lower than recipes call for, and finish about 10 minutes quicker, thanks to the pan's heavyweight-steel construction and dark color that ensure even heat distribution. The sheet measures 16 by 14 inches, ample surface area for baking lots of goodies at once. Because the  nonstick coating covers the entire pan, not just the cooking area, cleanup requires no more than a quick scrub in soapy water. But it's dishwasher-safe, too.--Fred Brack

title: Farberware FCP280 8-Cup Percolator
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliances', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso Appliances', 'Electric Coffee Percolators']]
description: Few things say "American kitchen" better than the sound of percolating coffee. The Farberware Millenium percolator is an attractive, heavyweight stainless-steel addition to any kitchen, providing fast and trouble-free coffee making--and that classic percolated coffee flavor. Leave it out on the counter, or put it away. The short cord is detachable, so you can bring the pot to the table to serve. While the pot is plugged in, however, it maintains the coffee at a "Keep Warm" temperature.--Schuyler Ingle

title: Corona HS 3911 Forged Hedge Shear with 9-1/2" Wood Handles, 8-1/4" Blade
description: For quick weekend hedge-trimming jobs too delicate or small for an electric hedge trimmer, Corona provides an economical alternative. These hedge shears have 8-1/4-inch forged Coronium steel alloy blades that are heat-treated for strength and can be resharpened; the bottom blade offers a limb notch that holds branches in place while you cut. Although the hardwood handles are a bit heavy, the solid grips will keep your hands secure as you work. Lifetime warranty.

title: Victor M383 Fly Magnet Bait 3-Pk
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Kitchen Accessories', 'Refrigerator Magnets']]
description: The Victor 3-pack Fly Magnet nontoxic bait can be used with all other traps.

title: Mundial 5100 Series 2-Piece Carving Set, Black
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Carving Knives & Forks', 'Carving Sets']]
description: Although not as thin as the best carving blades, the long blade of this set's knife performs any slicing job, and the knife is just the right length for cooks with medium-size hands. Mundial's Forged line of knives ranks below its Le Cordon Bleu line in prestige, but the knife blades are virtually identical. (Both lines feature blades forged from single pieces of steel.) This knife handle is not as deeply rounded as those of some manufacturers and its bolster not as thick, resulting in a lighter handle and more weight-forward balance. The knife and fork will go through the dishwasher, but it's not recommended, because they might suffer nicks. Both have lifetime warranties against defects. This set is also available withhardwood handles.--Fred Brack

title: Mundial 5100 Series 6-Inch Light Cleaver, Black
description: Quickly reduce a cooked chicken or duck to bite-size pieces with this instrument. Or use it to butcher any kind of meat or poultry. This is a lightweight version of a butcher's traditional implement and thus easier for the untrained to use precisely. The handle is not as deeply rounded as some manufacturers' and consequently lighter. This cleaver is also available with ahardwood handle.--Fred Brack

title: Mundial 5100 Series 3-Piece Starter Set, Black
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Cutlery Sets', 'Boxed Knife Sets']]
description: 5000-3 Color: Black Features: -3 piece starter set.-5100 Series.-Fully forged, with a full tang and high-carbon stainless steel blades.-Long-lasting razor-sharp edge.-Perfectly balanced ergonomic three-riveted polyacetal handle.-Quality and performance independently tested and verified as unsurpassed at any price point.-Material for knife blade: High-carbon stainless steel.-Material for knife handle: Polyacetal.-Lifetime guarantee.-Made in Brazil. Dimensions: -Weight: 1.18 lbs.

title: Mundial 5100 Series 7-Piece Knife Set with Block, Black
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Cutlery Sets', 'Knife Block Sets']]
description: The word "maverick" conjures up images of nonconformity and risk-taking; not very confidence-inspiring adjectives when applied to a machine that features a formidable 7-inch stainless-steel slicing blade. However, with the Maverick food slicer, safety is a given: this deluxe household slicer contains a host of safeguards to ensure that only food--not fingers--makes contact with the cutter. Many commercial slicers require the operator to press and guide the food manually through the blade--a risky business when getting down to those final swipes. On the Maverick slicer, cheddar cheese, roast beef, or bread is held in place with a press plate and glides along a feeder track. Hands touch the feeder, but not the food.To operate the machine, dial the desired thickness using the knob on the back of the motor housing and release the safety lock. Then hold down the pulse switch throughout the cutting process. If you let go for any reason, power to the blade shuts off--and so does the cutting action. A necessity for home canning, dehydrating, or preparing luncheon meats, the slicer comes with a 90-day warranty, and the blade, blade cover, and press plate disassemble for thorough cleaning.--Carol Gnojewski

title: Joyce Chen 31-0063, Chrome Steel Wire Wok Ring
description: Joyce Chen's slogan "Eastern Cookware for the Western Kitchen," reflects her focus on providing high-quality, versatile tools and products that have Asian flair, but can be used in a western kitchen.  The Chrome Steel Wire Wok Ring fits any round bottom Wok and is a handy kitchen addition. Joyce Chen opened her first restaurant in Cambridge, Massachusetts in 1958.  The restaurant flourished, and in 1973 a larger Cambridge restaurant was opened. Chen also began writing Chinese cookbooks and in the 1970s began hosting a cooking show on public television. She found that the selection and quality of Chinese cookware in America didn't live up to her high standards¿ so she developed her own. Today, Joyce Chen Products come from all over the Pacific Rim to bring the best of Asia to you.

title: Kaiser Bakeware La Forme 8-by-8-by-2-Inch Square Cake Pan
description: With convenient handles neatly balanced on either end, this top-of-the-line Kaiser La Forme square cake pan from Germany brings an end to smashing the edges of a cake or getting potholders covered with food when pulling a pan out of the oven. Made of premium, heavyweight steel, this 8-by-8-inch pan evenly distributes heat for consistent results; it won't warp or buckle under high heat, and the two-ply nonstick coating makes for easy food release. An added feature: the coating is so smooth you don't need to flour the interior--just a light coating of shortening will ensure that cakes pop out easily in one piece. The resilient finish also allows you to cut on the surface without fear of damage, and cleanup is as easy as the wipe of a sponge.--Marianne Painter

title: Kaiser Bakeware Basic Tinplate 10-by 2-Inch Round Springform Pan
description: This 10-inch springform pan is essential kitchen gear for baking cheesecakes, mousse cakes, tortes, and other delicate cakes requiring a pan with a removable bottom. Made by Kaiser, the largest bakeware manufacturer in Europe and the second largest in the world, this handy pan ensures consistent, high-quality results and superior baking performance.To use, buckle together the bottom and the sides before pouring in the dough and baking; the removable waffle pan bottom forms a tight, leak-proof seal when clasped into place. Once cooled, remove the cake from the pan by releasing the buckles--designed for easy release to ensure that cakes retain their molded shape and the pan remains symmetrical. Have no fear about overusing the buckles, because they'll last through years of use with a lifetime guarantee. The pan's heavyweight tinplated steel provides quick, gentle, and efficient heat distribution, so cakes brown evenly, and the pan won't warp or bend in intense temperatures. Its tinplated surface also protects the pan from rust and scratches; wash and dry the pan gently and thoroughly to ensure long-lasting protection.--Emily Wolf

title: Kaiser Bakeware Noblesse 9-Inch Non-stick Springform Pan
description: Springform pans usually have a very specific role in the baking world: cheesecakes. They do have other uses--Walnut Streusel Coffeecake and Chocolate Truffle Cake come to mind--but cheesecakes are king when it comes to springforms. This 9-incher is the standard size. When the cake is done, just open the buckle and gently lift straight up. The nonstick surface ensures that a graham cracker crust sticks to the cream cheese filling, not to the side of the pan. To transfer the cake to a serving plate, just slide it right off its base. As a bonus, the pan comes with a booklet filled with tasty recipes.--Dana Van Nest

title: Amco 6-Quart Stainless-Steel Colander
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Colanders & Food Strainers', 'Colanders']]
description: Because of their constant contact with water and other liquids, colanders made of stainless steel are exceedingly useful and long-lasting. Beyond the superior metal, this model also has a superior look. With rows of leaf-shaped holes, this colander will add to the beauty of what's happening in the kitchen. Leaf-shaped holes also prevent small, round foods from slipping through the colander. This colander measures 10-3/4 inches in diameter with 1-inch-high base, and is dishwasher-safe.--Rhonda Langdon

title: Oneida Raffia 11 1/2-Inch Stainless Steel Salad Tongs
description: For easy, one-handed salad serving, nothing is as efficient and simple as salad tongs. Self-reliant kids still developing two-handed coordination love them. A strong hinge ensures that these won't be falling apart as plastic models often do. And the handle holes are big enough to fit large fingers. Sufficiently sturdy to use in the kitchen, the tongs are medium-weight, clean easily, won't discolor, and can be hung on hook or peg by their handles.--Fred Brack

title: Kaiser Bakeware Basic Tinplate 9-by-2-Inch Round Springform Pan
description: Turn out a beautifully formed cheesecake and other delicacies with this Kaiser springform pan. The pan's smooth-gliding buckle ensures a leakproof seal with the gridded, waffle-style bottom, and releases easily after baking. When you're ready to serve, the bottom can also be used as a serving plate. A tin coating helps prevent rust and scratching. And Kaiser has put its money where your mouth is--the springform buckle comes with a lifetime warranty.--Linda Dahlstrom

title: Kaiser Bakeware Noblesse Non-stick Mini Springform Pans, Set of 4
description: These four leakproof 4-1/2-inch springform pans are ideal for individual tarts or tiny fruitcakes and are easy to assemble, close, release, and clean. The perfectly flat bottom is easy to release and provides an evenly baked dessert. For optimal cooking, coat the interior surface of the pan with a very thin layer of butter before each use--this will guarantee a perfect release of cakes and breads. Because of this pan's heavy-gauge steel construction and dark-colored coating, goods baked in it will generally finish cooking in about 10% less time than specified in your recipe.--Julie McCowan

title: Berndes SignoCast Classic 7-Quart Stock Pot
description: No kitchen is complete without a stockpot--a staple among chefs for centuries. Times have changed and so have stockpots. This 7-quart model is made from durable cast aluminum and features three layers of nonstick surface on the interior to allow for fat-free cooking and to protect food from sticking. The break-resistant, ovenproof glass lid (with a heat-resistant knob) lets you keep an eye on your soups or stews as they cook. It also comes with thermogrip cotton table servers, which are like mittens for the handles, to make it easy to move it from the stovetop or oven to the table. To clean, hand wash the pot with warm water using a dishwashing liquid and soft cloth or sponge. It's manufactured by Berndes in Germany and comes with a lifetime warranty.--Linda Dahlstrom

title: Amco 5-Cup Sifter
description: Great bakers get that tender, delicate texture in their cakes and coffeecakes by carefully measuring and sifting the flour and dry ingredients. To make sure cakes are melt-in-your-mouth good, try this well-designed sifter from Amco. Its 5-cup capacity handles dry ingredients for even a large, three-layer cake, and the heavy-weight stainless-steel construction and shiny, streamlined design add a modern sensibility to a traditional baking tool.With a spring-action hand trigger, this sifter can be squeezed with one hand or shaken side to side with both hands to evenly distribute ingredients through the fine mesh screens. If you're new to sifting, be sure to sift flour and ingredients before measuring to achieve the best results; sift onto waxed or parchment paper, and then measure the required amounts. The sifter is dishwasher-safe, but to make sure there's no build-up of ingredients inside the sifter, hand wash in hot soapy water and dry thoroughly. Known for manufacturing innovative tools and gadgets for home cooks, Amco scores a hit with this professional-weight, high-quality contemporary take on a classic sifter.--Emily Wolf

title: West Bend 53655 5-Cup Hot Pot, White
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliances', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso Appliances', 'Electric Kettles']]
description: The electric hot pot is easy to use and keeps water hot as long as it is plugged in. Simply fill the container up (with no more than 5 cups of water) and plug it into a 120-volt AC outlet. In about 10 minutes water will be suitably hot for tea and other steaming beverages or snacks. The heat-resistant handle, base, and cover ensure safety from burns, and the turn-to-secure lid prevents boil-over. The one drawback of this otherwise useful hot pot is the noise it makes--the loud heating mechanism switches on and off periodically, which can become tiresome.--Rebecca Wright

title: Joyce Chen 20-1140, Pro-Chef 14-Inch Round Bottom Wok with Wood Handles
description: Part of the Carbon Steel Wok Series by Joyce Chen, the 14" Round Bottom Wok is a heavy weight at 1.8 mm of carbon steel.  It is made for use on gas or electric burners and the pan's heavy weight carbon steel body is designed for rapid, even heating and cooling ¿ a must for any stir-fry.  Its generous size will enable you to make delicious Asian meals for your entire family. Once seasoned, these heavy weight carbon steel pans will render superior cooking performance for life.  This pan is perfect for creating such authentic Asian-style recipes as curried shrimp with lemon rice and Szechwan beef stir-fry.  This pan features Blonde wood grip and helper handles. These wood handles are designed to stay cool on the stovetop, so you can easily remove the pan from the burner without using potholders. Joyce Chen's slogan "Eastern Cookware for the Western Kitchen," reflects her focus on providing high-quality, versatile tools and products that have Asian flair, but can be used in a western kitchen. Today, Joyce Chen Products come from all over the Pacific Rim to bring the best of Asia to you.  Joyce Chen opened her first restaurant in Cambridge, Massachusetts in 1958.  The restaurant flourished, and in 1973 a larger Cambridge restaurant was opened. Chen also began writing Chinese cookbooks and in the 1970s began hosting a cooking show on public television. She found that the selection and quality of Chinese cookware in America didn't live up to her high standards¿ so she developed her own.

title: Mundial 3311-10 10-Inch Sharpening Steel, Black
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Knife Sharpeners']]
description: Knife steels are often touted as sharpening tools: few actually sharpen, but they do perform the vital task of realigning a knife's edge, which gets bent through contact with cutting surfaces or other hard objects. Mundial's steel contains diamond dust, so it's hard enough to partially sharpen blades, though it won't replace a professional sharpening job, which proceeds from coarse to ever-finer grinding at tightly controlled angles. This steel performs only the final grinding, during which an edge is polished. Thus, properly used, it can lengthen the intervals between sharpenings better than a steel without diamond dust. Since a steel should be at least as long as the knife blade being drawn across it, this steel's length is fine for most household knives, and its oval shape exposes more surface to blades.--Fred Brack

title: West Bend 33600 100-Cup Commercial Coffee Urn
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Serveware', 'Beverage Serveware', 'Teapots & Coffee Servers', 'Coffee Urns']]
description: Standing handsomely on its stay-cool base, this big coffeemaker is ideal for a buffet line, office, or any other situation where a lot of people drink a lot of coffee. It percolates up to 100 cups at a cup-a-minute rate and then automatically switches to keep-warm, serving-temperature mode. That's when the light goes on and the spigot shows off its no-drip capacity, perfect for spotless cup-and-saucer use. Lifting the spigot provides a continuous flow for filling coffee servers. The 23-inch coffeemaker is made of polished aluminum. The urns cover locks in place to prevent accidental spills.

title: West Bend 82306 Stir Crazy 6-Quart Electric Popcorn Popper
description: West Bend has improved on the classic corn popper design by adding a motorized stirring rod which ensures that every single kernel pops, every time. In about five minutes, the Stir Crazy Popper produces up to 6 quarts of perfectly popped corn, using one tablespoon of oil per 1/4 cup corn. You can clean it with just a quick swipe of the sponge. For added flavor, place a bit of butter in the butter well to melt over the corn as it pops. The plastic cover doubles as a serving bowl, so when the cycle is done, just flip it over to enjoy popcorn that's guaranteed to be good to the last pop.

title: Chantal Stainless Steel Classic Teakettle, 1.8 Quart
description: This solidly built, classic-looking teakettle says you're serious about your tea. The bright stainless-steel finish makes the kettle an eye-pleasing focal point on the stovetop. Even more of an attention-getter is the two-tone harmonica whistle--an amusing reminder to the household that the water is boiling and ready to pour. The flat aluminum base ensures that water heats quickly, and the lid with its black rubber gasket keeps the heat in. The boldly curved metal handle and other metal parts can get quite warm, so use a potholder when picking the kettle up and flipping up the whistle. The lid opening is large enough to make cleaning easy.--Dale Steinke

title: Chantal Enamel-On-Steel Classic Teakettle, Onyx
description: This solidly built, classic-looking 1-4/5-quart teakettle says you're serious about your tea. The beautiful ceramic finish and shiny stainless-steel handle, lid, and pour spout make the kettle an eye-pleasing focal point on the stovetop. Even more of an attention-getter is the two-tone Hohner harmonica whistle--a reminder to the household that water is boiling and ready to pour. The smooth flat base ensures maximum contact with the burner on any ceramic, glass or induction stovetop. Water heats quickly, and the lid with its black rubber gasket keeps the heat in. A boldly curved stainless-steel handle and other parts can get quite warm, so use a potholder when lifting the kettle and flipping the whistle. The lid opening on this kettle is large enough to make cleaning easy, and the ceramic finish is dishwasher-safe. Moveable parts are replaceable for a lifetime of use.--Dale SteinkeTO REMOVE EXISTING ASSEMBLY1. Turn the assembly with your hand, like a doorknob.   It may twist off easily.2.   If not, the assembly needs to be pushed off.   Turn kettle with spout pointing away.   Using a wooden kitchen spoon, press against the rolled edge of stainless assembly, working it around top to bottom, side to side.   The assembly should pop off.TO REPLACE WHISTLE ASSEMBLY:1. Check inside of assembly spout collar for small black o-ring (E).   2. Place new whistle assembly on spout.   Aligning spout indentations with indentations on the assembly spout collar push into place.3. To secure assembly properly on spout, turn the kettle upside down placing spout opening on the edge of kitchen counter with the flipper hanging over the edge.   Using body weight to push down on the kettle, you should feel assembly snap into place. There should not be a gap between the spout of the kettle and the assembly.Kettle does not whistle:Before water starts to boil, open and close flipper on spout 2 or 3 times to clarify tuning plate is in place.

title: Chantal Enamel on Steel Classic Teakettle, Chili Red
description: Our classic teakettle rocketed to popularity when introduced over 30 years ago. The accolades continue for this timeless Chantal original, sure to remain a design icon and home favorite for the foreseeable future. Crafted of colorful enamel on steel, the immediately recognizable shape and characteristic stainless steel handle say it’s Chantal. Featuring our exclusive two-tone Hohner Harmonica whistle, this kettle doesn’t just whistle – it sings! The smooth, flat base creates maximum contact for rapid boiling, and the extra-large opening allows for easy cleaning and handling. Like all our standard-size kettles, our classic teakettle boasts a functional capacity of 1.8 quarts. Enamel On Steel teakettles are made with magnetic carbon steel which means they will work on all cooktops Including induction. Available in a variety of beautiful colors guaranteed not to fade. Limited warranty.

title: Hamilton Beach 31605 HealthSmart Indoor Grill
description: Enjoy grilled meats and vegetables year-round with the HealthSmart indoor grill--don't just wait for summer to enjoy pork steaks, jerk-rubbed chicken, and savory corn-on-the-cob. Its nonstick cooking surface rests on a sturdy plastic tray, which catches extra drippings and cuts down on fat consumption and hot sputtering grease. The tray also makes it easy to dispose of the drippings. Instead of worrying about unreliable charcoal, this grill lets a cook use the heat dial to control the food's temperature. In addition, since both parts of the grill can be put in the dishwasher, there will be no more arguing about who has to clean the sticky grill.--Dana Van Nest

title: Norpro Cake & Pizza Lifter
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Flatware', 'Serving Utensils', 'Cake, Pie & Pastry Servers']]
description: You can slide this broad, round tool under a cake, tart, or pizza and lift it confidently to its final destination. There's no flex  in the lifter, so what goes on stays put. The polished surface, however, allows you to slide the cake, tart, or pizza off easily when you're ready. The stay-cool handle (with hang-hole) is canted at just the right angle to take the strain off your wrist.--Fred Brack

title: Progressive White and Red Cherry Pitter, 8 Inch
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Fruit & Vegetable Tools', 'Corers & Pitters', 'Pitters']]
description: Remove the pits from a whole tree of cherries with this cleverly designed cherry pitter. The dual-action mechanism both holds and pierces the cherry, pushing the pit all the way through. With a slight adjustment in method, you can switch to pitting kalamata olives for a puttanesca sauce or a relish plate. Pitted cherries freeze well, so this device allows you to stock up and make pies and turnovers all year round. Dishwasher-safe.--Emily Bedard

title: Progressive International GT-7436 Jumbo Tower Grater, 11-Inch
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Graters']]
description: With this pyramid-shaped tool, you can efficiently grate a mound of mozzarella in no time flat. The comfortable grip ball on top helps you steady the grater against even the hardest Parmesan cheese and keeps your supporting hand away from sharp edges. The Deluxe Tower's three-sided construction features coarse and medium options for topping off lasagnas and salads, and two finer-grating choices for zesting citrus or shaving chocolate. The stainless-steel surface makes for fairly easy cleanup, and thanks to the grater's durable construction, you can always send it through the dishwasher.--Emily Bedard

title: Chantal Enamel On Steel Classic Teakettle, Indigo Blue
description: Our classic teakettle rocketed to popularity when introduced over 30 years ago. The accolades continue for this timeless Chantal original, sure to remain a design icon and home favorite for the foreseeable future. Crafted of colorful enamel on steel, the immediately recognizable shape and characteristic stainless steel handle say it’s Chantal. Featuring our exclusive two-tone Hohner Harmonica whistle, this kettle doesn’t just whistle – it sings! The smooth, flat base creates maximum contact for rapid boiling, and the extra-large opening allows for easy cleaning and handling. Like all our standard-size kettles, our classic teakettle boasts a functional capacity of 1.8 quarts. Enamel On Steel teakettles are made with magnetic carbon steel which means they will work on all cooktops Including induction. Available in a variety of beautiful colors guaranteed not to fade. Limited warranty.

title: Progressive International 9 Inch Tower Grater
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Graters']]
description: With the range of options and sturdy structure of the Pro Grip Ultra Tower, you can grate a mound of mozzarella in no time flat. A comfortable grip ball on top keeps the grater steady and your supporting hand away from sharp edges. In addition, this midsize grater's pyramid-style construction features medium and fine grating options (for topping off a pizza and the Caesar salad that goes with it) and a third option that is ideal for zesting citrus or shaving chocolate. The Tower's stainless-steel surface makes for fairly easy cleanup, and thanks to the grater's durable construction, you can always send it through the dishwasher.--Emily Bedard

title: Norpro KRONA Stainless Steel 8.5 Inch Deep Colander
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Colanders & Food Strainers', 'Colanders']]
description: KRONA 4 Quart Colander, use it to wash or drain everything from large fruit and vegetables, to potatoes, pasta and meat.  The medium size holes allow water to flow freely.  Made of stainless steel, extra deep with a wide base and heavy gauge tubular handles.

title: Progressive International Multi Slicer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Mandolines & Slicers']]
description: As a low-cost alternative to a metal professional-grade mandoline, this versatile tool will appeal to novice cooks bent on creating uniform fruit and vegetable slices for salads, pies, tarts, and garnishes. Snap four different plates in and out of the tool to quickly produce thin (but not paper-thin), medium, and thick slices; grate coarsely or finely; julienne; and make shoestring-size french fries. A round guard grips foods while protecting your fingers as you push foods over cutting or grating edges. A handle on one end and nonskid "feet" on the other provide countertop stability. Hand wash.--Fred Brack

title: Zak Designs E-Z-Rol Garlic Peeler, Blue
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Seasoning & Spice Tools', 'Garlic Tools', 'Garlic Peelers']]
description: Tired of garlic peel strips under your fingernails? Try this easy-to-use garlic peeler. Just place an unpeeled clove of garlic inside, roll the peeler back and forth on a countertop, and let the peel shuck itself off. The time-consuming task of stripping every shred of peel from each clove is a chore of the past. Cleanup is easy, too--rinse under the tap or run through the dishwasher.--Emily Bedard

title: Norpro Expanding Over the Sink Colander with Base Frame
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Colanders & Food Strainers', 'Colanders']]
description: Have you ever spilled food or burned your hands while juggling both a hot pot and a hot metal colander? With the Norpro over-the-sink colander, your hands are free to handle one task at a time--your sink stabilizes the stainless-steel mesh basket. Simply place the rubber feet on the sink edges, sliding the handles outward for a custom fit. The basket can be adjusted to hang directly under your faucet for rinsing and washing. Slip a pan or bowl underneath the free-hanging basket to catch drippings, to strain gravies and sauces, or to sift dry ingredients.

title: Norpro Stainless Steel 5 Piece Measuring Cup Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Measuring Tools & Scales', 'Cups']]
description: The Norpro measuring cups in this attractive five-piece set don't look like other measuring cups, and their unique oblong shape helps make scooping easier. The cup sizes included are 1 cup (240 ml.), 1/2 cup (120 ml), 1/3 cup (80 ml), 1/4 cup (60 ml), and 1/8 cup (30 ml). Each cup has a pouring lip on either side and millimeter measurements printed alongside the cup measurements on the handle. The 1-cup measure has incremental measurements printed inside the cup. The set comes with a connector ring that is much easier to undo than most. Made of 18/10 stainless steel, these cups will look shiny and pretty, even after they come out of the dishwasher.--Doree Armstrong

title: KRONA 12" S/S POTATO MASHER
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Fruit & Vegetable Tools', 'Potato Mashers & Ricers', 'Potato Mashers']]
description: An old-fashioned tool for an old-fashioned purpose, the Norpro potato masher does exactly what you'd expect--mashes soft fruits and cooked foods to a lumpless pulp with minimal effort. Release all of your culinary aggressions with this well-built smash gadget. The long, filled handle gives you leverage for prime mashing action. Coiled wire mashers are typically easier to work with than the ricer styles because food glides smoothly through the zigzag head; there are no small holes for mashed food to get trapped in. Just tap the masher along the side of the bowl to remove that persistent guacamole or potato goo.

title: Metrokane Mighty OJ Manual Juicer, Chrome
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Fruit & Vegetable Tools', 'Manual Juicers']]
description: Start your morning off right with a glass of fresh-squeezed orange juice. It's got more vitamin C than processed juice, and it just tastes better. The Mighty OJ citrus juicer in retro 1950s chrome puts 800 pounds of pressure to use making sweeter juice than electric juicers. Put your glass under the juicer, place half an orange on the raised cone, hold the juicer foot for leverage, and press the handle down. Just remember that it takes quite a few oranges to get a substantial amount of juice, so buy a bag. You can also use it to squeeze lemons, limes, and grapefruit. To clean the cone and funnel parts, lift them out of the juicer and rinse under the faucet. Lifetime warranty on moving parts.--Doree Armstrong

title: Norpro KRONA Stainless Steel 8 Inch Mesh Strainer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Colanders & Food Strainers', 'Food Strainers']]
description: KRONA's Stainless Steel Strainer has a double mesh bottom catching all your lumps and chunks of food.  Also use it to rinse pasta or cooked vegetables.  Features a comfortable large handle with a convenient finger groove.  The resting ring is designed to hook over a bowl

title: Norpro Stainless Steel Deluxe Food Mill
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Fruit & Vegetable Tools', 'Potato Mashers & Ricers', 'Potato Mashers']]
description: Purées and fine sauces often complete an otherwise ordinary dish. Fortunately, food mills make quick work of what used to be a painstaking process. Considering its size, this model is sure to be on the wish list of any avid purée-er. Unlike smaller models, it can create raspberry purée for five Chocolate Decadence cakes--rather than one. And its two discs allow you to choose how fine your output will be. This item would also be perfect for new moms who wish to prepare, cook, and store their own baby food.--Sally Bergesen

title: Krona 5-Inch Stainless Steel Double Mesh Strainer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Colanders & Food Strainers', 'Food Strainers']]
description: Absolutely no lumps, food chunks, or anything but the finest particles will filter through the double mesh bottom of the Norpro stainless-steel mesh strainer. The smooth, polished steel ring rests evenly atop bowls and pots so that you can multitask while your food drains and strains. The 5-inch sieve is handy for straining tea or sauces. It's also ideal for flouring baking pans and dusting confectioner's sugar over your favorite pastries and baked goodies. Made of Krona stainless steel, which won't chip or dent.

title: Norpro Stainless Steel 6 1/2-Inch Mesh Strainer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Colanders & Food Strainers', 'Food Strainers']]
description: Absolutely no lumps, food chunks, or anything but the finest particles will filter through the double mesh bottom of the Norpro stainless-steel mesh strainer. The smooth, polished steel ring rests evenly atop bowls and pots so that you can multitask while your food drains and strains. The 6-1/2-inch sieve is handy for straining almost anything from gravies to sauces. It's also ideal for rinsing cooked vegetables and pastas. Made of Krona stainless steel, which won't chip or dent.

title: Prepworks from Progressive International GAPC-240 Apple Peeler and Corer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Peelers']]
description: This odd-looking contraption peels, cores, and slices a basket of apples for a tarte, a crisp, or fritters in less time and with less effort than can be done by hand. The old-fashioned apple peeler has a suction cup bottom to keep it steady on a work surface and a clamp to secure it to the edge of a counter or cutting board. To use, skewer an apple on the end of the apple peeler’s three-pronged fork with the tines positioned around the core of the apple. Next, swing the arm that holds the peeling blade toward the apple so it’s just grazing the skin. Start turning the apple corer’s hand crank and the machine simultaneously removes the apple’s skin and core while cutting it into narrow slices that are perfect for pie and desserts or dehydrating. A release button helps you to easily remove your finished apple from the fork. This apple peeler/corer is made of sturdy aluminum and weighs four pounds. Progressive provides an extra blade with the tool and covers it under a five-year warranty.--Cristina Vaamonde

title: Zak Designs E-Z-Rol Garlic Peeler, Blue
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Seasoning & Spice Tools', 'Garlic Tools', 'Garlic Peelers']]
description: Tired of garlic peel strips under your fingernails? Try this easy-to-use garlic peeler. Just place an unpeeled clove of garlic inside, roll the peeler back and forth on a countertop, and let the peel shuck itself off. The time-consuming task of stripping every shred of peel from each clove is a chore of the past. Cleanup is easy, too--rinse under the tap or run through the dishwasher.--Emily Bedard

title: Zak Designs E-Z-Rol Garlic Peeler, Blue
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Seasoning & Spice Tools', 'Garlic Tools', 'Garlic Peelers']]
description: Tired of garlic peel strips under your fingernails? Try this easy-to-use garlic peeler. Just place an unpeeled clove of garlic inside, roll the peeler back and forth on a countertop, and let the peel shuck itself off. The time-consuming task of stripping every shred of peel from each clove is a chore of the past. Cleanup is easy, too--rinse under the tap or run through the dishwasher.--Emily Bedard

title: Norpro Grip-EZ Granny Fork
description: This is one of those tools that can be a little tricky to describe. Not really a fork, but not a spoon either, it acts like both. Norpro's curved granny fork can be used for stirring, blending, and mixing--and for transferring food to your plate or bowl. Made of 18/10 stainless steel with a soft, comfortable Santoprene handle that is nonslip and ergonomic, the granny fork stirs and scoops pasta, veggies, or anything that benefits from liquid draining through its six sharp tines.--Doree Armstrong

title: Norpro Grip-EZ Stainless Vertical Cooker Steamer
description: This quality steamer is great for asparagus, corn, broccoli and cauliflower. All stainless steel, put the vegetables in the wire basket and into the steamer.

title: Prepworks from Progressive International GPC-2549 Vegetable/French Fry Cutter
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Mandolines & Slicers']]
description: This lightweight cutter divides a potato into its french-fry essence in a jiffy. One blade creates up to 49 3/8-inch fries with a single lever-push. The other creates up to 25 half-inch fries. You'll get those numbers, however, only if you precisely shape a large potato to fit the bed. The bed's size is the cutter's only drawback. Even if you cut a large potato to fit the head, the fry length is at most 3-1/2 inches. That length, however, is ideal for carrot, cucumber, and zucchini batons to assemble a vegetable tray around a bagna cauda, an Italian dipping sauce of olive oil, butter, garlic, and anchovies. And such batons get you halfway to a pretty dice for a vegetable soup. Hand wash.--Fred Brack

title: Prepworks from Progressive International GCBW-2 Butter Warmer Set
description: Ceramic is the material of choice for over-the-candle warming because it holds in the heat without letting the flame burn your butter or damage the delicate texture of your sauce. These petite, white his-and-her pots hold about 3/4 cup of your favorite dip. Dainty wire stands suspend the pots at an appropriate distance from the tea light. Serves dinner or dessert fondue with panache. --Carol Gnojewski

title: Lello 4080 Musso Lussino 1.5-Quart Ice Cream Maker, Stainless
description: Fully automatic and precisely controlled by a timer, this  machine takes the trouble and guesswork out of making ice cream,  sorbet, frozen yogurt, gelato, and frozen drinks at home. Ingredients  go into the bowl, the timer is set, two buttons are pressed and about  30 minutes later 1-1/2 quarts of a frozen confection are ready for  consumption. Because the machine doesn't require its bowl to be frozen  for hours in a refrigerator's freezer (like less expensive machines  that only churn), it can immediately begin making another batch. If a  batch becomes too hard the machine shuts off automatically. Not only  does it work professionally it looks the part, as the housing, bowl,  and paddle are made of stainless steel for sanitation and easy  cleaning. The 100-watt machine measures 12 inches wide, 11 inches high,  and 18 inches deep, and it weighs 38 pounds. Made it Italy, it carries  a one-year warranty against defects. An instruction booklet with many  recipes is included.--Fred Brack

title: Norpro KRONA Stainless Steel 5 Quart Deep Colander
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Colanders & Food Strainers', 'Colanders']]
description: Use it to wash or drain everything from large fruit and vegetables, to potatoes, pasta and meat.  The medium size holes allow water to flow freely.  The colander is extra deep with a wide base and is made of premium quality stainless steel.

title: Progressive International GT-3153 Seafood Cracker
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Specialty Tools & Gadgets', 'Seafood Tools']]
description: If you've ever envied a lobster for his pointed claws (though not his boiled destiny), now you can have your own bright red set of pincers. These heavy-duty cast-aluminum crackers can't help but make a shellfish dinner festive: picture your friends wearing lobster bibs and wielding these playful--yet highly functional--lobster and crab crackers. The crackers are heavy enough to overcome the toughest crustacean armor, and the tips will help you extract the meat. Use them to open walnuts while you're waiting for the water to boil.--Patricia Draher

title: Progressive International Microwaveable 12-Cup (Cooked) Rice/Pasta Cooker Set
description: This versatile multi-cooker from Progressive is great for preparing rice, pasta, and vegetables. The specially designed lid keeps steam circulating, while clamps on the base keep it tightly in place. Rice comes out fluffy and doesn't stick to the bottom of the cooker. The set includes a basket for draining pasta, a pasta measurer, a rack for steaming vegetables, a rice paddle, measuring cups, and measuring spoons. All of the parts fit inside the 12-cup base for compact storage. Cleanup is easy--pop the parts in the top rack of your dishwasher.--Dale Steinke

title: Norpro KRONA Stainless Steel 8 Cup Multi Pot
description: Ideal for vegetables, pastas and one pot meals.  Mix and pour omelets and batters, measure liquids, heat soup, milk and sauces.  Use to serve ice water or milk.  Has standard and metric measurements.  Has a tri-ply encapsulated base that give you uniform heating, avoids hot spots that can scald and ensures quick, efficient heat conductivity.

title: Amco 848 Serving Fork, 14-Inch
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Carving Knives & Forks', 'Meat & Carving Forks']]
description: This heavy-gauge, restaurant-quality stainless-steel fork is excellent for lifting pot roasts and roasted chickens from cooking pot to serving platter or for lifting and turning steaks and chops. It might also be used for informal serving. The handle is long and flat, and the tines are long and have a slight curve, making the tool easy to use and manipulate. Also, the pierced handle lets you hang the fork on a utensil rack for easy access.--Jennifer Harris

title: Amco Measure Equivalents Magnet
description: This cooking measurements conversion table cum magnet is a great addition to your refrigerator-door magnet collection. The brushed stainless-steel magnet lists equivalents for cups, ounces, tablespoons, teaspoons, and milliliters in easy-to-read bold black letters. Just a glance tells you that 2/3 cup is 32 teaspoons or 5 ounces. Remember that the conversion for ounces is for fluid ounces, not scale-weight ounces.--Brooke Van Peski

title: Amco 13-Inch Splatter Screen
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Specialty Tools & Gadgets', 'Splatter Screens']]
description: If you've ever ended an inspired cooking session with a big mess across the counters and stove to clean up, you should consider getting a splatter screen. For braising, sautéing, or reducing sauces, Amco's splatter screen really comes in handy, as it keeps the steam rising while keeping bubbles in and splatters under control. This contains the mess and lets you work at the stovetop over an open pan without burning yourself. A sufficient 12 inches in diameter, the screen fits over most pans, and its stainless-steel construction means it won't rust.--Shannon Borg

title: Amco Spoon Rest
description: Cleverly shaped like a giant version of one of those baby spoons withthe handle bent into a loop, this generously sized spoon rest will sitsolidly on the stovetop and hold your cooking utensil securely at theappropriate angle so drips are contained. Part of Amco's professionalperformance line, this kitchen accouterment is made of 18/8 stainlesssteel, which won't oxidize or leave a metallic taste on utensils. Likeother tools in the line, this spoon rest is solid, utilitarian, andattractive and will stand up to a lifetime of use.--Victoria Jenkins

title: Zwilling J.A. Henckels Twin Four Star 4-Inch High-Carbon Stainless-Steel Paring Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers']]
description: The 4-inch fine-edged blade on this knife features slightly curved surfaces on both the back and the cutting edge, terminating in a sharp point. The pronounced tip makes this a great choice for peeling and cutting fruits and vegetables and preparing meats. The blade is strong and firm; this is one of the most versatile knives around and a must for the kitchen of any would-be chef.Part of the popular Four Star series, this hand-honed blade is made with Henckels' Sintermetal Component Technology (SCT), which allows three different grades of steel to be combined to form a single piece, fusing together the blade, bolster, and tang. What does this mean in layman's terms? It means a strong, high-quality knife that will last a lifetime.Founded in 1731, the J.A. Henckels company is not only one of the world's oldest cutlery manufacturers, it's also one of the most well respected, creating best-selling knives guaranteed to last a lifetime.--Kim HarwellFrom the ManufacturerFirst introduced in 1976, the Four Star® Series is one of the world's most popular knife lines.  Four Star® knives were designed and developed in close cooperation with renowned professional chefs.  The result was a fully forged knife with a unique molded handle. The Four Star® line contains knives for all tasks, and includes  the following open stock knife types: parer, bread, peeling, sandwich, utility, carving, chef’s, granton edge slicer,  santoku, and others. Four Star® knives are also available in a range of block sets and gift sets.A Higher Standard in Knife ConstructionFour Star® knives are precision forged from a single piece of exclusive-formula, high-carbon, no-stain steel under  the all-new Sigmaforge standard. As a result, Four Star® knives have improved quality consistency, lasting sharpness,  and perfect geometry. Sigmaforge one-piece construction also provides high precision and improved stability of the blade  and steel structure, thus improving cutting-edge retention for lasting sharpness. In addition, Four Star® knives use  J.A. Henckels’ Friodur ice hardening for corrosion resistance, a process that also contributes to cutting-edge retention.It's All in The Grip:The Four Star® series features high impact polypropylene handles that are permanently bonded to the knife blades without any gaps.  These comfortable handles are break-proof, sanitary, and colorfast. In addition, the super bolster provides weight, insures safety,  and adds balance.Features:SIGMAFORGE 1-piece, precision forged construction: Provides perfect geometry, high precision, and improved stability of the blade and steel structure, thus improving cutting edge retention for lasting sharpness.Laser controlled edge: Is sharper and stays sharper longer. Has a more consistent blade angle.Friodur ice hardening: Maximum no-stain properties and more blade strength. Improved resistance to corrosion and pitting.Super bolster: Provides weight, insures safety, and adds balance.Full rat-tail tang: Provides a proper balance and greater strength.High-carbon no-stain steel, an exclusive J.A. Henckels formula: Non-staining, non-rusting.Hand, precision honed blade: Is sharper and stays sharper longer.Bonded polypropylene handles: Comfortable molded handles and food safeDishwasher safe: Easy care (Although hand-washing is recommended by J.A. Henckels).Full warranty: J.A. Henckels stands behind all its knives.

title: Amco Nylon Slotted Serving Spoon
description: This long-handled spoon is nylon coated, so it won't damage delicate nonstick cookware, and the slotted head allows cooking liquid or grease to drain easily. The nylon coating also means that food won't stick to this spoon, making it easy to lift and transfer meatballs, poached eggs, or steamed dumplings--though it's probably not suited to deep-fat frying operations, because oil temperatures approach the 400-degrees-F limit of the material. The pierced handle lets you hang the spoon on a utensil rack for easy access.--Jennifer Harris

title: Zwilling J.A. Henckels Four Star 5-1/2-Inch High Carbon Stainless Steel Boning Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Boning & Fillet Knives']]
description: The 5-1/2-inch hand-honed blade on this knife features a sharp curve near the bolster and a straight cutting edge. The blade is slim, narrow, and flexible for ease in removing bones, particularly from chicken and other poultry. Most of the Henckels lines--including the popular Four Star series--feature blades made of Friodur, a special, ice-hardened, no-stain steel created and patented by the company in 1939. This special formula was designed for exceptional hardness and high resistance to corrosion.Founded in 1731, the J.A. Henckels company is not only one of the world's oldest cutlery manufacturers, it's also one of the most well respected, creating best-selling knives guaranteed to last a lifetime.--Kim HarwellFrom the ManufacturerFirst introduced in 1976, the Four Star® Series is one of the world's most popular knife lines.  Four Star® knives were designed and developed in close cooperation with renowned professional chefs.  The result was a fully forged knife with a unique molded handle. The Four Star® line contains knives for all tasks, and includes  the following open stock knife types: parer, bread, peeling, sandwich, utility, carving, chef’s, granton edge slicer,  santoku, and others. In addition, Four Star® knives use  J.A. Henckels).Full warranty: J.A. Henckels stands behind all its knives.

title: Amco Nylon Serving Fork
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Carving Knives & Forks', 'Meat & Carving Forks']]
description: Made of sturdy and rustproof 18/8 stainless steel, Amco's 13-inch fork will be valuable in many situations. The nylon fork is heat-resistant to 400 degrees F (204 degrees C), and there's a hole in the handle so you can hang it on your utensil tool bar. If you've got a coated pan, stab this fork in there without worry of scratching the nonstick surface because the tines are nylon. Even so, they're still sharp enough to hold meat steady while slicing. All that, and it's dishwasher-safe.--Doree Armstrong

title: Zwilling J.A. Henckels Twin Four Star 2-3/4-Inch High Carbon Stainless-Steel Peeling Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Paring Knives']]
description: The 2-3/4-inch fine-edged blade on this knife (sometimes called a bird-beak parer) features both a curved back and a gently curved cutting edge that terminate in a sharp point. The pronounced tip makes this a great choice for cleaning vegetables, peeling fruits, and larding meats. This slim and lightweight blade is strong yet flexible, making this a versatile kitchen choice any way you slice it.Part of the popular Four Star line, this hand-honed blade is made with Henckels' Sintermetal Component Technology (SCT), which allows three different grades of steel to be combined to form a single piece, fusing together the blade, bolster, and tang. title: Amco 14-Inch Spatula
description: This is the heavy-duty spatula you see when you sneak a peek into a restaurant kitchen. It's well balanced, functional, and good-looking. Three rows of slots allow grease to drain away, and the one-piece construction means there's nowhere in the handle for food particles and bacteria to hide. This 18/8 stainless-steel utensil will keep its appearance and stand up to heavy use for years to come.--Irene Svete

title: Zwilling J.A. Henckels Twin Pro S 2-3/4-Inch High Carbon Stainless-Steel Peeling Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Specialty Knives']]
description: With its wicked little curve and pointed tip, the 2-3/4-inch blade of this specialty knife peels fruits and vegetables with delicate precision, removes blemishes, and shapes them as desired. Unlike longer top-grade Henckels knives, which are formed by a high-tech welding process, this knife is forged from a single piece of high-carbon stainless steel. Its handle has a full tang, and its synthetic grips are attached by three rivets. Although the knife is dishwasher-safe, it should be hand washed to protect its edge. It carries a lifetime warranty against defects.--Fred BrackFrom the ManufacturerThe J.A. categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Utility Knives']]
description: The 5-inch blade on this knife features slightly curved surfaces on both the back and the cutting edge, terminating in a wide point. The serrated edge is perfect for cutting and slicing soft products that have a firm skin, as this type of blade penetrates more easily than one with a smooth edge. This medium-size knife makes a handy and versatile kitchen tool for cooks of any ilk. title: Amco Nylon Slotted Spatula
description: This traditional-shaped rectangular spatula has a straight leading edge, enabling you to press the tool flat against the bottom of your pan, so you won't miss those small, flavor-packed bits. The spatula blade has three wide slots for draining unwanted grease or liquid and an angled handle for easy maneuvering. The nylon-coated blade won't scratch your nonstick cookware, nor will food stick to the spatula. It's dishwasher-safe, and the pierced handle lets you hang the tool for easy access.--Jennifer Harris

title: Zwilling J.A. Henckels Twin Pro Professional "S" Slicing Knife 160mm/6"
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Carving Knives & Forks', 'Carving Knives']]
description: Reach for this knife when a job--sandwich-making, for example--doesn't require a specialized blade. Its 6-inch blade is also large enough to trim a chuck roast or subdue a head of lettuce. Classic three-rivet handles distinguish Pro S from Henckels's other quality lines, TwinStar, Five Star, and Four Star. Pro S handles are heavier and its knives less weight-forward. Handles are also smaller, a feature those with small hands may appreciate. The steel used in the Pro S line is identical to that of the Five and Four Star lines. High-tech welding of knives this size and larger combines three steel types into what appears to be a single piece, so a knife's parts have distinct characteristics: a hard edge; a strong, stain-resistant bolster; and a stain- and corrosion-resistant tang. Traditionalists insist on single-piece forging for strength, but Henckels says the invisible welds are actually stronger than the steel. While this utility knife is dishwasher-safe, hand washing is recommended.--Fred BrackFrom the ManufacturerThe J.A.
