Medium heat is typically sufficient for frying and sauteing. Since each stove top has its own settings, find the best heat setting for your stove by starting at a lower setting, then gradually increase until water splashed on the pan surface evaporates immediately with a sizzle. High heat can be used for other applications, like boiling water, stir frying, oven roasting etc. Scanpan Classic Cookware is oven safe to 500 degrees F.3. Scanpan Classic can be used without oil, butter, or other seasonings, making it especially suitable for low fat diets.4. After use, remove food and clean Scanpan Classic with warm, soapy water. Scanpan Classic wipes clean with a sponge. Scanpan Classic is dishwasher safe, however, Scanpan recommends using extra care if you decide to clean the pans in the dishwasher to prevent damage to plates, glassware, etc.5. When storing Scanpan Classic Cookware and "nesting" (placing smaller pots inside larger pots) is required due to space limitations, Scanpan recommends placing a paper or cloth towel between the pots and pans to prevent scuff marks. Glass covers should ideally be stored upright. If that is not practical, Scanpan recommends using towels or other suitable material to wrap the covers and to prevent them from chipping or breaking.

title: Polder 77-90 Diet Utility Scale, White
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Measuring Tools & Scales', 'Scales']]
description: For health-conscious cooks concerned about accurate portion control, Polder's little scale is just the ticket. Small enough to tuck in a drawer, its plain design and light color blend in on the countertop as well. The bowl is detachable and dishwasher-safe--just wipe down the scale as necessary--and the red dial is easy to read, measuring in both ounces and grams. Not just for dieters, it also works well as a first kitchen scale for bakers who want to see if weighing ingredients makes a noticeable difference over standard measuring cups.--Jill Lightner

title: Scanpan Classic 12-1/2-Inch Fry Pan
description: Tackle all your fish-frying, hamburger-browning, and pancake-flipping needs with this generous Scanpan Classic 12-1/2-inch fry pan. Made in Denmark of pressure-cast aluminum, the heavy-gauge pan features low sides, perfect for sliding out eggs, and a ceramic-titanium nonstick finish that is safe for use with metal utensils. The high-density phenolic resin handle is securely attached without rivets to facilitate stirring and cleaning, and is guaranteed not to come loose. Should you wish to bake a German apple pancake, the fry pan is oven-safe to 500 degrees F. While dishwasher-safe, washing by hand is recommended to best preserve the nonstick finish.In response to environmental concerns regarding nonstick finishes, Scanpan in 2007 introduced its Green Tek nonstick technology. Working with its suppliers, Scanpan is the first cookware company to completely eliminate the use of the harmful chemical PFOA from the entire process used to make its nonstick compound. The new PFOA-free nonstick finish is now found on all Scanpan Classic and Professional cookware. Scanpan covers its cast-aluminum cookware with a full lifetime warranty.--Ann BieriFrom the ManufacturerAbout Green Tek Nonstick Technology:In the more recent past, the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has taken the leading manufacturer of nonstick compounds to task over excessive emissions of PFOA (Perfluorooctanoic Acid). PFOA has been used as a catalyst in the production of PTFE (Polytetrafluoroethylene), the basic building block for all nonstick cookware surfaces.PFOA is a chemical that is hard to break down in the environment. It has a half life of 3.8 years, meaning that if there are 4 grams of PFOA in the body today, the body will have 2 grams in it in four years from now, 1 gram in eight years from now and so on. The human metabolism does not remove PFOA. While it is not a carcinogen or toxin and is generally assumed inert and not harmful to your health, it is environmentally unfriendly and just sticks around forever. That is why the EPA and the leading nonstick manufacturer have agreed that by 2010, the amount of PFOA used to produce PTFE compounds need to be cut by 95%, and by 2015 no PFOA could be used, at all.Towards the end of this process, PFOA is completely extracted via ionization filters. Even if any traces of PFOA were still present by the time the nonstick compound reached the cookware factory, the pan surface curing temperatures would destroy such remnants. The same is true for the old nonstick compound used for Scanpan Classic and Scanpan Professional. That's why Scanpan has always been able to present the finished product as not containing PFOA.Scanpan cookware has always been PFOA free, but the negative publicity that PFOA and, by extension, PTFE had received over the last few years, had caused Scanpan to work closely with their suppliers to find a substitute for PFOA that is biodegradable. Scanpan received patents on PFOA-free technology in 2007 and has been producing Scanpan Classic and Scanpan Professional with this new process since spring 2007. With their new Green Tek technology, there is no PFOA used at any stage of the entire process, resulting in a "clean and green" nonstick PTFE compound, the production of which no longer uses chemicals that could have a negative impact on the environment.The performance of the Scanpan Green Tek surface is not different in any way from the performance of Scanpan's previous surface. And Scanpan continues to incorporate their patented ceramic-titanium technology. Scanpan is safe to use with metal utensils and each piece comes with a lifetime warranty.Taking Care of Scanpan Classic Cookware:1. Before first use, remove all packing materials, labels and tags and wash pan in hot, soapy water. Rinse well and dry. Assemble the glass cover handle, if applicable, following the instructions on the poly bag that holds all handle parts. Tighten by hand, only, do not use tools. Make sure the small washer that goes on the underside of the glass cover is flush with the glass surface. If not, turn the washer around and re-assemble the handle.2. Heat pan to working temperature. Medium heat is typically sufficient for frying and sauteing. Since each stove top has its own settings, find the best heat setting for your stove by starting at a lower setting, then gradually increase until water splashed on the pan surface evaporates immediately with a sizzle. High heat can be used for other applications, like boiling water, stir frying, oven roasting etc. Scanpan Classic Cookware is oven safe to 500 degrees F.3. Scanpan Classic can be used without oil, butter, or other seasonings, making it especially suitable for low fat diets.4. After use, remove food and clean Scanpan Classic with warm, soapy water. Scanpan Classic wipes clean with a sponge. Scanpan Classic is dishwasher safe, however, Scanpan recommends using extra care if you decide to clean the pans in the dishwasher to prevent damage to plates, glassware, etc.5. When storing Scanpan Classic Cookware and "nesting" (placing smaller pots inside larger pots) is required due to space limitations, Scanpan recommends placing a paper or cloth towel between the pots and pans to prevent scuff marks. Glass covers should ideally be stored upright. If that is not practical, Scanpan recommends using towels or other suitable material to wrap the covers and to prevent them from chipping or breaking.

title: BIA Cordon Bleu 1-1/2-Quart Oval Casserole, White
description: A sturdy and practical casserole dish, this 1-1/2-quart size is perfect for those holiday side dishes, such as creamed onions or candied yams. With deep sides and a domed lid, it also works well for small portions of layered casseroles--it's just right for two-person, one-dish meals. You can even make dinner ahead of time in this dish--it goes from fridge to oven to microwave to dishwasher with no complaints. There's also a sturdy lip around the top edge to keep the lid in place and ensure a snug fit for proper cooking.--Jill Lightner

title: Polder 11-Pound Stainless-Steel Kitchen Scale
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Measuring Tools & Scales', 'Scales', 'Mechanical Scales']]
description: When a recipe calls for measurements in weight--say, 2 pounds of apples for Grandma's killer apple pie--use this small professional kitchen scale instead of guessing. This scale will measure up to 11 pounds or 5 kilograms, whether it's a sack of rice or a bunch of tomatoes. The body and removable bowl are made of noncorrosive stainless steel, and the bowl is held firmly in place by upturned braces. The face is over 6 inches in diameter, so the numbers are huge and easy to read, even when you've got a little flour in your eye. Measurements are printed in pounds (black) and grams (red). To clean, wipe down the body with a damp cloth, and hand wash the bowl. One-year warranty.--Doree Armstrong

title: Scanpan Classic 6.5 Quart Covered Dutch Oven
description: For chefs who prefer nonstick cookware, Scanpan makes an excellent and long-lasting choice. The coating is sturdy enough for use with metal utensils and generally wipes clean with little scrubbing necessary. A steel wool pad is included for cleaning up those stickier dishes, such as caramelized onions--but don't try it on other nonstick coatings! Of medium weight, this 6 1/2-quart dutch oven is excellent for large stews or soups: just brown meats on the stovetop and then pop directly in the oven to finish the job. The makers are confident enough to offer a lifetime warranty on the coating, which is pretty surprising for a nonstick. A thick, flat bottom and heat-resistant handles ensure you'll have no hot spots or burned fingers, making cooking with this Dutch oven a pleasure.--Jill Lightner

title: Scanpan Classic 9-1/2-Quart Covered Casserole
description: Rated "Best Nonstick Cookware" five times by leading consumer magazines, this Dutch oven is large enough for a week's worth of spaghetti sauce. Its thick, pressure-cast aluminum base allows superior heat retention and protects against the enemies of all pots: warping and uneven heat distribution. Although aluminum interacts badly with certain foods, this pan's patented ceramic-titanium surface protects food so you reap the benefits of aluminum without discolored vegetables or metallic-tasting sauces. Unlike most nonstick cookware, this Dutch oven is safe to use with metal utensils, and even comes with a steel scouring pad, something other nonstick pan owners would ban from the house. Smoothly designed without screws or rivets, it's easily hand washed and comes with a lifetime nonstick guarantee.--Laura CuthbertFrom the ManufacturerAbout Green Tek Nonstick Technology:In the more recent past, the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has taken the leading manufacturer of nonstick compounds to task over excessive emissions of PFOA (Perfluorooctanoic Acid). title: BIA Cordon Bleu 24-Ounce White Porcelain Chowder Bowls, Set of 4
description: This bowl is perfect for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or dessert--its generous size, simple classic design, and sturdy construction make it great for everyday family use and dresses up nicely for fancier dining. The capacity of each bowl is a hefty 2-3/4 cups--plenty for dinner-size portions of beef stew or pad thai. You can even reheat leftovers right in the dish, as this little trouper goes from oven to fridge to microwave to dishwasher without complaint. Thick sides are a plus for retaining temperature. Prechill the bowl for a few minutes for an ice cream sundaepar excellence.--Jill Lightner

title: Scanpan Classic 5-Quart Covered Low Sauce Pot
description: Scanpan's covered stewpot has an extra-thick base, allowing you to save energy by using low-to-medium heat for almost all your cooking. Other features include a heat-tempered glass lid, a heat-resistant handle, and a ceramic titanium interior surface that is safe for use with metal utensils and won't crack, peel, or blister. The stewpot is oven-safe to 500 degrees. This pot comes with a lifetime nonstick guarantee, but it is suggested that you follow a few easy steps to ensure long-term use: immerse the warm pan in water immediately after cooking and hand wash with warm, soapy water; when you're ready to use it again, spread a few drops of oil on it with a paper towel.--Julie McCowanFrom the ManufacturerAbout Green Tek Nonstick Technology:In the more recent past, the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has taken the leading manufacturer of nonstick compounds to task over excessive emissions of PFOA (Perfluorooctanoic Acid). title: BIA Cordon Bleu Crème Brûlée Dish - Round
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Pie, Tart & Quiche Pans', 'Quiche Pans']]
description: In classic white, with traditional soufflé-dish ribbed exterior, these shallow, 5-inch-diameter dishes serve as cooking and serving vessels for quiche and the silken custard known as crème brûlée. Because porcelain is safe in the oven, refrigerator, or even the freezer, the custard can be baked in the dishes and chilled, and then their sugar crusts can be melted under a broiler or with a kitchen blowtorch. Despite the name, these are not just dual-use dishes. Elegant little lemon tarts can be prepared in them, also. At table, they are perfect for jam, butter, sauces like aioli, and other condiments. Stoveside, they hold salt or pepper, herbs or spices. Porcelain's kitchen popularity derives from its durability, beauty, versatility, and cleanability.--Fred Brack

title: BIA Cordon Bleu Porcelain Egg Plate, White
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Serveware', 'Serving Dishes, Trays & Platters', 'Deviled Egg Plates']]
description: If you haven't served Eggs Mornay recently, perhaps you need the right stage on which to set your actors. This platter is, of course, egg shaped--and it has 12 egg-shaped hollows in which to place the whole or cut hard-boiled eggs. Otherwise the plate is completely plain except for a very slight rim around the edge. It can be used in the microwave or oven, and cleaned up in the dishwasher.--Richard Farr

title: Zojirushi 2.45-Liter Brew-Thru Air Pot, Polished Stainless Steel
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee & Espresso Machine Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee Machine Accessories', 'Thermal Carafes']]
description: Whether it's a business meeting, a book club get-together, or a bridal shower, this is the ideal way to assure your guests a steaming hot cup of coffee (or cold iced tea). The air pump design means just a few presses on the lid will fill individual cups, down to the last few drops in the bottom. People can easily serve themselves from any side, thanks to the swivel base that makes it a breeze to turn the air pot from side to side. A lock on the lid allows you to safely transport the air pot without spills or leaks.--Cynthia Nims

title: WMF Profi-Plus 12 1/2-Inch Stainless Steel Ball Whisk
description: In this new design for classic whisks, the individual beaded wires make short work of both mixing and washing. Eleven long wires surround one shorter one, and with the independent movement and extra weight provided by the end bead, air is incorporated much more thoroughly into whisked food. For example, a pint of chilled cream whipped about 30% faster, while egg whites were stiff peaks in about a minute. Washing is simpler, too. There are no little crevices for thickened liquid to get caught in, and it's dishwasher-safe. If there is any drawback at all, it's that you may overbeat food the first use or two--after that, you're sure to remember to adjust the time.--Jill Lightner

title: Zojirushi Supreme 3-Liter Airpot, Brushed Stainless Steel
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee & Espresso Machine Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee Machine Accessories', 'Thermal Carafes']]
description: This quality thermal pot is one you'll reach for repeatedly during those cold winter nights or hot summer afternoons. For icy cold beverages, pre-rinse with cold water, fill with your favorite beverage, and then drop in a few ice cubes. (Don't do the ice first, as the liner can crack with sudden temperature changes.) For hot coffee or chocolate, just rinse with warm water and then fill up. This large-capacity pot does a terrific job of keeping that morning coffee hot and fresh until lunchtime, but it is fragile enough that kids may need a hands-off policy. The pump-top dispenser prevents you from having to lift a heavy pitcher--just press the lid until you cup is full. Great for small offices and convenient for social occasions--or anywhere you want to have piping hot or frosty cool drinks available with minimal fuss.--Jill Lightner

title: Zojirushi NHS-18 10-Cup (Uncooked) Rice Cooker/Steamer & Warmer
description: Busy cooks cherish rice cookers. This is Zojirrushi's largest, suitable for cooking up to 10 cups of dry rice (white or brown) and keeping it warm up to five hours. A separate tray steams seafood and vegetables, cooks hard- or soft-boiled eggs, and even makes tender custards. Instructions and a cooking chart explain everything. A measuring cup and serving spatula are included. A glass lid permits monitoring of the cooking process. The cooker/steamer operates with admirable simplicity: just push a switch to start. The switch and a light turn off when cooking is completed, and the unit automatically goes into its keep-warm mode. Stay-cool handles on the cooker/steamer's sides permit it to be moved. Only plastic scrubbers and mild detergent should be used for cleaning.--Fred Brack

title: Zojirushi Premium Thermal 1-Liter Carafe, Brushed Stainless Steel
description: This vacuum-insulated carafe maintains and serves any hot or cold beverage at the proper temperature. Press your thumb against a button on the handle, and the spout opens to allow pouring. The carafe's satin-finish, stainless-steel exterior and black plastic accents create a modern, functional appearance. Rinsing the carafe's glass interior with warm water is usually the only cleaning necessary, but swirling a teaspoon of mild detergent diluted in warm water around with a soft sponge or cloth removes stains. The exterior merely needs wiping with a damp cloth.--Fred Brack

title: Zojirushi NHS-10 6-Cup (Uncooked) Rice Cooker/Steamer & Warmer, White
description: From carrots to cauliflower, cabbage to eggs, and rice to  potatoes, this 6-cup cooker/steamer and warmer from Zojirushi steams  foods to perfection and keeps them warm. The set includes a removable  steaming tray, nonstick cooking pan, measuring cup, and spatula--the  removable parts make this steamer easy to clean, and a removable cord  makes it easy to store. Watch the foods while they cook through the  clear glass lid or watch the cooking switch that pops up when the food  is ready. There's also an automatic keep-warm system activated  immediately after rice is cooked, and durable stay-cool handles make  for safe handling. This attractive rice cooker measures 9-1/4 by 9-1/4  by 9-1/4 inches.--David Drury

title: BIA Cordon Bleu 60-Ounce Utensil Crock, White
description: This porcelain utensil holder has that classic French white look: simple yet elegant. Use it to hold the most-used utensils right next to the stove. About 6-1/2 inches tall, it easily holds 15 to 20 utensils, maybe a few more with a tight squeeze, and it's heavy enough that it won't tip over when it's accidentally hit while you're reaching for the spatula. As a bonus, it's microwave-, oven-, and dishwasher-safe.--Doree Armstrong

title: Zojirushi Premium Thermal 1.85 liter Carafe, Brushed Stainless Steel
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee & Espresso Machine Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee Machine Accessories', 'Thermal Carafes']]
description: Well-respected Zojirushi brand makes durable, reliable products. This thermal carafe is no exception, with a classic, simple design that keeps coffee and other hot beverages hot for hours. A button you press with your thumb while gripping the handle opens the carafe for serving, doing away with the need to partly unscrew the lid for pouring. An indicator on the lid tells you if the carafe is open and ready to serve, or closed. When open, the outer rim supports coffee filter holders for brewing coffee directly into the carafe.--Cynthia Nims

title: Zojirushi Air Pot Brushed Stainless Steel Beverage Dispenser, 74 Ounce
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Serveware', 'Beverage Serveware', 'Iced Beverage Dispensers']]
description: Whether it's a business meeting, a book club get-together, or a bridal shower, this is the ideal way to assure your guests a steaming hot cup of coffee (or cold iced tea). The air pump design means just a few presses on the lid will fill individual cups, down to the last few drops in the bottom. People can easily serve themselves from any side, thanks to the swivel base that makes it a breeze to turn the air pot from side to side. A lock on the lid allows you to safely transport the air pot without spills or leaks.--Cynthia Nims

title: Zojirushi NHS-06 3-Cup (Uncooked) Rice Cooker
description: Busy cooks cherish rice cookers. This one cooks up to 3 cups of dry rice (white or brown) and keeps it warm up to five hours. A glass lid permits monitoring of the cooking process. Instructions and a cooking chart explain everything. A measuring cup and serving spatula are included. The cooker operates with admirable simplicity: just push a switch to start. The switch and a light turn off when cooking is completed, and the unit automatically goes into its keep-warm mode. Stay-cool handles on the cooker's sides permit it to be moved. Only plastic scrubbers and mild detergent should be used for cleaning.--Fred Brack

title: Thomas The Tank Engine 5-Piece Dinnerware Set
description: Pecoware Thomas Friends 5 Piece Suction Dinnerware SetThe Thomas Friends 5 Piece Suction Dinnerware Set includes: a placemat, divided plate, bowl, cup and lid.

title: Pecoware Thomas Side Kick Lunch Box Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Storage & Organization', 'Lunch Boxes & Bags', 'Lunch Boxes']]
description: Toot-toot! All aboard for lunch with the very functional Thomas the Tank  lunch box, which is made of durable plastic and comes in the traditional Thomas  blue with a red handle. Inside the generous container are an 11.5-ounce canteen  and a Pecoware double-deck sandwich container, which measures 5 by 5 by 3  inches. Both are adorned with Thomas scenes. On the front of the lunch box is a  nifty front panel--decorated with another happy Thomas scene--that clips open.  This compartment is big enough to accommodate another sandwich or is the perfect  hiding place to tuck away a secret goodie for your child. Press a button on the  side of the canteen, and the cover pops up, revealing a straw. No muss, no fuss.  The lunch box measures 9 by 7 by 4.5 inches and can hold a lot of food--for  children or adults!--Diane Tuman

title: Microplane 35001 Home Series Coarse Grater, Black
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Graters']]
description: For fluffy, evenly sized cheese shreds, this is the perfect grater. The cutters are especially sharp, which guarantees easy grating. But this also means you'll need to exercise extra caution--no one likes grated knuckles. For ease in resting the grater on the counter while in use, there's a hard acrylic frame around the metal. The frame also prevents scratches to your countertop. The large handle allows for a firm grip, and the slightly curved grating surface makes it easy to use with oddly shaped chunks of chocolate. Carrots, onions, and medium to firm cheeses all worked beautifully with this grater. It's also an excellent choice for larger strips of citrus zest or ginger.--Jill Lightner

title: Progressive International Can Colander
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Colanders & Food Strainers', 'Colanders']]
description: The worst part of making tuna sandwiches is not the sweet vs. dill pickle debate, but rather trying to drain the liquid from the can. With this handy little tuna press, you'll stop smooshing the sharp-edged lid down on the tuna and tilting the can to drain. Remove the lid, place the tuna press over the can, and push down. The liquid will rise to the surface and you can dispose of it easily. A part of the Can Colander series from Progressive, the press also comes in handy for draining syrup from cans of fruit.--Dana Van Nest

title: Wilton 12-Inch Featherweight Decorating Bag
description: Use this pastry bag for paté, cake decorating, or with cookie dough. The grease-repellent coating means your hands won't slip in the middle of delicate piping, giving you better control. And it withstands boiling or dishwasher treatment--your icing won't come out tasting like the pastries you prepared last week.--Otts Bolisay

title: Microplane 40001 Stainless Steel Zester
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Fruit & Vegetable Tools', 'Zesters & Reamers']]
description: For uniform lemon rind shreds, this is the perfect grater. Its design is based on that of a rasp, the small and efficient woodworking tool. The cutters are especially sharp, which guarantees easy grating. But this also means you'll need to exercise extra caution--no one likes grated knuckles. The totally flat grating surface makes it easy to move the fruit across the blades, while the rounded edges allow you to set this across the top of a bowl and grate directly into it. Ginger and all citrus fruits worked beautifully with this zester, and the tiny size of individual pieces means you won't need to do any additional chopping.--Jill Lightner

title: Wilton Mini Star Cake Pan
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Cake Pans', 'Specialty & Novelty Cake Pans']]
description: Round cupcakes and square brownies are tasty old standards, but you can do better. With this mini star pan from Wilton, your presentation will be more interesting, and somehow, your cake will taste better too. One package of two-layer cake mix makes enough batter for 20 to 24 stars, and each mold is 1-1/4 inches deep. The star pan is a big hit at do-it-yourself decorating parties--kids especially love it. The packaging comes with instructions and ideas for cakes and gelatin, including how to incorporate fruit and candy for unforgettable desserts.--Dana Van Nest

title: J.K. Adams Large Reversible Maple Cutting Board
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Cutting Boards']]
description: This two-sided carving/serving board is a piece of art as well as a multifunctional kitchen tool. Its beautiful, solid Vermont maple is pressure-bonded with a high-strength, water-resistant adhesive to protect the wood from moisture, and it also has a natural oil finish. One side of the board has a wedge to grip the poultry or meat while you carve and a deep gravy groove to catch the precious juices. The other side has a wider groove and is for general carving and serving. To extend the life of the board, rub the wood with mineral oil now and again.--Marcela Broussard

title: Olde Thompson 17-Inch Hotel Walnut Peppermill
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Pepper Mills']]
description: The same mill you'll find in fine restaurants all over the world. The walnut finish Hotel Mill from Olde Thompson features a carbon steel grinding mechanism and is fully adjustable from a coarse to a fine grind. Does not come filled with pepper

title: Wilton 12-Cavity Petite Heart Pan
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Cake Pans', 'Specialty & Novelty Cake Pans']]
description: Bring a batch of blueberry heart-shaped mini muffins to your next brunch and you'll find the basket empty before your coat's off. Two bites and they're gone--so be sure to bake five or six dozen. For the best results, fill each mold with a rounded teaspoon of batter. The petite heart pan is also great for individual quiches, which are an elegant and easy party appetizer. On the packaging are baking suggestions, including a mouth-watering recipe for individual chocolate cherry tarts.--Dana Van Nest

title: Microplane 40020 Classic Zester/Grater
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Graters']]
description: For fluffy, evenly sized cheese shreds, this is the perfect grater. Its design is based on that of a rasp, the small and efficient woodworking tool. The cutters are especially sharp, which guarantees easy grating. But this also means you'll need to exercise extra caution--no one likes grated knuckles. The large handle allows for a firm grip, and the completely flat grating surface makes it easy to move the cheese across the blades. Carrots, onions, and medium to firm cheeses all worked beautifully with this grater. It's also an excellent choice for larger strips of citrus zest or ginger.--Jill Lightner

title: Wilton Comfort-Grip Cookie Cutter - Daisy
description: This giant-size cookie cutter can be used for much more than standard cookie baking, although its generous width is certainly perfect for occasions when you want to wow your guests with The Big Cookie. The stainless-steel sides are sturdy enough to make great stencils for the kids, as well as molds for Jello or even homemade soap or candles. The squishy rubber gripper is helpful for folks with arthritis or carpal tunnel, and it's easier for small hands to grip (though the giant size may be tricky for very young kids). A daisy shape is just right for spring or summer fun, and there's even a recipe included.--Jill Lightner

title: Wilton Aluminum Performance Pans 4 Piece Oval Pan Set
description: Give your next wedding, anniversary, or shower a special, personal touch by baking a professional-looking cake with these high-quality pans. Made by Wilton, a leader in cake and candy pans and cake decorating supplies, the pans provide consistent, reliable results so no surprises spoil the big day. The oval shape of the pans adds an elegant and unique touch to any celebration.Since the pans come in four different sizes, a baking and serving chart on the packaging helps determine the appropriate baking time and quantity of batter required for each pan, as well as the amount of batter and icing needed overall. Baking hints, decorating ideas, and other instructions are included on the packaging as well. The 2-inch-deep pans, deeper than standard cake pans, ensure cake sides are straight and smooth for attractive icing. The medium-weight aluminum pans guarantee a thin, evenly browned crust perfect for icing. Since the pans are nonstick, flouring and/or parchment paper is necessary.--Emily Wolf

title: Wilton 2109-859 50-Piece Tool and Caddy Decorating Set
description: With this cake-decorating kit, there's no need to take a class to express your hidden artistic side -- extensive instructions and great ideas are included in the manual. With 50 essential tools, the kit makes it easy to cover a cake with roses, hearts, and cartoon characters in no time. If you're reluctant to test your skills on a freshly baked cake, there's a practice board for experimentation. There's also food coloring, spatulas, and everything else required for a memorable cake. The entire kit comes in an authentic toolbox, so you're ready to meet the next cake-decorating challenge like an ECT, emergency cake technician.--Laura Cuthbert

title: Microplane 40016 Classic Black Spice Grater
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Graters']]
description: This long, slender tool makes fast work of grinding up those rock-hard chunks of fresh nutmeg. The sturdy plastic handle makes it easy to grip, while the razor-sharp stainless-steel blades do the hard work. As always with a sharp grater, be careful to keep your fingers clear--safety can be especially challenging when you're working with those slippery little spices. The Microplane spice grater also works well on nuts, dried hot peppers, ginger, and anything particularly tough or fibrous.--Jill Lightner

title: Wilton Aluminum Performance Pans 4 Piece Petal Pan Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Cake Pans', 'Specialty & Novelty Cake Pans']]
description: Try something a little bit different for your next wedding, shower, or other special celebration with these elegant petal-shaped cake pans. Made by Wilton, a leader in cake and candy pans and cake decorating supplies, the pans provide consistent, reliable results so there are no unexpected surprises. The petal-shaped pans add a fresh and personal touch; decorate with edible or marzipan flowers for added effect.Since the pans come in four different sizes and are in a nonstandard petal shape, a baking and serving chart on the packaging helps determine the appropriate baking time and amount of batter required for each pan, as well as the quantity of batter and icing needed overall. Decorating ideas are included on the packaging as well. The 2-inch deep pans, deeper than standard cake pans, ensure cake sides are straight and smooth for easy icing. The medium-weight aluminum guarantees a thin, evenly browned crust, but does require buttering, flouring, or using parchment paper so cake doesn't stick to the pan.--Emily Wolf

title: Wilton Comfort Grip Heart Cutter
description: This giant-size cookie cutter can be used for much more than standard cookie baking, although its giant 4-inch width is certainly perfect for occasions when you want to wow your guests with The Big Cookie. The stainless-steel sides are sturdy enough to make great stencils for the kids, as well as molds for Jello or even homemade soap or candles. The squishy rubber gripper is helpful for folks with arthritis or carpal tunnel, and it's easier for small hands to grip (though the giant size may be tricky for very young kids). Perfect for valentines or wedding decorations, this old-fashioned heart is just waiting for your handwritten message.--Jill Lightner

title: Microplane 35002 Home Series Fine Grater
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Graters']]
description: For finely minced garlic or ginger this is the perfect grater. The cutters are especially sharp, which guarantees easy grating. But this also means you'll need to exercise extra caution--no one likes grated knuckles. For ease in resting the grater on the counter while in use, there's a hard acrylic frame around the metal. The frame also prevents scratches to your countertop. The large handle allows for a firm grip, and the slightly curved grating surface makes it easy to use with oddly shaped chunks of ginger or garlic cloves. It's also an excellent choice for microshreds of citrus zest.--Jill Lightner

title: Wilton 6-Cavity Mini Heart Pan
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Cake Pans', 'Specialty & Novelty Cake Pans']]
description: Round cupcakes and square brownies are tasty old standards, but you can do better. With this mini heart pan from Wilton, your presentation will be more interesting, and somehow, your cake will taste better too. One package of two-layer cake mix makes enough batter for 20 to 24 stars, and each mold is 1-1/4 inches deep. The heart pan is a big hit at do-it-yourself decorating parties--kids especially love it. The packaging comes with instructions and ideas for cakes and gelatin, including how to incorporate fruit and candy for unforgettable desserts.--Dana Van Nest

title: Wilton Decorative Preferred 12 by 3-Inch Round Pan
description: This pan is designed for the serious cake baker and decorator. If you're ready to tackle professional-quality, tiered wedding cakes and other large special occasion cakes, this pan's for you. With 3-inch-high handcrafted straight sides, the pan helps achieve the precise edges necessary for a flawless wedding cake. Hand-spun aluminum construction ensures even heat distribution and a light golden brown surface ideal for icing and decorating. The pure aluminum siding does require greasing and flouring before baking to ensure easy cake release. The thick, high-quality design is both durable and reliable; Wilton has such faith in these pans that the company provides a lifetime warranty.Instructions and baking tips on the packaging detail how much batter and icing to use for various cake sizes, as well as how long to bake layers of varying heights. The 3-inch-high pan sides accommodate up to a 2-3/4-inch-high layer cake when baked; ordinary bakeware can't provide the depth or superior performance this pan does.--Emily Wolf

title: Wilton 8-Inch Featherweight Decorating Bag
description: This pastry bag's small size makes it a handy tool for detail work in decorating. The grease repellent coating means your hands won't slip in the middle of delicate piping, giving you better control. And it withstands boiling or dishwasher treatment--your icing won't come out tasting like the paté you prepared last week. Use again and again. --Otts Bolisay

title: Wilton Comfort Grip Star Cutter
description: This giant-size cookie cutter can be used for much more than standard cookie shaping, although its giant width, at almost 5 inches, is perfect for occasions when you want to wow your guests with The Big Cookie. Stainless-steel sides are sturdy enough to make great stencils for the kids, as well as molds for Jello or even homemade soap or candles. The squishy rubber gripper is helpful for folks with arthritis or carpal tunnel syndrome, but the large size is still tricky for young kids. With this charming star and its gently rounded edges, you can create a whole constellation of yummy treats. There's even a recipe included.--Jill Lightner

title: Wilton Comfort-Grip Cookie Cutter: 4" Flower
description: This giant-size cookie cutter can be used for much more than standard cookie baking, although its giant 4-1/2-inch width is perfect for occasions when you want to wow your guests with The Big Cookie. The stainless-steel sides are sturdy enough to make great stencils for the kids, as well as molds for Jello or even homemade soap or candles. The squishy rubber gripper is helpful for folks with arthritis or carpal tunnel, and it's easier for small hands to grip (though the giant size may be tricky for very young kids). With this six-petal flower shape, you can have lovely pastel blossoms at your next tea party--there's even a recipe included.--Jill Lightner

title: Wilton Decorative Preferred 8 by 3-Inch Round Bakeware
description: This pan is designed for the serious cake baker and decorator. If you're ready to tackle professional-quality, tiered wedding cakes and other special occasion cakes, this pan's for you. With 3-inch-high handcrafted straight sides, the pan helps achieve the precise edges necessary for a flawless wedding cake. Hand-spun aluminum construction ensures even heat distribution and a light golden brown surface ideal for icing and decorating. The pure aluminum siding does require greasing and flouring before baking to ensure easy cake release. The thick, high-quality design is both durable and reliable; Wilton has such faith in these pans that the company provides a lifetime warranty.Instructions and baking tips on the packaging detail how much batter and icing to use for various cake sizes, as well as how long to bake layers of varying heights. The 3-inch-high pan sides accommodate up to a 2-3/4-inch-high layer cake when baked; ordinary bakeware can't provide the depth or superior performance this pan does.--Emily Wolf

title: Wilton Basic Cake Decorating Set
description: A solid foundation set for decorating.  Set includes 5 decorating tips, 12 disposable decorating bags, two couplers, and 4 icing colors

title: Wilton Comfort-Grip Cookie Cutter - Butterfly
description: This giant-size cookie cutter can be used for much more than standard cookie baking, although its giant 5-inch width is certainly perfect for occasions when you want to wow your guests with The Big Cookie. The stainless-steel sides are sturdy enough to make great stencils for the kids, as well as molds for Jello or even homemade soap or candles. The squishy rubber gripper is helpful for folks with arthritis or carpal tunnel, and it's easier for small hands to grip (though the giant size may be tricky for very young kids). It's perfect for summertime parties, so make sure you've got lots of sprinkles for decorating this simple butterfly shape--there's even a recipe included.--Jill Lightner

title: Chef's Design Ribbed Double Burner Grill
description: This 10-3/8-by-18-7/8-inch heavy cast-aluminum griddle fits over two gas or electric rangetop burners, including flat surface rangetops, making it easy to cook for a large group. The ribbed surface lets you grill steaks and seafood, just like on your outdoor grill. The ribs hold food above the griddle so fats drain into the recessed channel, while the juices cook in the wells, "smoking" the food for that outdoor flavor. The nonstick surface is reinforced with stainless steel, which forms a permanent base for the nonstick coating. That means it will last up to 100 times longer than other nonsticks. The commercial-grade cast aluminum conducts heat more evenly than other surfaces, and at lower temperatures--in fact, you should use only low-to-medium heat with this griddle. As an added feature, the superconductive aluminum also works well to thaw frozen foods without the use of heat (steaks in 30-45 minutes, chicken in 20-30). Use only wooden, nylon, or nonmetallic utensils. Hand wash without abrasives.--Doree Armstrong

title: Wilton 2104-7778 Master Tip Set
description: With more than 50 tips included in this professional-quality cake decorating set, your imagination is the limit. Garlands, rosettes, stars, flower petals--if you can dream it up there's a tip designed for the job. The angled coupler assists in certain decorating operations, and a standard coupler plus two flower nails for creating roses are included. The set comes packaged in a white plastic storage tray to keep tips and tools organized in a drawer.--Victoria Jenkins

title: Wilton Aluminum Decorator Preferred 6 by 3-Inch Round Pan
description: This pan is designed for the serious cake baker and decorator. If you're ready to tackle professional-quality, tiered wedding cakes and other special occasion cakes, this pan's for you. With 3-inch-high handcrafted straight sides, the pan helps achieve the precise edges necessary for a flawless wedding cake. Hand-spun aluminum construction ensures even heat distribution and a light golden brown surface ideal for icing and decorating. The pure aluminum siding does require greasing and flouring before baking to ensure easy cake release. The thick, high-quality design is both durable and reliable; Wilton has such faith in these pans that the company provides a lifetime warranty.Instructions and baking tips on the packaging detail how much batter and icing to use for various cake sizes, as well as how long to bake layers of varying heights. The 3-inch-high pan sides accommodate up to a 2-3/4-inch-high layer cake when baked; ordinary bakeware can't provide the depth or superior performance this pan does.--Emily Wolf

title: Chef's Design 11-by-19-1/2-Inch Ultimate Griddle
description: This 11-by-19-1/2-inch heavy cast-aluminum griddle fits over two gas or electric rangetop burners, including flat surface rangetops, making it easy to cook for a large group. Use it to grill sandwiches and meats, or to cook your world-famous, all-you-can-eat breakfast of eggs, bacon, sausage, potatoes, veggies, French toast, and pancakes. The easy-to-clean nonstick surface is reinforced with stainless steel, which forms a permanent base for the nonstick coating. That means it will last up to 100 times longer than other nonsticks--thus its name, the "Ultimate Griddle." The recessed channel drains away excess fats from your bacon or sausage. The commercial-grade cast aluminum conducts heat more evenly than other surfaces, and at lower temperatures--in fact, you should use only low-to-medium heat with this griddle. As an added feature, the superconductive aluminum also works well to thaw frozen foods without the use of heat (steaks in 30-45 minutes, chicken in 20-30). Use only wooden, nylon, or nonmetallic utensils. Hand wash without abrasives.--Doree Armstrong

title: Wilton Cake Leveler
description: Ever wondered why your cakes never quite look like those in fancy bakeries? One secret is this cake leveler. During baking, cake layers tend to "crown," or rise up in the middle, and when frosted, they tend to look like a dome. The wires on this leveler can be adjusted in 1/4-inch increments to slice through the thinnest layer of cake, leaving each layer of your cake perfectly even. No more "filling in" the edges with frosting to make double-decker cakes appear level. Especially grand effects can be achieved with multilayer tortes--with square edges and seamless stacking, folks will think you shelled out the big bucks for such a fancy dessert.--Jill Lightner

title: All-American 15-1/2-Quart Pressure Cooker/Canner
description: This heavy-duty pressure cooker's large capacity is probably best utilized for canning (though it would also be great for a number of cooking tasks). A pressure cooker is generally recommended when canning vegetables and nonacid fruit, since the high heat that can be generated will kill more bacteria than a regular hot water bath. Made from cast aluminum, with sturdy screws to seal the lid to the pot, this pressure cooker requires no rubber or plastic gaskets or rings. Its 15-1/2-quart capacity holds 10 pint jars or 7 quart jars. A three-setting pressure regulator valve is included, and the pressure gauge gives a clear reading. Made in Wisconsin, this is an American classic.--Julija Gelazis

title: Le Creuset Medium Spatula, Cherry Red
description: Get every last lick of batter out of the bowl and into the pan with Le Creuset's standard-size flexible spatula. Made from a silicon that resists temperatures of up to 800 degrees F, this spatula is designed to bend and mold to your bowls so every nook and cranny can be scraped clean. A special stainproof coating keeps this bright-red spatula looking new, and its silicon construction ensures it will never crack or fade--nor will it absorb flavors and odors of foods. An essential tool for any kitchen, Le Creuset's spatula comes in several sizes and six other vivid colors. Remove the wooden handle before placing the head in the dishwasher.--Meg Heffernan

title: All American 921 21-1/2-Quart Pressure Cooker/Canner
description: This heavy-duty pressure cooker's large capacity is probably best utilized for canning (though it would also be great for a number of cooking tasks). A pressure cooker is generally recommended when canning vegetables and nonacid fruit, since the high heat that can be generated will kill more bacteria than a regular hot water bath. Made from cast aluminum, with sturdy screws to seal the lid to the pot, this pressure cooker requires no rubber or plastic gaskets or rings. Its 21-1/2-quart capacity holds 19 pint jars or 7 quart jars. A three-setting pressure regulator valve is included, and the pressure gauge gives a clear reading. Made in Wisconsin, this is an American classic.--Julija Gelazis

title: Waring PBB212 Professional Bar Blender, Retro Green
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Bar Tools & Glasses', 'Ice Crushers']]
description: Bandleader and inventor Fred Waring introduced the first blender in 1936, and this model pays tribute to that early version in its retro styling. A tall, old-fashioned-looking blender, it will crush ice and blend frozen fruit beautifully in a few seconds. This blender feels sturdy: the lid, with a cap that doubles as a 1-ounce measurer, fits securely, and the pitcher, made of thick, ridged glass, won't wobble. Many chefs prefer a blender rather than a food processor for soups and creamy sauces--the blades of a good blender whirl more quickly than those of a food processor and will refine a thin liquid such as cream of tomato soup to an incomparably silky texture. This blender is definitely up to that task. The fixed, self-cleaning stainless-steel blades on the base of the pitcher mean the lid is the only separate part to wash.--Maria Dolan

title: Waring MBB520 Bar Blender, Bright Copper
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Bar Tools & Glasses', 'Ice Crushers']]
description: Bandleader and inventor Fred Waring introduced the first blender in 1936; more than 60 years later the Waring blender remains the standard for the field. Tall and old-fashioned looking with a plated metallic finish on its base, this blender will crush ice in a few seconds. This blender feels sturdy: the lid, with a cap that doubles as a 1-ounce measurer, fits securely, and the pitcher, made of thick, ridged glass, won't wobble. Many chefs prefer a blender rather than a food processor for soups and creamy sauces--the blades of a good blender whirl more quickly than those of a food processor and will refine a thin liquid such as cream of tomato soup to an incomparably silky texture. This blender is definitely up to that task. The fixed, self-cleaning stainless-steel blades on the base of the pitcher mean the lid is the only separate part to wash.--Maria Dolan

title: Waring PJE401 Juice Extractor, Quite White and Stainless Steel
description: Carrots, celery, beets, cucumbers, apples--all vegetables and fruits, with the exception of citrus, go into this powerful, compact juicer's feed chute and come out the spout as clean, fresh juice. (Citrus fruits require an attachment that is not included with this juicer.) A stainless-steel blade chops the vegetables and fruits, and centrifugal force--just as your high school physics teacher promised--spins the juice from the pulp and through a strainer before it pours from the spout. Disposable paper filters (included), useful for soft fruits, can be placed inside the strainer to further filter juice. Pulp can be employed to flavor soups, casseroles, breads, cakes, and sauces. Or it can go into the compost pile. Twisting off the cover opens the juicer for simple disassembly and cleaning. The cover and bowl can go in the dishwasher; other parts must be hand washed.--Fred Brack

title: Waring PBB201 Professional Bar Blender, Quite White
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Bar Tools & Glasses', 'Ice Crushers']]
description: Bandleader and inventor Fred Waring introduced the first blender in 1936, and this model pays tribute to that early version in its retro styling. A tall, old-fashioned-looking blender, it will crush ice and blend frozen fruit beautifully in a few seconds. This blender feels sturdy: the lid, with a cap that doubles as a 1-ounce measurer, fits securely, and the pitcher, made of thick, ridged glass, won't wobble. Many chefs prefer a blender rather than a food processor for soups and creamy sauces--the blades of a good blender whirl more quickly than those of a food processor and will refine a thin liquid such as cream of tomato soup to an incomparably silky texture. This blender is definitely up to that task. The fixed, self-cleaning stainless-steel blades on the base of the pitcher mean the lid is the only separate part to wash.--Maria Dolan

title: Waring PDM101 Drink Mixer, Quite White
description: I don't know why the term "soda jerk" stuck, because anyone who whips up luscious shakes is anything but. This nifty Waring drink mixer proves that point, and is really easy to operate. First, slide the 28-ounce stainless-steel mixing cup up under the agitator and secure the lip under the cup holder, resting the bottom on the cup rest. Then, slide the control switch to low or high and that's it. It's versatile, too, and makes shakes or pancake batter, as well as whirring eggs and milk together for a perfect omelet. Best of all, its heavy-duty 2-speed commercial motor whips a cup of cream in less than a minute. And, if you're feeling swank, it mixes up a Grasshopper or Brandy Alexander in a snap.--C. Whitney-Ward

title: Waring PCA45 Citrus Juice Attachment
description: Juice extractors are incredible for removing every last drop of liquid from most fruits and vegetables, but in order to do citrus fruits, you usually have to go through the time-consuming effort of peeling off the bitter rind before you can juice the fruit. This attachment gets rid of that hurdle by turning the Waring Professional Juice Extractor into a high-powered citrus juicer. Just cut fruit in half to juice. The reamer/strainer basket attachment fits inside the juice extractor basket. It doesn't start spinning until you press the fruit down, and it stops when the fruit is lifted off. Rinse the parts under running water after use.--Dale Steinke

title: Waring MBB518 Professional Quality Food & Beverage Blender, Stainless Steel
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Bar Tools & Glasses', 'Ice Crushers']]
description: Bandleader and inventor Fred Waring introduced the first blender in 1936; more than 60 years later the Waring blender remains the standard for the field. title: Waring PBB204 Professional Bar Blender, Chili Red
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Bar Tools & Glasses', 'Ice Crushers']]

Many chefs prefer a blender rather than a food processor for soups and creamy sauces--the blades of a good blender whirl more quickly than those of a food processor and will refine a thin liquid such as cream of tomato soup to an incomparably silky texture. This blender is definitely up to that task. The fixed, self-cleaning stainless-steel blades on the base of the pitcher mean the lid is the only separate part to wash.--Maria Dolan

title: Waring WPB05BC Professional Quality Bar Blender, Brushed Chrome
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Bar Tools & Glasses', 'Ice Crushers']]
description: This blender's powerful, 360-watt, commercial-grade motor whips  up margaritas and piña coladas, milk shakes and smoothies, soups  and sauces, and crushes ice at either of its two speeds. Equipped with  a 40-ounce glass container that fits onto a rugged brushed-chrome base,  the blender looks great in any kitchen. Its stainless-steel blade  assembly removes for cleaning, and the container is calibrated in both  ounces and liters. The blender's power cord extends a full 6 feet,  permitting use in various settings: bar, kitchen, and patio. Fully  assembled, the blender stands 15-1/2 inches high on a 7-inch-diameter  base. The rubber lid with its plastic 2-ounce measuring insert and  blade-assembly seal require hand washing, but the container, container  bottom, and blade assembly are dishwasher-safe.--Fred Brack

title: Waring PCJ201 Citrus Juicer, Quite White
description: If you're looking for a heavy-duty juicer to whip up your morning glass of tangerine-grapefruit juice, look no further. This is a solidly built juicer that you'll want to leave on the counter all the time--and it's heavy enough that you'll want to give it a permanent, accessible spot. Slower than some juicers, it's consistent and powerful, squeezing every last drop of juice from even a large grapefruit. The majority of the pulp collects in the reamer basket--add as much as you like! The spout pours directly into most tumblers up to 12 ounces, and by adjusting the reamer, you can make the operating switch convenient for left- or right-handed users.--Jill Lightner

title: Waring PCJ218 Citrus Juicer, Stainless Steel
description: If you're looking for a heavy-duty juicer to whip up your morning glass of  tangerine-grapefruit juice, look no further. This is a solidly built juicer that you'll want to  leave on the counter all the time--and it's heavy enough that you'll want to give it a  permanent, accessible spot. Slower than some juicers, it's consistent and powerful,  squeezing every last drop of juice from even a large grapefruit. The majority of the pulp  collects in the reamer basket--add as much as you like! The spout pours directly into most  tumblers up to 12 ounces, and by adjusting the reamer, you can make the operating  switch convenient for left- or right-handed users.--Jill Lightner

title: Waring PBB25 Professional Bar Blender, Black and Stainless Steel
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Bar Tools & Glasses', 'Ice Crushers']]
description: Bandleader and inventor Fred Waring introduced the first  blender in 1936; more than 60 years later the Waring blender remains  the standard for the field. With this stainless-steel, black bar  blender, the company has captured perfectly the sleek, modern look of  its first models. The perfect cocktail party appliance, it doesn't just  look good but has a strong, efficient (though slightly noisy) motor  that zips through ice and frozen strawberries. The metal keeps drinks  cold longer, too. The blade is nondetachable, so you never need to  worry about the seal deteriorating. The stainless-steel container is  also perfect for a classic diner-style milkshake.--Maria DolanEditor's Choice:Waring's professional bar blender only has two  speeds, high and low, and it doesn't need any more, which is why it's  our choice for best blender over $100. This 350-watt blender is really  for professional bartenders, but it's also a dream for the home user  that plans on blending often, or on blending a lot of ice or frozen  drinks. The blades are stainless steel, as is the 32-ounce jug.

title: Waring PBB209 Professional Food and Beverage Blender, Ebony
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Bar Tools & Glasses', 'Ice Crushers']]
description: Bandleader and inventor Fred Waring introduced the first blender in 1936, and this model pays tribute to that early version in its retro styling. A tall, old-fashioned-looking blender in black, it will crush ice and blend frozen fruit beautifully in a few seconds. This blender feels sturdy: the lid, with a cap that doubles as a 1-ounce measurer, fits securely, and the pitcher, made of thick, ridged glass, won't wobble. Many chefs prefer a blender rather than a food processor for soups and creamy sauces--the blades of a good blender whirl more quickly than those of a food processor and will refine a thin liquid such as cream of tomato soup to an incomparably silky texture. This blender is definitely up to that task. The fixed, self-cleaning stainless-steel blades on the base of the pitcher mean the lid is the only separate part to wash.--Maria Dolan

title: Waring WPB05 Professional Kitchen Blender, Chrome
description: Bandleader and inventor Fred Waring introduced the first blender in 1936; more than 60 years later the Waring blender remains the standard for the field. This one, a hardworking blender with a durable glass pitcher and a sturdy metal base, can quickly pulverize ice or purée a vichyssoise to creamy smoothness. The stainless-steel blade is removable on this model, and the plastic ring that attaches the blade to the pitcher feels a little light for such a heavy blender. Those in doubt might go with one of Waring's fixed-blade blenders. With a one-year appliance warranty, though, there's plenty of time to test this one out.--Maria Dolan

title: Cuisinart DLC-093 3-Piece Specialty Disc Set, Fits 14-Cup Processor
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: How did we ever get along without food processors? This three-disk set enables you to expand the use of your machine with several terrific time-savers. The fine grater is used with especially hard foods such as nutmeats, Parmesan cheese, ginger, and horseradish, and the resulting uniform size of those tough-to-grate fibers are wonderful for adding to all sorts of recipes. The julienne disk gives you uniform 6-by-6-millimeter strips of vegetables or medium-hard cheeses, which is a great way of adding decorative touches to salads and stir-fries. Your guests will think you spent hours in preparation. For dealing with large quantities of tomatoes, squash, or firm fruits, the 6-millimeter-thick slicing disk is the way to go. Each disk is dishwasher-safe, and of course, needs careful handling--they are supersharp, so watch your fingers!--Jill Lightner

title: Cuisinart DLC-835TXAMZ Fine Grater Disc, Fits 7- and 11-Cup Processors
description: The fine grater disc makes easy work of grating Parmesan or Romano cheese for topping pasta dishes, nuts or coconut for topping cookies and cakes, ginger for adding to spice pastes and for seasoning a variety of Asian dishes, or horseradish to make your own horseradish sauce. Best of all, this disc lets you forget about scraping any more knuckles on that hand-held grater. The disc slots easily onto the detachable disc stem, but be sure to handle it carefully, as these blades are very sharp.--Jennifer Harris

title: Cuisinart DLC-833TXAMZ 3-by-3mm Medium Square Julienne Disc, Fits 7 and 11-Cup Processors
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: Wonderful for shoestring potatoes, this precisely engineered disc makes long, perfectly even and consistent julienne strips 3-millimeters square. Also useful for preparing vegetables for stir-fry, and cheese for omelets and salads; when used in conjunction with the 3-millimeter slicing disc it turns julienne strips into cubes. Made of stainless steel, it's dishwasher-safe and comes with a limited three-year warranty.--Victoria Jenkins

title: Cuisinart BDH-2 Blade and Disc Holder
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: This simple unit provides safe, convenient, and attractive countertop storage for three Cuisinart blades and three cutting disks. It's designed to be used as stand-alone storage or side by side with Cuisinart's supplemental disk holder. The effective tamper-resistant locking device must be pulled out and twisted 90 degrees to access the cutting tools, and it automatically relocks when the lid is closed. Blades cannot be accessed via the open bottom, and disks can only be removed through the locking top. Moreover, when all three storage slots are occupied, the cutting edges of each disk are completely protected. Each blade holder is shaped to snugly fit its designated blade. High-impact plastic and external surfaces are smooth and curved to facilitate cleaning.--Toni Reineke

title: Cuisinart DLC-042TX Stainless Steel Thin Slicing Disc 2-mm.
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: The thin slicing disc makes easy work of slicing onions for onion soup, potatoes for gratins, or apples for tarts. It also works well slicing cucumbers for salads, slicing lemons or limes for fruit punches and other beverages, and for slicing pepperoni for pizza--or any other task for which you need large quantities of even slices. The raised shelf behind the cutting blade prevents slices from colliding with the disc itself, providing perfect, uniform slices every time. The disc slots easily onto the detachable disc stem, but be sure to handle it carefully, as these blades are very sharp.--Jennifer Harris

title: Cuisinart DLC-843TX 3mm Medium Slicing Disc for 7- and 11-Cup Processors
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: Cuisinart's razor-sharp 3-mm slicing disc makes quick work of onions, peppers, and other vegetables for use in a stir-fry or homemade soup. It also slices ingredients for salads, such as mushrooms, celery, apples, or olives, and prepares potatoes at an ideal thickness for pan-frying. Designed for use with Cuisinart 11-cup and 7-cup food processors, the unit requires a detachable stem to operate and stores flat for convenience. Made of stainless steel, the disc cleans easily by hand or in the dishwasher and carries a three-year limited warranty.

title: Cuisinart BFP-703 SmartPower Duet Blender and Food Processor, White
description: Two powerful kitchen appliances have been brought together in this blender/food processor by Cuisinart. The heavy-duty motor base is up to both blending and processing tasks, and won't "walk" on the counter, even when it's crushing ice. Use the blender with its dripless pour spout to make and serve 40 ounces of frozen drinks or to purée baby foods or soups; use the processor to prep up to 3 cups of vegetables, cheeses, nuts, and meats. With one motor base, it's simple to keep the blender out on the counter and then bring out the processor attachment for special tasks.This is an amazingly sturdy product, with tight fitting lids, a heavy glass blender jar, and a motor that chops meats or ice with equal aplomb. Most attachments go in the dishwasher, and the flat touch pad, which has seven settings, including "ice crush" and "pulse," is easily wiped down with a sponge. This dual appliance comes with a booklet detailing how to use all the features, and 48 recipes, from cranberry-orange mimosas to classic mayonnaise.--Maria DolanEditor's Choice:This blender/food processor combines two kitchen appliances into one useful package. It is heavy-duty, can both blend and process most things, and sits on the counter without shaking around. The processor has 350 watts of power and seven speeds, and the plastic bowl size is 3 cups -- it also has a 40-ounce glass blender jar. It comes with one standard blade and one slicing/shredding disc. Most attachments go in the dishwasher, and the flat touchpad wipes down with a sponge.

title: Cuisinart DLC-893 3-Piece Specialty Disc Set, Fits 7- and 11-Cup Processors
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: How did we ever get along without food processors? This three-disk set enables you to expand the use of your machine with several terrific time-savers. The fine grater is used with especially hard foods such as nutmeats, Parmesan cheese, ginger, and horseradish, and the resulting uniform size of those tough-to-grate fibers are wonderful for adding to all sorts of recipes. The julienne disk gives you uniform 3-by-3-millimeter strips of vegetables or medium-hard cheeses, which is a great way of adding decorative touches to salads and stir-fries. Your guests will think you spent hours in preparation. For dealing with large quantities of tomatoes, squash, or firm fruits, the 6-millimeter-thick slicing disk is the way to go. Each disk is dishwasher-safe, and of course, needs careful handling--they are supersharp, so watch your fingers!--Jill Lightner

title: Cuisinart DLC-035TXAMZ Fine Grater Disc, Fits 14-Cup Processor
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: Save your knuckles--this Cuisinart disc grates small, hard foods such as ginger and horseradish safely and easily. Scores of tiny teeth on its surface are also ideal for grating hard cheeses such as Parmesan and Romano to a light, powdery texture--nuts and coconut, too. Precisely engineered from stainless steel, it's dishwasher-safe and comes with a limited three-year warranty.--Victoria Jenkins

title: Cuisinart DLC-846TX 6mm Thick Slicing Disc, Fits 7 and 11-Cup Processors
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: Excellent for eggplant parmigiana as well as tomatoes for pizza, salads, and burgers, this useful, precisely engineered accessory disc cuts uniform 1/4-inch-thick slices. Cuisinart's unique design stiffens the disc and allows the slicing blade to extend all the way to the outer rim to produces consistent slices without cracks, bruising, or broken skin--even with tomatoes. Use it for avocados, strawberries, bananas, pineapple, and other fruits for salads and deserts. Made of stainless steel, it's dishwasher-safe and comes with a limited three-year warranty.--Victoria Jenkins

title: Cuisinart KUA-17 1-3/4-Quart Cordless Automatic Electric Kettle
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliances', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso Appliances', 'Electric Kettles']]
description: Great for a dorm room or office, this cordless kettle lets you enjoy tea, coffee, or even dried soups at any time and without a range. And it's detachable from its power base for convenient pouring. The unobtrusive power base shuts off when the kettle is removed from the platform, and the concealed heating element never comes into contact with the water, keeping it from tasting flat or scalded. Made from high-quality stainless steel, the mirror-finished kettle is attractive and rust-resistant, and its 36-inch cord can be hidden in the base, making for easy, cord-free storage.--Madeleine Miller

title: Cuisinart DLC-873 3-Piece Standard Disc Set, Fits 7- and 11-Cup Processors
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: Your culinary imagination is the limit with this accessory disc set containing three precisely engineered stainless-steel discs. A unique pattern of teeth enables the fine shredding disc to produce lace-like strands of tough ingredients like hard root vegetables and hard cheeses, shred chocolate and coconut, and shred cheddar cheese for tacos. The french fry-cut disc is ideal for 1/4-inch square julienne vegetable, french fries, and crudités, and the medium slicing disc cuts vegetables and partially frozen meats for stir-frying and slices fruit the right thickness for tarts. The discs are dishwasher-safe and come with a three-year limited warranty.--Victoria Jenkins

title: Cuisinart DCG-20N Coffee Bar Coffee Grinder, White
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso', 'Coffee Grinders', 'Electric Blade Grinders']]
description: With Cuisinart's handsome, compact coffee grinder, it's easy to always have fresh coffee made to exact specifications. Its clean lines and teardrop shape make the grinder easy to hold, and it runs with the push of a button in its lid. To use, simply measure coffee beans into the bowl, replace the lid, and hold down the button until the coffee is ground to the desired consistency. Unplug the grinder when it's not in use--the cord can be stored in the base of the unit.--Jennifer Harris

title: Cuisinart DLC-836 6-by-6mm Fruit, Vegetable and French Fry Disc Fits 7 and 11-Cup Processors
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: Deep-fried, oven-roasted, or tossed in a sauté pan... everybody loves french fries--or, as an alternative, sweet potato fries. Cuisinart's precisely engineered blade cuts uniform strips from whole potatoes, yams, turnips, zucchini, eggplant, or anything else you can think of, into just the right size to produce a crisp outside and tender interior. It's also useful for cutting vegetables for crudités and preparing fruit for salads and preserves. Made of stainless steel and dishwasher-safe, it comes with a limited three-year warranty.--Victoria Jenkins

title: Cuisinart DLC-036TXAMZ 6-by-6mm Fruit, Vegetable and French Fry Disc, Fits 14-Cup Processor
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: With this versatile cutting disc, you'll create 1/4-inch square strips of potatoes, zucchini, and turnips for deep frying or baking, coarsely chop tomatoes and onions for salsa, make sticks of celery and carrots and other vegetables for salads and crudités, and cut strips of fruits for salads and preserves. The raised shelf behind the cutting blade prevents slices from colliding with the disc itself, providing perfect, uniform strips every time. The disc slots easily onto the detachable disc stem, but be sure to handle it carefully, as these blades are very sharp.--Jennifer Harris

title: Cuisinart DCG-20BK Coffee Bar Coffee Grinder, Black
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso', 'Coffee Grinders', 'Electric Blade Grinders']]
description: With Cuisinart's handsome, compact coffee grinder, it's easy to always have  fresh coffee made to exact specifications. It has a 2-1/2-ounce capacity--enough for 12  cups of coffee. The grinder's clean lines and teardrop shape make it easy to hold, and it  runs with the push of a button. To use, simply measure coffee beans into the bowl,  replace the lid, and hold down the button until the coffee is ground to the desired  consistency. Both the bowl and blades are made of stainless steel. Unplug the grinder  when it's not in use--the cord can be stored in the base of the unit.--Jennifer  Harris

title: Cuisinart DLC-834TX Fine Shredding Disc, Fits 7 and 11-Cup Processors
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: This stainless steel, dishwasher safe fine shredding disc from Cuisinart creates extra-fine, lacy shreds. Requires detachable stem DLC-139TX-1.

title: Cuisinart ICE-RFB 1-1/2-Quart Additional Freezer Bowl, Fits ICE-20/21 Ice Cream Maker
description: When the whole neighborhood brings the kids to your house, this extra freezer bowl provides needed flexibility by letting you make an additional batch of your favorite ice cream, frozen yogurt, or sorbet. Little assembly is required to use this extra bowl, as it's made to fit on the Cuisinart ice-cream maker. The bowl does not come with a lid for storage of your sweet creations, and so should be kept away from any heat source, and it's not dishwasher-safe.--Teresa Simanton

title: Cuisinart DLC-10S Pro Classic 7-Cup Food Processor, White
description: A perfect gift for new homemakers, the food processor has become an integral part of modern cooking, speeding up a multitude of processes, including kneading dough, slicing, chopping, shredding cheese, vegetables and meat, mincing garlic and parsley, mixing batters, and emulsifying mayonnaise. Cuisinart's Pro Classic comes with a 7-cup work bowl, four basic attachments for slicing, shredding, chopping, mixing, and kneading, and large feed tube. This processor comes with a compact cover for use when the feed tube isn't needed and a pulse control that allows the desired degree of fineness when chopping and puréeing. Remove the detachable stem for compact storage of discs. All the parts are dishwasher-safe and the motor base wipes clean. In addition, a custom-contoured spatula, a 50-page recipe booklet, and a 30-minute video designed to familiarize the new owner with the care and use of the food processor are included.--Victoria Jenkins

title: Cuisinart DLC-8S Pro Custom 11-Cup Food Processor, White
description: A perfect gift for new homemakers, the food processor has become an integral  part of modern cooking, speeding up a multitude of processes, including kneading dough;  slicing; chopping; shredding cheese, vegetables, and meat; mincing garlic and parsley;  mixing batters; and emulsifying mayonnaise. Cuisinart's Pro Custom comes with an  11-cup work bowl; five basic attachments for slicing, shredding, chopping, mixing, and  kneading; and also features two feed-tube options, one big enough to handle a whole  potato. This processor comes with a compact cover for use when the feed tube isn't  needed and a pulse control that allows the desired degree of fineness when chopping and  puréeing. Remove the detachable stem for compact storage of discs. All the parts are  dishwasher-safe and the motor base wipes clean. In addition, a custom-contoured spatula,  a 50-page recipe booklet, and a 30-minute video designed to familiarize the new owner  with the care and use of the food processor are included.--Victoria Jenkins

title: Cuisinart AFP-7 3-Cup Food Processor Duet Attachment, White
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: For those who already have the Cuisinart SmartPower blender, this is an awesome addition to an already versatile kitchen tool. This food-processor attachment is used in place of the blender pitcher, and fits perfectly on the base of SPB-7 series blenders. Along with the work bowl, it comes with a chopping blade and a reversible disk for slicing or shredding. From piecrust to potato salad, there are plenty of dishes that a food processor makes short work of, but that short blender blades simply can't handle. Now you can have both handy tools without another bulky appliance taking up kitchen storage space.--Jill Lightner

title: Cuisinart DLC-XPN Classic 20-Cup Food Processor, White
description: With its powerful motor and vast capacity, this food processor is suitable for catering and restaurant use and for the serious home chef. The possibilities are almost limitless: it chops and purées fruits, meats, vegetables, and cheese; makes pastry and bread dough; and slices and shreds almost any food, all at the touch of one of its two big gray buttons. In addition to the myriad attachments included with the machine, you might want to purchase separately specialized slicing discs and juicer and whisk attachments. All of the cutting discs slot easily onto the detachable disc stem.The processor comes with a detailed instruction/recipe booklet that has full-color photographs illustrating the parts of the machine and how to use them to make everything from tabbouleh to curried pumpkin soup to brioche dough. Troubleshooting information is also included.--Jennifer HarrisEditor's Choice:Cuisinart's 20-cup food processor is our choice for the best food processor over $300. This processor features a direct drive 1-1/2-horsepower induction motor (which equals about 1,120 watts) and a 20-cup plastic bowl. It comes with one standard blade, one shredding disc, three slicing discs (including a standard 4-millimeter disc and a thick 6-millimeter disc), a dough blade, a spatula, and a cleaning tool, and has one speed plus a pulse function. This is a heavy and sturdy machine--it weighs 27 pounds, the base is 12 by 8-1/2 inches, and it's 17 inches high with the work bowl. Read more in ourcomparison of food processors.

title: Cuisinart WMR-C Classic Round Waffle Maker
description: The sweet, warm fragrance of waffles baking on a weekend morning is one that many of us remember fondly.
