With this classic chrome waffle maker from Cuisinart, you'll make waffles like Mom used to--but, even better, your new waffle maker will have nonstick surfaces and a European regulating thermostat to ensure the first waffle of the batch is as crisp as the last. For convenient storage, wrap the cord around the base and store on end. Included is a recipe book with your basic waffle recipe and yummy variations, such as whole-wheat pecan waffles.--Dana Van Nest

title: European Gift & Houseware 24-Ounce Stainless Steel Frothing Pitcher
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee & Espresso Machine Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee Machine Accessories']]
description: A professional-grade frothing pitcher, this 4-1/4-inch vessel is solid and handsome, rounded at the bottom and tapering toward the lip. It's designed for right-handers, with a lip on the left side for pouring milk and foam. Any barista, whether at home or in a coffee shop, can use it to steam milk and create heaps of foam for cappuccinos, caffe lattes, and hot chocolates. Molded to fit your fingers, its 6-inch plastic handle provides a sure, comfortable grip.--Fred Brack

title: Jupiter Large Commercial Juice Press, White
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Fruit & Vegetable Tools', 'Manual Juicers']]
description: This industrial-strength citrus juicer gets the most out of oranges, down to the last drop of sweet juice--pressed juice is naturally sweeter than juice obtained from electric juicers because it avoids the bitter taste of the skin oil. Put a glass under the juicer, place half an orange or grapefruit on the raised stainless-steel cone, and press the handle down. The wide, deep funnel top closes over the fruit, pressing every bit of pulp onto the cone to get every last drop of juice. It doesn't take a lot of strength to press down this handle, unlike the case with some other juicers, and the pulp left in the skin is completely flattened, a testament to this juicer's strength and thoroughness. To clean the cone and funnel parts, lift them out and rinse under the faucet.--Doree Armstrong

title: Tre Spade il Macinino Conical burr coffee grinder
description: Whether your preferred coffee is standard drip, rich Turkish, or a double shot of espresso with a twist, this grinder can achieve the optimum size of freshly ground beans. A simple knob can be dialed from one to nine, providing multiple grinds, while the instruction sheet details which number to use for the brewing style you prefer. The bright chrome finish and sleek walls add a modern touch to the kitchen counter, but at only 4 inches wide, it only needs a little space. A stiff brush is included for cleaning oils and other remains from the blades, which also makes it easy to use for hard spices such as cloves. If accuracy is of top importance to you, this is the grinder to choose.--Jill Lightner

title: La Pavoni PB Large Base with Sliding Drawer, Black
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Coffee & Espresso Machine Parts & Accessories', 'Espresso Machine Accessories']]
description: The La Pavoni large black base with sliding drawer has a modern design and larger area for your espresso machine and grinder.  It is suitable for all La Pavoni lever and pump machines except the Duet.  This unit is made of heavy steel sheet metal, and has a sliding knock box which allows for quick disposal of grinds, or doubles as a storage compartment.  Rubber feet aid in protecting counter top.

title: Cuisinart MM-2M Mini Mate Chopper and Grinder
description: The Mini-Mate makes quick work of small kitchen prep jobs that might otherwise require difficult and messy chopping, grinding, and grating: nuts, nutmeg, and cinnamon sticks, peppercorns and seeds, garlic and anchovies, even chocolate and citrus peel. With a patented reversible blade for sharp or blunt processing, and two speeds of operation, it is well equipped to handle a variety of jobs.Though it has a high-speed motor and durable stainless-steel motor shaft, keep in mind that the Mini-Mate is designed for small amounts of food: 2 tablespoons is the maximum recommended for one batch, and food pieces should be no larger than 1/2 inch. Purchase it to complement, not replace, a larger, full-function food processor. An instruction book that accompanies the processor details how to process many common foods and troubleshoot problems so you know how to best use and care for your Mini Mate.Cleanup and completion of small jobs is quicker and more efficient because of the small size, though the many parts of the Mini Mate require disassembly, careful cleaning, and reassembly, which does add to total cleaning time. If you don't have the time or the patience for smaller detail-oriented prep jobs, Mini Mate is a great kitchen aid.--Emily Wolf

title: Jupiter Large Commercial Juice Press, White
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Fruit & Vegetable Tools', 'Manual Juicers']]
description: This industrial-strength citrus juicer gets the most out of oranges, down to the last drop of sweet juice--pressed juice is naturally sweeter than juice obtained from electric juicers because it avoids the bitter taste of the skin oil. Put a glass under the juicer, place half an orange or grapefruit on the raised stainless-steel cone, and press the handle down. The wide, deep funnel top closes over the fruit, pressing every bit of pulp onto the cone to get every last drop of juice. It doesn't take a lot of strength to press down this handle, unlike the case with some other juicers, and the pulp left in the skin is completely flattened, a testament to this juicer's strength and thoroughness. To clean the cone and funnel parts, lift them out and rinse under the faucet.--Doree Armstrong

title: La Pavoni EPC-8 Europiccola 8-Cup Lever Style Espresso Machine, Chrome
description: Whip up custom coffee specialty drinks in your own kitchen, with just the right amount of foam on your double tall latte, with this sturdy Italian-made espresso machine. It has an all-steel construction under heavy chrome plating, making it as sturdy and shiny as the bumpers of a '55 Buick. The machine is 12 by 7 inches in size (with the handle lowered) and comes with a tamper, screen, screen holder, measuring ladle, and cappuccino attachment, as well as complete operating instructions and a ten-minute video.The machine's sleek, retro look sports shiny surfaces, a thick base with curved edges, and a pull-down coffee compressor. It's attractive enough to leave out on the counter (and really too heavy to move around frequently), and once you get used to inexpensive lattes at home, you'll want it handy for everyday use.--Marcie BovetzEditor's note: This item may arrive with water inside from the manufacturer's pressure test. This is a normal occurrence and doesn't point to a problem with the machine.

title: Cuisinart DLC-046TXAMZ 6mm Thick Slicing Disc, Fits 14-Cup Processor
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: This thick slicing disc makes wonderful 1/4-inch slices with ease. Use it to slice tomatoes for sandwiches, to slice pineapple and bananas for fruit salads, or to make thick slabs of potatoes or eggplant for soups and stews. The raised shelf behind the cutting blade prevents slices from colliding with the disc itself, guaranteeing uniform, unbroken slices every time. The disc slots easily onto the detachable disc stem, but be sure to handle it carefully, as these blades are very sharp.--Jennifer Harris

title: Cuisinart BA-165A Everyday Stainless 2-Quart Teakettle
description: This teakettle boils water for tea or coffee with panache. Its sleek, simple, contemporary design is enhanced by a polished stainless-steel finish, and its stainless-steel construction never imparts an aftertaste to the water. The kettle holds two quarts and has an easy-to-fill spout with a removable whistle for pouring. Before you boil your first kettle of water, wash it by hand and rinse it well with hot water. (Don't use steel wool, as abrasives will mar the beauty of the finish.) If the exterior becomes cloudy, use a gentle cleanser with a sponge to clean. One caution: the handle and knob on this kettle do heat up as water reaches the boiling point, so be sure to use a potholder to move it off the burner.--Irene Svete

title: Lodge Cast Iron Fajita Set with Wooden Underliner, Chili Pepper Red
description: Now, authentic fajitas are available at home, thanks to this shallow, cast iron fajita pan. Resting on a red-stained wooden base, the pan set also comes with a special potholder (decorated with red chili peppers) that fits over the pan handle. While broiling steak, chicken, or tofu, put the fajita pan into the oven and heat for 30 minutes. When the food is cooked, and the onions and peppers are sautéed, pile them all on the heated pan and carry them sizzling to the table. Serve with a basket of warmed flour tortillas.--Dana Van Nest

title: Tre Spade "IL Macinino" Burr Grinder, Brass
description: Tre Spade "IL Macinino" Burr Grinder, Brass  invokes a bygone era with this handsome machine. The hard-plastic hoppers and spout are sepia-toned, like old photographs of dignified men and women relaxing on a Ravello terrace, and burnished brass houses the grinder's electric motor. Good looks, however, don't overshadow the grinder's performance in delivering fresh, full-flavored ground coffee. First, pour up to 8 ounces of whole beans into the top hopper. Then turn a knob on the side to adjust grind from fine to coarse through nine finely calibrated settings. Press a button on the side, and coffee ground to your personal specifications spills into the removable front hopper. For grinding directly into a pot, remove the front hopper, place the pot beneath the spout, and press upward against a lever to activate the grinder. A quick cleanup with a brush that's included and the grinder awaits the next day.--Fred Brack

title: Cuisinart DLC-048TXAMZ 8mm Extra Thick Slicing Disc, Fits PowerPrep Plus 14-Cup Processor
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Food Processor Parts & Accessories']]
description: This julienne disc creates fine (3 mm, or approximately 1/4-inch) square strips of vegetables, fruits, and cheeses. Use it to make strips of carrots and zucchini for stir-fries and salads, and to make shreds of cheese for garnishes. It can also be used in conjunction with a slicing disc to create tiny cubes of firm vegetables, such as turnips and potatoes.  The disc slots easily onto the detachable disc stem, but be sure to handle it carefully, as these blades are very sharp.--Jennifer Harris

title: La Pavoni EPBB-8 Europiccola 8-Cup Lever Style Espresso Machine, Black Base
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso', 'Espresso Machine & Coffeemaker Combos']]
description: True baristas "pull" an espresso with a lever instead of punching a button and relying on an automatic pump's whims. With this Italian-made machine, you force water through the coffee yourself, using the lever to precisely control speed, which means you get the full flavor and thick cap of crema that mark an ideal drink. Pulling an espresso the old-fashioned way is enormously gratifying, and a video accompanying the machine will teach anyone the skills needed to become a barista.A steam wand heats milk for hot chocolate and creates foam for cappuccinos, lattes, and other coffee drinks, while an alternate wand with frothing attachment produces heaps of foam automatically. The water tank holds 20 ounces, enough to make 8 cups before the tank (accessible under the machine's removable dome) needs refilling and before water needs to be heated again (the heating element's rating is 1,000 watts maximum, 800 watts minimum). A glass tube permits water-level monitoring, and a thermostat triggers a green light when water reaches the correct crema-producing temperature. An internal fuse, which can be reset in the base, prevents overheating.This version of La Pavoni's Europiccola model comes in gleaming chrome and features black plastic accents and a durable black acrylic base that contains fine, light-reflecting flecks, producing a polished-granite effect.--Fred BrackEditor's note: This item may arrive with water inside from the manufacturer's pressure test. This is a normal occurrence and doesn't point to a problem with the machine.

title: La Pavoni PC-16 Professional Espresso Machine, Chrome
description: Perhaps it's not surprising that an Italian company such as La Pavoni takes its espresso and cappuccino very seriously. The detailed manual and video that come with this professional-style machine spare no small detail while guiding you through the espresso and cappuccino process. With proper equipment, La Pavoni argues, including very fine grounds and a state-of-the art machine, an espresso or cappuccino can be a work of art. Because cafe prices are rising and an improperly made espresso is indistinguishable from mud, it's worth investing the time and equipment required for a rich and truly satisfying espresso experience. For me, one thing that separates a barista-style cappuccino from many homemade efforts is the quality of the foam. The Europiccola produces foam with just right amount of frothiness, although the foam can also be controlled if you prefer less enthusiastic frothing. For top-quality cappuccinos, the machine should be descaled four or five times a year (descaling instructions are included). Made of gleaming chrome, this strikingly attractive machine should not be cleaned with abrasives.--Laura CuthbertEditor's note: This item may arrive with water inside from the manufacturer's pressure test. This is a normal occurrence and doesn't point to a problem with the machine.

title: Lodge Original Finish Cast Iron Eight-Section Cornbread Skillet
description: By dividing this cornbread skillet into eight wedge-shaped sections,  Lodge exploits cast iron's baking advantages to ensure that a tasty crust  envelops each wedge when it emerges from the oven. Because cast iron is  unmatched for heat retention and distribution--no hot spots--that crust will be  crisp and uniform. The skillet is 9 inches in diameter, and each wedge is 3-1/2  inches long and 1 inch deep. The skillet weighs 5-1/2 pounds, must be seasoned  by coating with melted shortening and then baked, and needs to be coated with  oil or cooking spray after each use to prevent rust.This skillet's weight and care requirements put off some cooks, but, as has been  known since the Middle Ages, cast iron permits precise baking and flavor- retentive cooking, has a natural nonstick finish when seasoned, and lasts for  generations (thereby increasing its value). As it blackens with use, cast iron  imparts to food a mystical aura of rustic nourishment and flavor.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Catering 3.0 quart Commercial Stainless Steel Saucepan
description: Leave it to the French to create the perfect saucepan with performance and style. The extra-thick copper-lined bottom heats fast and evenly; won't react with foods as aluminum does, and won't ever warp if left on the burner too long. The polished stainless steel will always look sharp, even with regular dishwasher cleaning. This saucepan's straight sides have a curved rim for accurately pouring a lunchtime soup into a mug or straining a beurre blanc. The handle is designed to direct the heat away and stay cool. Make room on the pot rack for hanging it within reach, because you'll definitely want to show off this imported pot.--Lynne Sampson

title: Polder 210201 Deluxe Steel Bread Box, White
description: "Bread box" is a term your grandmother knows. That's where she stored her bread, cookies, and muffins--not in the refrigerator, where baked goods quickly go stale. Her bread box was likely made of tin. This one is made of steel, durable enough to survive into the next century. The bread-box principle remains as true today as it was in your grandmother's time: to stay fresh, bread and baked goods need air--but not too much. This box lets in just enough air so that loaves don't get soggy and crusts stay crisp. Like its function, the form of this box is pleasingly retro. Plenty big enough (17 inches wide by 7-1/4 inches high by 10 inches deep) to hold family-size supplies, its roll-top door opens and closes smoothly. The white paint gleams and is chip resistant. Also available incobalt blueorstainless steel, this is a handsome accessory for any kitchen.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Profiserie 13.5-Inch Stainless Steel Lid
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade, stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide--serious home cooks also use this cookware to advantage. Designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely, and it is stain- and corrosion-resistant. And with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. This is cookware for cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design. This lid goes safely into ovens, under broilers, and through the dishwasher. Though intended to go with Sitram Profiserie pots and pans, it will fit any 13.4-inch-wide pan.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Catering 10.4-Quart Commercial Stainless Steel Rondeau Casserole
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade, stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide--serious home cooks also use this cookware to advantage. On the Inox line's pot and pan bottoms, a disk of copper, cookware's best heat conductor, sheathed in steel conducts heat rapidly and uniformly. Sitram cookware goes safely into ovens and under broilers, and, designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely. The bottoms don't warp, and this cookware is stain- and corrosion-resistant. And with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. This is cookware for cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design.With its wide bottom and low sides, a rondeau casserole is a commercial-kitchen workhorse. In the oven or on top the stove and covered with a lid (sold separately), this pan serves as a casserole to stew or braise meats, poultry, seafood, or vegetables. Popular for browning meats and rapidly reducing sauces and broths, it's also a roasting pan and a fry pan.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Catering 1.5 -quart Commercial Stainless Steel Saucepan
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade, stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide--serious home cooks also use this cookware to advantage. On the Inox line's pot and pan bottoms, a disk of copper--cookware's best heat conductor--sheathed in steel conducts heat rapidly and uniformly. Sitram cookware goes safely into ovens and under broilers, and, designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely. The bottoms don't warp, and this cookware is stain- and corrosion-resistant. And with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. This is cookware for cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design.With a copper-core bottom that quickly and evenly spreads heat, this saucepan is ideal for preparing roux-based sauces or gravies, because the roux's color can be controlled so precisely. At 6.3 inches in diameter by 3-1/4 inches high, it's a basic, workhorse pan upon which to build a well-equipped kitchen. Its handle has a hole for hanging on hook or peg.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Profiserie 3.4-Quart Commercial Stainless Steel Chef's Pan
description: Due to its excellent composition of 18/10 stainless steel and a high-density alloy base, this top-quality, medium-size professional French chef's pan is favored by many commercial kitchens that use induction heat for cooking. When the induction cooktop is turned on, its coils produce a high-frequency alternating magnetic field that causes the molecules in the pan's base to vibrate. As a result, the pan and the food heat up super-fast.Stainless steel serves as a nonreactive cooking surface, and the stainless-steel handle stays cool longer. This versatile pan is not restricted to induction cooktops--it may be used on more traditional heat sources as well, and is ideal for soups, pasta, and sauces. Welcome to your new favorite pan.--Marcela Broussard

title: Sitram Profiserie 3.2 -quart Commercial Stainless Steel Braisier/Stewpot
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade, stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide--serious home cooks also use this cookware to advantage. On its Profiserie line's pot and pan bottoms, an aluminum disk sheathed in steel conducts heat rapidly and uniformly. Sitram cookware also goes safely into ovens and under broilers, and, designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely. The bottoms don't warp, and this cookware is stain- and corrosion-resistant. And with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. This is cookware for cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design.Braisiers such as this one offer versatility. In the oven or on top of the stove and covered with a lid (sold separately), this pan serves as a casserole to stew or braise meats, poultry, seafood, or vegetables. Popular for browning meats and rapidly reducing sauces and broths, it's also a sauté pan, a deep-frying pan, and a double-handled saucepan large enough (7.9 inches in diameter by 4-1/4 inches high) to handle many home-kitchen tasks.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Catering Frypan with Helper Handle, 13.5-Inch diameter
description: This large frying pan is from a line of the most distinguished cookware in and outside of France. Professionals rely on the superior heat conduction and durability. For the home cook, the surgical quality stainless steel offers a lot of eye appeal along with high performance. The warp-proof pan bottom is three layers thick with a thermic copper core, the best metal for conducting heat from the flame to the food. The long handle stays cool even over high heat and it's welded to withstand the oven, broiler, and dishwasher cleaning. A smaller handle on the opposite side helps in maneuvering this wide-bodied pan.--Lynne Sampson

title: Sitram Catering 9.5-Inch Commercial Stainless Steel Lid
description: Not every pan needs a lid, which is why Sitram, maker of the best professional high-caliber cookware, sells them separately. Made of the same high-quality stainless steel to match the utility and beauty of their pans, this lid will fit any 9.4-inch pan. For sweating vegetables or steaming rice, it's guaranteed to seal in the heat. A small vent hold directs the steam out evenly and safely. The smooth, squared-off handles are welded to withstand the oven or broiler. Best of all, when it comes time to clean, it goes straight into the dishwasher and will hold its polished shine without scratching or corroding for a lifetime of heavy-duty use.--Lynne Sampson

title: Sitram Profiserie Half Stockpot 4-Quart
description: This middle-sized half stockpot of top-quality construction is the workhorse of a kitchen, and might be the pot chosen if only one is wanted. It has an 8-inch diameter and a 4-quart capacity, so it handles any medium-sized chore, from simmering a sauce to reducing stock to cooking vegetables. Profiserie pots and pans from French manufacturer Sitram are made of 18/10 stainless steel with triple-layer bottoms with an inner aluminum core and have a shiny outer surface and a brushed surface inside, with wide, stainless-steel handles. Professional chefs often choose Sitram cookware for its long-lasting quality construction and uniform heat diffusion, qualities that also earn praise from home cooks. It's dishwasher-, stovetop-, oven-, and broiler-safe.--Marcie Bovetz

title: Sitram Catering 6.25-Inch Commercial Stainless Steel Lid
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade, stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide--serious home cooks also use this cookware to advantage. Designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely, and it is stain- and corrosion-resistant. And with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. This is cookware for cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design. This lid goes safely into ovens, under broilers, and through the dishwasher. Though intended to go with Sitram Inox pots and pans, it will fit any 6.3-inch-wide pan.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Catering 9-1/2-Inch Commercial Stainless Steel Fry Pan
description: This medium-size frying pan is from a line of the most distinguished cookware in and outside of France. Professionals rely on the superior heat conduction and durability. For the home cook, the surgical quality stainless steel offers a lot of eye appeal along with high performance. The warp-proof pan bottom is three layers thick with a thermic copper core, the best metal for conducting heat from the flame to the food. The long handle stays cool even over high heat and it's welded to withstand the oven, broiler, and dishwasher cleaning. The polished finish will stay shining, long after you've perfected flipping an omelet without a spatula.--Lynne Sampson

title: Sitram Profiserie 10.6-Quart Commercial Stainless Steel Rondeau Casserole
description: With a diameter of 13.5 inches, this gleaming pan is wonderful for braising large roasts or simmering family-sized soups. Made in France, it has an 18/10 stainless-steel exterior, which means it's composed of iron, 18% chromium, and 10% nickel. Stainless steel is nonreactive, so the pan won't react to acidic ingredients, like tomatoes. It's also durable, so this striking pan won't lose its shine. The base is an extra thick aluminum core sandwiched between stainless steel, for superior heat conductivity. The responsiveness of this layered construction gives a chef greater control over temperamental dishes. The handles are stainless steel and ovenproof, increasing the pan's versatility. In addition, stainless steel is dishwasher-safe, so don't worry about this pan's flawless finish.--Laura Cuthbert

title: Sitram Catering 13.5-Inch Commercial Stainless Steel Lid
description: Every stew pot needs a lid to tightly seal in juices over hours of slow cooking. This sturdy lid fits any model 34 Sitram pot. The lid is made of the same heavy 18/10 stainless steel as the pot; the sturdy, stay-cool handle is welded on, and includes a lifetime guarantee against separation. A handy steam vent allows heat to escape.--Sherry Smith

title: Sitram Profiserie 11-Quart Commercial Stainless Steel Braisier/Stewpot
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade, stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide--serious home cooks also use this cookware to advantage. On its Profiserie line's pot and pan bottoms, an aluminum disk sheathed in steel conducts heat rapidly and uniformly. Sitram cookware also goes safely into ovens and under broilers, and, designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely. The bottoms don't warp, and this cookware is stain- and corrosion-resistant. And with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. This is cookware for cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design.Braisiers such as this one offer versatility. In the oven or on top of the stove and covered with a lid (sold separately), this pan serves as a casserole to stew or braise meats, poultry, seafood, or vegetables. Popular for browning meats and rapidly reducing sauces and broths, it's also a sauté pan, a deep-frying pan, and a double-handled saucepan large enough to handle most home-kitchen tasks.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Profisserie 7-7/8-Inch Commercial Stainless Steel Fry Pan
description: This medium-size frying pan is from a line of the most distinguished cookware in and outside of France. Professionals rely on the superior heat conduction and durability. For the home cook, the surgical quality stainless steel offers a lot of eye appeal along with high performance. The Profiserie fry pan has a thick aluminum layer bonded within the stainless steel, so that it works on conventional burners as well as induction burners, which use electromagnetism to generate heat. The long, smooth handle stays cool even over high heat and it's welded to withstand the oven, broiler, and dishwasher cleaning. The polished finish will stay shining, long after you've perfected flipping an omelet without a spatula.--Lynne Sampson

title: Sitram Profiserie 9.5-Inch Commercial Stainless Steel Fry Pan
description: This 9.4-inch frying pan is from a line of the most distinguished cookware in and outside of France. Professionals rely on the cookware's superior heat conduction and durability. For the home cook, the surgical quality stainless steel offers a lot of eye appeal along with high performance. The Profiserie fry pan has a thick aluminum layer bonded within the stainless steel, so that it works on conventional burners as well as induction burners, which use electromagnetism to generate heat. The long smooth handle stays cool over high heat and it's welded to withstand the oven, broiler, and dishwasher cleaning. The polished finish will stay shining, long after you've mastered the art of sautéing without the aid of a spoon--just like the pros.--Lynne Sampson

title: Sitram Profiserie 16.5 Liter Commercial Stainless Steel Stockpot
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade, stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide--serious home cooks also use this cookware to their advantage. Designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely. It is stain- and corrosion-resistant, and with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. This is cookware for cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design.Tall and narrow to minimize evaporation, this stockpot is big enough to simmer about 4 gallons of stock, soup, stew, or pasta sauce. It's also roomy enough to deep-fry a good-size turkey or poach two or three chickens. Use it when canning large amounts of fruit or vegetables.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Profiserie 1.5quart Commercial Stainless Steel Saucepan
description: Professional-quality food requires professional equipment, starting with top-quality pots and pans such as this cookware made in France by Sitram. A smaller stainless-steel saucepan, it has a 6-1/2-inch diameter and a 1.7-quart capacity, just right for melting butter, heating liquids, or preparing tasty sauces. The bottom of the saucepan, like all Sitram pots, is made with a triple-layer construction with an aluminum core for even heating. The pot's heat-resistant handle is 7 inches long, with an oval profile and a hanging hole on the end. This saucepan is dishwasher-, stovetop-, oven-, and broiler-safe. Pair with theProfiserie 6.3-inch stainless-steel lidor theInox 6.3-inch Commercial stainless-steel lid.--Marcie Bovetz

title: William Bounds Rita Custom Combination Salt Shaker & Pepper Mill
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Salt & Pepper Mill Sets']]
description: This sturdy, 4-inch-tall, shaker/grinder offers three pepper grind settings, coarse, medium, and fine, that are changeable with a twist of a chrome adjustment ring. Unlike many balky pepper grinders, the grinding mechanism, operated by twisting the salt shaker, works smoothly, cascading ground pepper from the bottom. A knob on the chrome top unscrews so the top can be removed for refilling salt, and the salt chamber comes off to provide an opening for refilling pepper. Clear-acrylic bodies allow monitoring of both salt and pepper levels. Sleek, modern, and compact, it looks good in kitchen or dining room. Clean the mill/shaker with a damp cloth.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Catering 5.4-Quart Commercial Stainless Steel Braisier/Stewpot
Sitram Catering 11-Inch Commercial Stainless Steel Fry Pan
description: This larger frying pan is from a line of the most distinguished cookware in and outside of France. Professionals rely on the superior heat conduction and durability. For the home cook, the surgical quality stainless steel offers a lot of eye appeal along with high performance. The warp-proof pan bottom is three layers thick with a thermic copper core, the best metal for conducting heat from the flame to the food. The long handle stays cool even over high heat and it's welded to withstand the oven, broiler, and dishwasher cleaning. The polished finish will stay shining, long after you've mastered the art of sautéing without the aid of a spoon--just like the pros.--Lynne Sampson

title: Sitram Profiserie 11-Inch Commercial Stainless Steel Fry Pan
description: Because of its excellent composition of 18/10 stainless steel and a high-density alloy base, this top-quality professional French fry pan is favored by many commercial kitchens that use induction heat for cooking. When the induction cooktop is turned on, its coils produce a high-frequency alternating magnetic field that causes the molecules in the pan's base to vibrate. As a result, the pan and the food heat up super-fast.Stainless steel serves as a non-reactive cooking surface, and the stainless-steel handle stays cool longer. This superb fry pan produces an excellent fast sear for caramelizing and will serve all of your high-heat cooking needs.--Marcela Broussard

title: Sitram Profiserie 6.25-Inch Stainless Steel Lid
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade, stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide--serious home cooks also use this cookware to advantage. Designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely, and it is stain- and corrosion-resistant. And with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. This is cookware for cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design. This lid goes safely into ovens, under broilers, and through the dishwasher. Though intended to go with Sitram Profiserie pots and pans, it will fit any 6.3-inch-wide pan.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Profiserie 7 7/8-Inch Stainless Steel Lid
description: Top off Sitram's top-of-the-line Profiserie induction pans with the same high-quality stainless-steel lid that professionals use. When you need a lid for long-simmering stews, steaming, or braising, you want a tight seal. This lid will fit neatly on any 7.9-inch pan. It features a vent hole to release steam and curved welded handles that can take the heat of the oven or broiler. The polished finish won't scratch, tarnish, or corrode. After years of maintenance-free use, this utilitarian lid will look as shiny as new.--Lynne Sampson

title: Sitram Profiserie 10.6-Quart Commercial Stainless Steel Half Stockpot
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade, stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide--serious home cooks also use this cookware to advantage. On its Profiserie line's pot and pan bottoms, an aluminum disk sheathed in steel conducts heat rapidly and uniformly. Sitram cookware also goes safely into ovens and under broilers, and, designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely. The bottoms don't warp, and this cookware is stain- and corrosion-resistant. And with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. This is cookware for cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design.Known as a half-stockpot, this pot's capacity actually is about two-thirds of Sitram's full stockpot. It's big enough to simmer about 3 gallons of stock, soup, stew, or pasta sauce and roomy enough to poach two or chickens. Also use it when canning large amounts of fruit or vegetables.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Catering 11-Inch Commercial Stainless Steel Lid
description: Every pot needs a lid to tightly seal in juices over hours of slow cooking. This sturdy lid fits the Sitram Braisier/Stewpot and any other model 28 Sitram pots. The lid is made of the same heavy 18/10 stainless steel as the pot; the sturdy, stay-cool handle is welded on, and includes a lifetime guarantee against separation. A handy steam vent allows heat to escape.--Sherry Smith

title: Polder 216204 Deluxe Stainless Steel Bread Box
description: "Bread box" is a term your grandmother knows. That's where she stored her bread, cookies, and muffins--not in the refrigerator, where baked goods quickly go stale. Her bread box was likely made of tin. This one is made of steel, durable enough to survive into the next century. The bread-box principle remains as true today as it was in your grandmother's time: to stay fresh, bread and baked goods need air--but not too much. This box lets in just enough air so that loaves don't get soggy and crusts stay crisp. Like its function, the form of this box is pleasingly retro. Plenty big enough (17 inches wide by 7-1/4 inches high by 10 inches deep) to hold family-size supplies, its roll-top door opens and closes smoothly. The stainless steel on this bread box gleams. Also available incobalt blueorwhite, this is a handsome accessory for any kitchen.--Fred Brack

title: Vacu Vin Wine Saver Extra Stoppers, Set of 2
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Bar & Wine Tools', 'Wine Stoppers & Pourers', 'Wine Stoppers']]
description: Wine should breathe a little, but not overnight. Putting an end to the oxidation process, which turns a favorite Merlot into vinegar, is easy with the Vacu Vin Wine Saver. These long-lasting extra stoppers are designed to work with the vacuum-style pump (sold separately) to keep a wine fresh. Made of high-quality rubber, they won't affect the taste of the wine. And the method is simple--just place a stopper in the opening of a bottle, place the pump over the stopper, and pump air out until you feel some resistance. This process is suitable for preserving all but sparkling wines, and will save Chiantis, Syrahs, and others for up to two weeks.-- Madeleine Miller

title: William Bounds Nut Twister Nutmeg Mill, Chrome
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Pepper Mills']]
description: For flavoring white sauces, custards, baked goods, spinach, potatoes, squash, eggnog, and coffee drinks such as cappuccino, nutmeg is indispensable. The fullness of nutmeg's delicate benediction, however, is only found in fresh gratings or shavings. Preground or powdered nutmeg is a faint imitation. Grating hard, brown little nutmegs, however, imperils soft, pink little fingertips. This solid, sturdy, compact nutmeg mill eliminates the danger. Turn a smooth-action chrome crank and from a corrosion-resistant shaver in the mill's chrome bottom cascade tiny, precise nutmeg bits. And the mill comes fully stocked--five nutmegs await their turns in storage beneath a tough, clear acrylic top. Impaled on prongs, a sixth is thrust against the shaver by a strong spring. A simple twist separates the mill's top and bottom when it's time to impale another nutmeg. Band-Aids not included, because they're not needed.--Fred Brack

title: Vacu Vin 3-Piece Wine Saver Pump and Stopper, White
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Bar & Wine Tools', 'Wine Stoppers & Pourers', 'Wine Stoppers']]
description: Wine should breathe a little, but not overnight. Putting an end to the oxidation process, which turns a favorite Merlot into vinegar, is easy with the Vacu Vin Wine Saver. Made from high-quality rubber, which will not affect the taste of the wine, the Wine Saver uses a vacuum-style pump to release air to keep a wine fresh. And it's easy to use--just place a stopper in a bottle's neck, place the pump over the stopper, and pump air out until some resistance is felt. This process is suitable for preserving all but sparkling wines, and will save Chiantis, Syrahs, and others for up to two weeks.--Madeleine Miller

title: Sitram Catering 7-7/8-Inch Commercial Stainless Steel Lid
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade, stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide--serious home cooks also use this cookware to advantage. Designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely, and it is stain- and corrosion-resistant. And with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. This is cookware for cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design. This lid goes safely into ovens, under broilers, and through the dishwasher. Though intended to go with Sitram Inox pots and pans, it will fit any 7.9-inch-wide pan.--Fred Brack

title: Vacu Vin J-Hook Pineapple Easy Slicer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Fruit & Vegetable Tools', 'Corers & Pitters', 'Corers']]
description: Be sure to have this little gadget on hand for your next luau or beach party! Cutting a pineapple is normally sticky, messy work--it often takes more time than it's worth. But using this slicer is similar to using a corkscrew--you just cut off the top inch, insert the slicer's serrated edge, and twist the handle until you reach the bottom (the bottom is easy to feel even on your first use). Pull up on the handle, and the entire juicy pineapple pulls free, sliced in a long spiral that leaves the tough core behind. After cutting out the core, use the empty pineapple rind as quite a regal serving container--either for piña coladas (so yummy with fresh pineapple) or as a buffet bowl for the cut-up fruit. Aloha!--Jill Lightner

title: Sitram Catering Saucier Pan 3.35-Quart
description: French manufacturer Sitram produces commercial-grade stainless-steel cookware for restaurant, hotel, and institutional kitchens worldwide. Serious home cooks also use this cookware to advantage. On Profiserie pot and pan bottoms, an aluminum disc sheathed in steel conducts heat rapidly and uniformly. Sitram cookware goes safely into ovens and under broilers. Designed to withstand rough treatment, its bright, shiny appearance lasts indefinitely. Bottoms don't warp. It doesn't stain and resists corrosion. And with no inside rivets to clean around, it scrubs up hygienically and painlessly. For cooks who value heavy, bang-around durability over fancy design, this cookware is for you.Use this versatile pan--7.9 inches (20 cm) in diameter--to cook sauces, vegetables, soup, or rice or to heat liquids. Covered, it steams clams or mussels. At only 4 inches high, it's ideal for rapidly reducing sauces and its gently rounded sides facilitate stirring. In the oven (to 500 degrees F) or on top of the stove and covered, it functions as a casserole to stew or braise meats, poultry, seafood, or vegetables. Its long (8-1/4 inches), hollow-oval, heat-resistant handle--notched on the end for easy hanging--keeps hands away from the heat. Pair with theProfiserie 7.9-inch stainless-steel lidor theInox 7.9-inch Commercial stainless-steel lid.--Fred Brack

title: Sitram Catering 11.1-Quart Commercial Stainless Steel Stockpot
description: For cooking soups and stews, this heavy-duty Sitram stockpot is a kitchen workhorse. Simple in design, all elements contribute toward the durable function of this pot. The heavy 18/10 stainless steel is warp-proof, the copper-lined bottom gives even heat distribution and is guaranteed not to warp or separate, and sturdy, stay-cool handles are welded on to prevent food traps inside the pan. Whether it's simmering for hours with classic chicken stock, elaborate minestrone soup, or fiery chili, this pot will provide a lifetime of consistent good cooking. (Please note that the lid is sold separately.)--Sherry Smith

title: Le Creuset Enameled Cast-Iron 2-Quart Heart Casserole, Red
description: Le Creuset is famous for coating its heavy, cast-iron cookware with not just one, but two--count 'em, two--layers of enamel baked on at 1,450 degrees F, resulting in gloriously bright colors. This bright-red, heart-shaped casserole adds a note of whimsy to dishes, but its 2-quart capacity, handles, and heavy-duty construction make it practical as well. Both its interior and exterior are enameled--as are the bottoms of all Le Creuset pots and pans--to prevent scratching glass-topped stoves. The enamel surface will not react with any acidic foods and is easy to clean. The weight and nature of cast iron make for even heat distribution. This cookware gives you all the benefits of cast iron without the painstaking care.--Schuyler Ingle

title: Le Creuset Enamel-on-Steel 16-Quart Covered Stockpot, Cherry
description: This 16-quart stockpot from Le Creuset is an essential piece of equipment for any serious home cook, especially those with large-scale needs. Designed to coordinate with Le Creuset's classic line of enameled cast-iron cookware, the stockpot and lid are made of carbon steel coated with enamel; the pot has a steel rim to prevent chipping. It heats quickly and evenly--essential when reducing stocks--and the white enamel interior prevents the pot from absorbing odors and flavors so that your beef bouillon doesn't taste like the last fish stock you prepared. The glossy, colorful exterior makes it attractive enough to go from the stove directly to your table. This stockpot's sturdy construction, fine craftsmanship, and timeless design ensure that it will be an item you'll have in your kitchen for a long time.--Pamela Zytnicki

title: Le Creuset Enameled Cast-Iron 2-3/4-Quart Soup Pot, Flame
description: The mouth of this gently rounded pot measures 9 inches across, while its flat bottom is only 4 inches, allowing you to use the small burner on your stove for a relatively big pot: the wide surface area will speed any soup or stock reduction you have in mind. Cast iron, of course, has marvelous heating qualities, so heat spreads evenly from this pot's base up its sides. You can also use this soup pot in the oven; loop handles help you carry and lift even the heaviest casserole. The baked-on interior and exterior enamel coating means this pot will not react with any acidic foods and is easy to clean. The glorious enameled colors of Le Creuset's cookware makes it suitable for the table, as well.--Schuyler Ingle

title: Le Creuset Enameled Cast-Iron 7-1/2-Quart Bouillabaisse Pot, Cherry
description: Beautiful enough to bring to the table and durable enough to outlive its 101-year warranty against defects, this big pot is perfect for preparing and ceremoniously serving a bouillabaisse, soup, stew, or casserole. Made of cast iron, with an exterior and interior clad in Le Creuset's famous bright enamel, the pot holds 7-1/4 quarts and measures 12-1/2 inches at the top. Because the sides slope to a bottom of only 6-3/4 inches, the pot fits household stovetop burners. As cast iron is unexcelled for heat distribution and retention, the pot cooks foods evenly and gently without hot spots. The knob on its heavy, tight-fitting lid is ovenproof to 450 degrees F so the pot can go into the oven for casserole cooking. Loop handles facilitate carrying, and the pot is dishwasher-safe.--Fred Brack

title: Le Creuset Enameled Cast-Iron 10-1/4-Inch Square Skillet Grill, Cherry
description: By squaring this skillet and flaring its sides, famed French cookware manufacturer Le Creuset offers extra cooking room for steaks, fish, burgers, or any food that benefits from stovetop grilling and the caramelized flavor imparted by seared grill marks. The ribs in the grill's bottom not only provide those marks but also elevate foods so that fat collects between them for low-calorie cooking. Because cast iron is unmatched for heat retention and even distribution--no hot spots--foods will cook uniformly in the 10-1/4-inch-square grill. Enameled outside with a bright, smooth surface and inside with a black satin-texture finish, this is a heavy, durable grill that works on any stovetop, in the oven, or under a broiler. It's also stylish enough (think French farmhouse kitchen) to bring to the table. Though it's dishwasher-safe, hand washing preserves a patina that builds up with use and aids in the grill's stick resistance.--Fred Brack

title: Le Creuset Enameled Cast-Iron 1-3/4-Quart Traditional Fondue Pot, Flame
description: Ooh la la! Le Creuset, famous for its beautiful enameled cast-iron cookware, offers this handsome, heavyweight fondue set that is wonderful for an intimate party or romantic dinner. Made in France, whose famous Alps are dotted with dozens of authentic fondue restaurants, it turns out a delicious meal with little fuss. The trick to fondue is keeping it evenly heated for the length of a party or dinner--cheese fondue in particular separates or burns onto the pot if the temperature varies or the pot has hot spots. This fondue set, with its even conductivity of cast iron, maintains a regular, gentle heat that keeps cheese, chocolate, or other sauces smooth and well-heated. The pot rests above a heavy, black cast-iron stand, which shelters an adjustable alcohol burner. Brightly colored, sturdy and charming, this is a set to be passed down through many generations of cooks. --Maria Dolan

title: Le Creuset Enameled Steel Stock Pot with Lid, Cherry
description: Poach chickens, simmer stocks, cook pasta, or prepare a vegetable soup or  classic chili in this tall, narrow, 8-quart stockpot with a tight-fitting lid. Made of  heavy-gauge steel and double-coated with hard, bright enamel, the stockpot coordinates  with Le Creuset's famed enameled cast-iron cookware in the French manufacturer's  handsome colors and is as at home in the dining room as a serving vessel as it is in the  kitchen on the stovetop or in the oven. The lid has a plastic knob that is ovenproof to 450  degrees F. Fitted with a steel rim to prevent chipping, the pot is durable enough to outlive  its 101-year warranty against defects and goes safely into the dishwasher and refrigerator.--Fred Brack

title: Le Creuset Stoneware 10-1/2-Inch Oval Baking Dish, White
description: It's easy to prepare recipes ahead of time in this oval baking dish: take it right out of the freezer, put it in a cold oven, then heat as high as 500 degrees F. Or use the dish under the broiler or in the microwave. You can even serve directly from this colorful, pleasing cookware, making a statement with both food and style. The easy-to-clean enameled stoneware resists chipping and staining, and will not absorb odors or flavors. Its generous, sure-grip handles make it easy to carry a hot dish from oven to table.--Schuyler Ingle

title: Le Creuset Square Skillet Grill Pan
description: By squaring this skillet and flaring its sides, famed French cookware manufacturer Le Creuset offers extra cooking room for steaks, fish, burgers, or any food that benefits from stovetop grilling and the caramelized flavor imparted by seared grill marks. The raised ribs in the grill's bottom not only provide those marks but also help excess fat and grease drain away from food for lower-calorie cooking.Because cast iron is unmatched for heat retention and even heat distribution (no hot spots), foods will cook uniformly in the 10-1/4-inch-square grill. The unit's exterior provides a colorful, long-lasting enamel that resists chipping and cracking, while its inside offers a durable black enamel finish (no seasoning required). The grill also provides a sturdy, integrated handle with an opposite helper handle for secure transport, as well as dual nondrip spouts--one on each side to accommodate left- and right-handed pouring. Even more, the grill works on any stovetop, in the oven, or under a broiler. It's also stylish enough (think French farmhouse kitchen) to bring to the table. Though it's dishwasher-safe, hand washing preserves a patina that builds up with use and aids in the grill's stick resistance. The skillet grill measures approximately 11-3/4 by 16-3/4 by 2 inches and carries a limited lifetime warranty.--Fred Brack

title: Le Creuset Enameled Cast-Iron 2-1/4-Quart Pumpkin Casserole, Flame
description: Beautiful enough to bring to the table and durable enough to outlive its  101-year warranty against defects, this heavy, 2-1/4-quart casserole is shaped like  an orange pumpkin, perfect for preparing and ceremoniously serving a vegetable  stew or other festive dish. Suitable for the oven or for browning meat and  sweating vegetables on gas, electric, induction, or ceramic ranges, and  delightful to behold on the countertop when not in use, the casserole is made of  cast-iron and clad inside and out in Le Creuset's famous bright enamel, which  won't absorb odors or flavors and readily scrubs clean. As cast-iron is  unexcelled for heat distribution and retention, the casserole cooks foods evenly  and gently without hot spots. The knob on its heavy, tight-fitting lid is  ovenproof to 450 degrees F. Handles facilitate carrying, and the casserole is  dishwasher-safe. Like all of Le Creuset's renowned cookware and bakeware, it's  made in France.--Fred Brack

title: Le Creuset Stoneware 2-1/4-Quart Pitcher, Cherry
description: You'll want to pour something festive from this colorful Le Creuset stoneware pitcher. Its porcelain enamel glaze is baked on at high heat, allowing it to go from the freezer to the microwave or even the oven (to 500 degrees F). Mix up a frosty batch of sangria or some steaming Irish coffee--either way, this pitcher's generous lip and handle makes pouring graceful and drip-free. The capacity of the pitcher is 2qt.  The actual size of the pitcher is 2 1/4qt. What little cleanup remains is easily taken care of in the dishwasher.--Schuyler Ingle

title: Le Creuset Enamel-on-Steel 12-Quart Covered Stockpot, Cherry
description: Le Creuset has added this enamel-coated carbon-steel accessory line to its famous enamel-coated cast-iron cookware collection. The new line features the same bright colors, but not as much weight--something to consider when you're trying to lift 12 quarts of hot liquid off the stove, even with two handles. Though lighter than cast iron, the heavy-gauge steel distributes heat evenly across the bottom and up the sides of the pot for even cooking and reduction of soups and stocks, and rapid boiling of water for cooking pasta. No kitchen should be without at least one big stockpot, and Le Creuset's new version is a stylish, practical option.--Schuyler Ingle

title: Le Creuset Stoneware 14-Inch Oval Baking Dish, Cherry
description: It's easy to prepare recipes ahead of time in this long, deep, oval baking dish: take it right out of the freezer, put it in a cold oven, then heat as high as 500 degrees F. Or use the dish under the broiler or in the microwave--you can almost hear the cheese and cream bubbling in the potatoes au gratin. You can even serve directly from this colorful, pleasing cookware, making a statement with both food and style. The easy-to-clean enameled stoneware resists chipping and staining, and will not absorb odors or flavors. Its generous, sure-grip handles make it easy to carry a hot dish from oven to table.--Schuyler Ingle

title: Le Creuset Enameled Cast-Iron 5-1/2-Quart Round French Oven, Red
description: This 5-1/2-quart French oven by Le Creuset is the most forgiving pan I've ever used. If you just happen to forget you're sautéing onions for a soup while you answer the telephone, there's no need to worry--the onions won't burn. Enameled cast iron has been recognized as one of the best materials available for cookware because it retains heat and promotes gentle, even cooking at low heat ensuring that the best flavor is brought out from the ingredients. It's perfect for use on any heat source--gas, electric, radiant, ceramic, halogen, induction, or solid fuel. There's also a tight-fitting, enameled cast-iron lid that helps seal in heat and flavor. Food will be kept hot as you bring it to the table for serving. And you will certainly want to serve out of this beautiful piece--the deep color and shiny finish will brighten any table setting.--Jane DePaolo

title: Baby TY - BUNNYBABY the Bunny
description: Bunnybaby is the kind of stuffed animal that becomes a little  one's beloved best friend, a cherished comfort object to drag  everywhere from dawn to dusk. This lightweight, softly stuffed bunny,  from the makers of Beanie Babies, is made of a wonderfully fuzzy fabric  that's as soft as velvet and machine washable--as a baby's best bunny  should be. The pale blue bunny has an encased rattle inside, black  embroidered eyes, thread whiskers, and pink nose, paws, tail, and ears.  Those long floppy ears are just the right size for a toddler to grab on  to for toting Bunnybaby around.--Marcie Bovetz

title: Baby TY - MONKEYBABY the Monkey
description: Monkeybaby wants to monkey around to entertain your favorite  baby, who will enjoy exploring the incredibly soft, fuzzy fabric and  the gentle rattle sound from the rattle encased deep inside the stuffed  monkey's puffy body. This cuddly critter has black embroidered eyes, a  lavender body, and pink hands, feet, face, ears, and tail (with a knot  at the end of the long tail that's just right for carrying Monkeybaby  around upside down). Its lightweight body is designed to be in a seated  position, with front arms held out ready for a hug or a game of  peekaboo. Monkeybaby is machine washable, so you can keep that pretty  lavender-and-pink fur clean even if lunch was mashed bananas.--Marcie Bovetz

title: Roshco 100-Piece Plastic Cookie Cutter Set
description: With 100 shapes to choose from, this cookie cutter set offers kids the perfect combination of fun and education. Placing the cutters in their various categories, for example, is a playful exercise that teaches abstract logic and builds confidence. Categories include letters, numbers, geometric forms, animals, plants, vehicles, symbols (such as a  dollar sign and a question mark), seasonal themes, and miscellaneous shapes such as an umbrella and a bell. The cutters are formed of stiff, durable plastic, are colorful and fascinating enough to be used outside the kitchen, and are dishwasher-safe. A tip to grandparents: keep this set handy as a special treat, unique to your home, for little visitors.--Fred Brack

title: Peugeot PM03524 Paris Classic 9 Inch Wood Pepper Mill, Natural
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Pepper Mills']]
description: This versatile, traditionally shaped pepper mill can go from kitchen counter to dining room table. It's 9 inches tall and includes a grinding mechanism--made by Peugeot--in its base that is activated by turning the round knob on the top of the mill. A little brass knob perches on the very top--unscrew it to fill the center compartment with your favorite kind of peppercorns. This pepper mill is also available in dark walnut; matching salt mills can also be purchased.--Marcie Bovetz

title: Peugeot 0870418/SME Paris Classic 7 Inch Salt Mill, Natural
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Salt & Pepper Mill Sets']]
description: Paris pepper and salt mills from Peugeot, traditionally styled of turned beechwood, enjoy the classic look of mills used by fine restaurants, especially the impressive 16-inch model. The difference between the salt and pepper mills lies in the grinding mechanism. Peugeot pepper mills use case-hardened-steel grinding heads with two sizes of grooves; the larger grooves crack the peppercorns in half and direct them into the smaller grooves, which grind them much more finely than most mills. The grinding mechanism in Peugeot salt mills is purposefully constructed with 18/10 stainless-steel, which won't corrode from prolonged contact with the salt. The top of each mill unscrews for adding peppercorns and salt, while the round ball nut can be loosened or tightened to vary the coarseness of the grind.Paris pepper and salt mills make exceptional gifts individually or as a set. The mills come in a wide range of heights, from 4-3/4 to nearly 20 inches, and in a variety of finishes, including matte chocolate and natural wood, and a shiny blue, yellow, or red lacquer. Care for a mill is easy: clean the exterior and inner chamber with a damp cloth; never immerse in water; avoid putting salt in the pepper mill, or grinding green or pink peppercorns by themselves (mixed with black is fine); and avoid damp types of salt (usually pink or gray) in the regular salt mill. Made in France, Peugeot mills are covered by a two-year replacement policy, while the grinding mechanism is covered by a lifetime warranty. Peugeot has been a leading manufacturer of pepper mills since the 1840s, and is a brand preferred by many restaurants and chefs.--Ann Bieri

title: Snow River 14-by-18-Inch Gripper Carving Board
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Cutting Boards']]
description: Snow River's sturdy hardwood cutting board is excellent for large cutting and carving jobs. The drip trough at the edge extends to a ring in the middle of the board, insuring that whatever is being cut won't get soggy from its own juices. Ideal for carving roasts, this board is also good for chopping up juicy tomatoes. Hand washing with mild detergent and occasional oiling with mineral oil is recommended for a long life, and the stainless-steel gripper ring set into the back of the cutting board makes it easy to carry.--Julija Gelazis

title: Peugeot 870418/SME/1 Paris Classic 7 Inch Salt Mill, Chocolate
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Salt Mills']]
description: Paris pepper and salt mills from Peugeot, traditionally styled of turned beechwood, enjoy the classic look of mills used by fine restaurants, especially the impressive 16-inch model. The difference between the salt and pepper mills lies in the grinding mechanism. Peugeot pepper mills use case-hardened-steel grinding heads with two sizes of grooves; the larger grooves crack the peppercorns in half and direct them into the smaller grooves, which grind them much more finely than most mills. The grinding mechanism in Peugeot salt mills is purposefully constructed with 18/10 stainless-steel, which won't corrode from prolonged contact with the salt. The top of each mill unscrews for adding peppercorns and salt, while the round ball nut can be loosened or tightened to vary the coarseness of the grind.Paris pepper and salt mills make exceptional gifts individually or as a set. The mills come in a wide range of heights, from 4-3/4 to nearly 20 inches, and in a variety of finishes, including matte chocolate and natural wood, and a shiny blue, yellow, or red lacquer. Care for a mill is easy: clean the exterior and inner chamber with a damp cloth; never immerse in water; avoid putting salt in the pepper mill, or grinding green or pink peppercorns by themselves (mixed with black is fine); and avoid damp types of salt (usually pink or gray) in the regular salt mill. Made in France, Peugeot mills are covered by a two-year replacement policy, while the grinding mechanism is covered by a lifetime warranty. Peugeot has been a leading manufacturer of pepper mills since the 1840s, and is a brand preferred by many restaurants and chefs.--Ann Bieri

title: Peugeot 870418/1 Paris Classic 7-Inch Pepper Mill, Chocolate
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Pepper Mills']]
description: Pepper is universal. One of the civilization's oldest spices (along with its partner salt), it graces tables all over the world. When in a country where I don't speak the language and my soup needs a little pick-me-up, I just mime grinding pepper over it, and the waiter knows what I need. This wooden pepper grinder from Peugeot comes in a classic style, reminiscent of a rook from a chess set. To fill, unscrew the knob on top, remove the upper section, and pour in the peppercorns. How tightly the knob is screwed back on determines the grind. For a little variety, try a mix of black, green, and white peppercorns. Be sure to also check out the matching salt grinder.--Dana Van Nest

title: Emsa 34-Ounce Melody Quick Tip Carafe, White
description: Keep any beverage hot or cold for 14 to 16 hours--and when you're ready for a refill, this sturdy little pot has a most convenient lever for easy pouring. The solid base, lightweight construction, and large handle make it perfect for family-friendly gatherings--it's easy even for elementary-schoolers to handle. The plain, glossy exterior makes wiping it down a cinch. (As with all vacuum pots, you won't want to put it in the dishwasher.) The asbestos-free glass interior makes it a bit on the fragile side, but the sturdy plastic exterior is solid enough that it can take some bouncing around. Whether you're keeping lemonade icy cold or coffee piping hot, this carafe is a handy appliance for patio or home office use.--Jill Lightner

title: KitchenAid GMA Grain Mill Attachment for Stand Mixers
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: Cooking from scratch is made easier with a stand mixer, and made all the more literal with this grain mill attachment. Use it to make flour out of wheat, corn, rye, oats, rice, buckwheat, barley, and millet--any low-moisture, non-oily grain (peanuts and coffee are a no-no with this tool). Make up to 10 cups at a time. The mill is sturdy, heavy, and easy to assemble and attach to the mixer's hub. Adjust the knob to the desired grind, fill the unit with grains, and crank it up to 10. When you're through, brush it clean with the small brush included in the kit. If you need to, wash it by hand, but don't put it in the dishwasher.--Betsy Danheim

title: Kitchenaid Pasta Roller Attachment
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Pasta & Pizza Tools', 'Pasta Makers & Accessories']]
description: Fits all KitchenAid stand mixers. Includes roller, fettuccine attachment and linguini attachment.

title: KitchenAid Water Jacket
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: No need for serious bakers to race the clock any more with this KitchenAid water jacket. The jacket attaches to a 5-quart stand mixer and cools or warms the ingredients in the bowl as needed. For whipping cream, fill it with ice. To keep potatoes hot while you whip them, use hot water. With two latches that attach snugly to the bowl handles on a mixer, the stainless-steel jacket doesn't scoot around the counter. When you're finished whipping or mixing, hand wash it with mild detergent.--Emily Bedard

title: KitchenAid KBC90N Mixer Bowl Covers for Pivot Head Stand Mixer Bowls, Set of 2
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: These covers sit securely over the bowl of a 4-1/2-quart KitchenAid stand mixer, so you can store your mixer attachments in the bowl but keep them out of site. Use them, too, to cover cool-rise yeast doughs or leftover cookie batters, mashed potatoes, and more. These clear, lightweight lids make it easy to keep extras in the fridge. Dishwasher-safe, but only on the top rack.--Betsy Danheim

title: KitchenAid KBC5N Mixer Bowl Covers for 5-Quart Stand Mixer Bowls, Set of 2
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: These covers sit securely over the bowl of a 5-quart KitchenAid stand mixer, so you can store your mixer attachments in the bowl but keep them out of site. Use them, too, to cover cool-rise yeast doughs or leftover cookie batters, mashed potatoes, and more. These clear, lightweight lids make it easy to keep extras in the fridge. Dishwasher-safe, but only on the top rack.--Betsy Danheim

title: KitchenAid SSA Sausage Stuffer Kit Attachment for Food Grinder
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: Use these lightweight plastic tubes to stuff your home-ground meats into natural casings for hand-made sausages. The small tube shoots out breakfast-sausage-size links; the larger one is great for boudin blanc, Italian sausage, and more. Each works in conjunction with KitchenAid's food grinder attachment, and the set comes with instructions for handling and stuffing casings. Tubes are dishwasher-safe.--Betsy Danheim

title: KitchenAid JE Citrus Juicer Stand Mixer Attachment
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Fruit & Vegetable Tools', 'Manual Juicers']]
description: This attachment turns your KitchenAid stand mixer into a citrus juicer, eliminating the need for a second appliance that would take up valuable kitchen storage and counter space. Its four parts--heavy-duty aluminum shaft, reamer, shield, and strainer--are easy to assemble and attach to the stand mixer's powerful motor. Turn the mixer speed to level 6, and the reamer maintains a fast and steady spin. Press your fruit halves against it, and the juice pours out. You do have to exert a bit of pressure to extract all of the juice, but it's certainly not difficult to use. The strainer basket holds back the pulp and seeds as the juice flows into your pitcher.--Betsy Danheim

title: KitchenAid K45SBWH Bowl for Pivot Head Stand Mixer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: When mixing up big batches of cookies or bread with a KitchenAid mixer, you don't want to have to stop to wash the bowl. An extra bowl to fit the mixer is a welcome addition to a kitchen arsenal, and this bowl earns its place in the cupboard, because it will also be used as a versatile mixing bowl independent of the mixer. It's made of thick polished stainless steel with a brushed steel interior and a flat base to rest securely on the counter. I has a sturdy handle and two brackets for fitting into the mixer. Its superb quality will last through a lifetime of cooking.--Marcie Bovetz

title: KitchenAid FGA Food Grinder Attachment for Stand Mixers
description: This tool increases the fun factor of your KitchenAid stand mixer several times over. Toss cubes of meat into the food tray, stomp 'em down, and watch the results wriggle out the front. Grind your own beef or chicken for patties or tacos. Blend your own sausage mixtures, from breakfast to boudin blanc. With additional attachments, you can turn it into a pasta maker or a sausage stuffer. It's easy to assemble and use. Most parts are dishwasher-safe; hand wash the grinding blades, food stomper, and cutting knife.--Betsy Danheim

title: KitchenAid FT Food Tray Attachment for Stand Mixers
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: This handy tool increases the amount of food you can have poised to stomp into the food grinder or fruit and vegetable strainer, so you spend less time reloading. It fits snugly in place and cleans up easily--either hand wash or toss it onto the top rack of the dishwasher.--Betsy Danheim

title: KitchenAid RVSA Slicer/Shredder Attachment for Stand Mixers
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: This attachment performs the cutting and shredding duties your food processor might: select the proper cone, slip it into the plastic housing, and attach all to your stand mixer's hub with a metal shaft. You can shred potatoes, onions, nuts, and chocolate, or slice vegetables for cooking or munching. While it adds versatility to your mixer, the unit is cumbersome to disassemble--more so than KitchenAid's other nifty attachments--and its several parts make it difficult to store. Still, it's easier on your arms than manual slicing and shredding, especially for large quantities, and all parts are dishwasher-safe.--Betsy Danheim

title: KitchenAid KHM7T 7-Speed Artisan Hand Mixer, White
description: Pound for pound, a good hand mixer is perhaps the most laborsaving  kitchen device. While my grandmother relied on arm strength and force of will to  beat a stiff dough or to mash potatoes, a light and easily maneuvered hand mixer  saves time and muscles. This one from KitchenAid features seven-speed digital  touch control for precision mixing, and an electronic sensor that will adjust  the power as you go, so you maintain a steady mixing speed. If you're beating a  delicate batter, you can use the Soft Start feature and ease into faster speed.  When you're finished, the beaters are easily ejected. If you've ever battled  heavy doughs, you'll appreciate the beaters' design: they don't have a center  post, so dough won't collect in the middle of the beater and clog the machine.  It's also designed for easy cleaning.--Laura Cuthbert

title: Vic Firth 2" x 10" Barrel Rolling Pin
description: Take yourself back to Grandma's house with this classic maple rolling pin. It flawlessly rolls many kinds of dough, including that for old-fashioned sugar and ginger bread cookies. Because its solid carved handles provide easy gripping, you'll have no problems with uneven rolls or tearing dough. Though lacking the heft of the marble variety, this rolling pin is of medium weight and should be ideal for small projects and pliable doughs.--Teresa Simanton

title: KitchenAid K5ASBP Bowl for 5-Quart Professional Stand Mixer
description: When mixing up big batches of cookies or bread with a KitchenAid mixer, you don't want to have to stop to wash the bowl. An extra bowl to fit the mixer is a welcome addition to a kitchen arsenal, and this bowl earns its place in the cupboard, because it will also be used as a versatile mixing bowl independent of the mixer. It's made of thick polished stainless steel with a brushed steel interior and a flat base to rest securely on the counter. It has a sturdy handle and two brackets for fitting into the mixer. Its superb quality will last through a lifetime of cooking.--Marcie Bovetz

title: KitchenAid KPS2CL Pouring Shield for 4-1/2 and 5-Quart Stand Mixers
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: Suitable for KitchenAid's 4-1/2-quart and 5-quart stand mixers,  this shield fits on the mixing bowl to prevent ingredients from  splattering out when they're added while the mixer operates. A chute  for adding ingredients forms one side of the shield, which otherwise  comprises a partial cap for the mixing bowl. The shield is made of  rugged plastic and is dishwasher-safe.--Fred Brack

title: KitchenAid FVSP Fruit and Vegetable Strainer Parts for Food Grinder
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: For use with all KitchenAid household stand mixers, these parts add a strainer function to the KitchenAid food grinder accessory (which is not included). Cooks who have the food grinder will find the strainer to be a valuable addition. Like the grinder, the strainer turns many tough kitchen chores into walks in the park. It converts cooked apples and pears into sauces for preserving or immediate consumption. Freezer jams are a snap; so is fresh tomato sauce. Baby foods can be made in quantity and frozen. The strainer assembles and disassembles quickly and easily without tools, and most parts are dishwasher-safe.--Fred Brack

title: KitchenAid K45SSWH K45SS Classic 275-Watt 4-1/2-Quart Stand Mixer, White
description: Classic Series Stand Mixer. Perfect for kitchens of all sizes, the classic series stand mixer delivers the power and durability to mix large batches. 8 cup flour power. Powerful 275W motor. Versatile 10-speed control. Durable, direct drive transmission. Multipurpose attachment hub with removable metal cover. Sturdy, all-metal construction. Easy-access, tilt-head design. Accommodating 4-1/2 quart, brushed stainless steel bowl. C dough hook. Dishwasher safe, nylon-coated flat beater, and dough hook. Stainless steel wire whip. Industry´s best beater-to-bowl coverage with 67-point planetary mixing action. Standard 115V AC, 60 Hz, 3-wire cord, 3-prong plug. Dimensions: 14-3/32" D. x 13-29/32" H. x 8-21/32" W. White with silver trim band.

title: KitchenAid FPPA Mixer Attachment Pack for Stand Mixers
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: This assortment of attachments makes your KitchenAid stand mixer as flexible as a Swiss army knife. You get a food grinder, slicer/shredder, and the fruit/vegetable strainer. Pull out the first and you're grinding meat, breadcrumbs, and more; the second churns out sliced vegetables for potato chips, coleslaw, and the like, or shredded potatoes for hash browns; and the third has you whipping up apple butter in a snap. Each has its own instruction booklet, with tips and recipes. An excellent gift set for your favorite stand-mixer fan.--Betsy Danheim

title: KitchenAid KB3SS 3-Quart Stainless Steel Bowl for Pivot Head Stand Mixers
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: When mixing up big batches of cookies or bread with a KitchenAid mixer, you don't want to have to stop to wash the bowl. An extra bowl to fit the mixer is a welcome addition to a kitchen arsenal, and this bowl earns its place in the cupboard, because it will also be used as a versatile mixing bowl independent of the mixer. It's made of thick polished stainless steel with a brushed steel interior and a flat base to rest securely on the counter, and has two brackets for fitting into the mixer. Its superb quality will last through a lifetime of cooking.--Marcie Bovetz

title: KitchenAid KHM5DH 5-Speed Ultra Power Hand Mixer, White
description: Professional chefs have long sung the praises of the KitchenAid stand mixer. Now, KitchenAid has designed a product specifically for the home baker with this five-speed hand mixer. Very portable, this mixer allows you to roam the kitchen and mix at will. Its powerful yet lightweight motor maintains consistent beater speed even in heavy mixtures and won't bog down. The mixer comes with traditional beaters and also dough hooks for raised yeast doughs--simply change attachments to mix heavy bread doughs and delicate whites all with the same machine. Designed with nonclogging air vents, the mixer is easy to clean because smooth, sleek surfaces have no seams or grooves that trap ingredients.
