title: Tilt-Head 6-Wire Whip KitchenAid® Wire Whip for Tilt Head Stand Mixer (Fits models KSM150, KSM152, KSM155)
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: The 6-wire whip quickly incorporates air into ingredients for fluffy whipped cream, perfect boiled frostings and cakes with whipped egg whites. Fits on 4.5 qt mixers and some 5 qt mixers listed below: models K45SS, KSM75, KSM95, KSM150PS, KSM152PS and KSM155GB.

title: Fiesta 1-Quart Large Bowl, Sunflower
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Serveware', 'Serving Bowls & Tureens', 'Serving Bowls']]
description: Serve up any side dish that comes along in this sturdy and attractive 1-quart Fiestaware bowl. With subtle ridges and a sturdy lip to prevent spilling, the bowl comes in handy at almost any meal. Fill it with fruit for breakfast, corn chips for lunch, and pasta for dinner. With a raised foot for minimum heat contact underneath, the dish measures 8-1/4 inches in diameter and is 2-1/2 inches deep at its center. It can go from your microwave to your dishwasher--stopping at your table, of course--with no problem. Finished in a sunflower yellow lead-free glaze, the bowl blends in with other colors of Fiestaware.--Emily BedardEditor's note: This item is being retired by the manufacturer and its availability may be limited.

title: Fiesta Rangetop Salt and Pepper Set, Sunflower
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Salt & Pepper Shaker Sets']]
description: Designed for stylish, high-speed seasoning, this pair of Fiestaware salt and pepper shakers are both useful and handsome. The set is constructed from high-fired vitrified china with the company’s signature curves and a gleaming lead-free glaze. The handles make for easy gripping at the stove, where hands are often wet or in a hurry. Like the rest of the Fiestaware line, the pair is safe in the dishwasher. Each shaker stands 4-1/2 inches high.--Emily Bedard

title: KitchenAid K45B Flat Beater Replacement for KSM90 and K45 Stand Mixer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: Mix up your favorite desserts with KitchenAid's flat beater. This nylon-coated attachment fits 4-1/2-quart KitchenAid stand mixers. The beater is perfect for mashing potatoes, mixing cake batter and cookie dough, and so much more.

title: Fiesta 2-1/4-Inch Salt and Pepper Set, Sunflower
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Salt & Pepper Shaker Sets']]
description: First manufactured in 1936 during art deco's later, less ornate phase, Fiestaware went out of production in the 1970s, returned in the 1980s, and now enjoys unprecedented popularity. Older pieces fetch hundreds and even thousands of dollars at auctions. The new line offers the original designs in contemporary colors at affordable prices. With signature concentric rings around the tops, these 2-1/4-inch-high salt and pepper shakers mix and match with other Fiestaware dinnerware. Made of vitrified china with a gleaming, lead-free glaze, the shakers are dishwasher-safe.--Fred Brack

title: Fiesta 2-Quart Serving Bowl, Sunflower
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Serveware', 'Serving Bowls & Tureens', 'Serving Bowls']]
description: Fiestaware splashes the table with every color in the rainbow, and then some. Classic in design with concentric rings, this 10-3/4-by-3-inch bowl mixes and matches with other Fiestaware colors and generously serves up two quarts of pasta, organic greens, or fresh fruit salad.Made in the USA by the Homer Laughlin China Company, all Fiestaware produced since its reintroduction in 1986 is dishwasher-, oven-, and microwave-safe, colored with lead-free glaze, and fully vitrified to result in chip-resistant china durable enough for restaurant use. Fiestaware’s timeless designs first appeared in 1936, and have been popular with collectors ever since.--Ann Bieri

title: Fiesta 10-1/4-Inch Deep Dish Pie Baker, Sunflower
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Pie, Tart & Quiche Pans', 'Pie Pans']]
description: Fiestaware splashes the table and kitchen with every color in the rainbow, and then some. Classic in design with a fluted rim, this 10-inch pie baking dish can be matched with Fiestaware dessert plates to colorfully serve up that favorite rhubarb, chocolate chess, or coconut cream pie.Made in the USA by the Homer Laughlin China Company, all Fiestaware produced since its reintroduction in 1986 is dishwasher-, oven-, and microwave-safe, colored with lead-free glaze, and fully vitrified to result in chip-resistant china durable enough for restaurant use. Fiestaware’s timeless designs first appeared in 1936, and have been popular with collectors ever since.--Ann Bieri

title: POOF-Slinky 33202BL Ideal Rack N' Roll Bowling Game with Spring-Loaded Launcher and Automatic Ball Return, 5-Foot Lane
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Serveware', 'Serving Bowls & Tureens', 'Serving Bowls']]
description: Rack 'N' Roll Bowl

title: KitchenAid K45DH Dough Hook Replacement for KSM90 and K45 Stand Mixer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliance Parts & Accessories', 'Mixer Parts & Accessories']]
description: KitchenAid C Dough Coated Hook - K45DHThis coated dough hook mixes and kneads yeast dough, saving both time and effort of hand-kneading. It fits all KitchenAid tilt-head stand mixers (models: K45, K45SS, KSM75, KSM90, KSM95, KSM100, KSM103, KSM110).View the full line of KitchenAid Dough Hook Attachment Collection here.Features:Coated hook C-shaped design Fits all KitchenAid tilt-head stand mixers

title: Taylor 9878E Commercial Slim Waterproof Pocket Thermometer
description: First-rate in all respects, this instant-read digital thermometer is ideal for household cooks. Because it's digital, you don't need to insert it deeply for an accurate reading--just 1 inch will do--and the reading is updated every 2 seconds. Its extra-wide temperature range is -58 to 500 degrees F (-50 to 260 degrees C), with a switch to select Fahrenheit or Celsius. Buttons recall maximum/minimum temperatures, and the memory persists even when the thermometer is turned off.  It features the new FDA recommended 1.5mm step-down probe tip. The Safe-T-Guard sleeve incorporates a non toxic chemical compound that inhibits the growth of pathogens which minimizes cross contamination.The thermometer operates on a replaceable watch battery (included), and can be recalibrated for long-life precision.

title: Fiesta 5-Ounce Mini Disk Pitcher, Turquoise
description: This minidisk pitcher holds 4 3/4 ounces and epitomizes the stylized, bold art deco design of Fiestaware, first introduced in 1936 and resuscitated in 1986 after a 13-year hiatus. The body of the pitcher is accented with Fiestaware's signature concentric rings and resembles a flattened ball or disk, with one catch: the top right corner of the disk is missing, replaced by a handle completing the perimeter of the round disk. Other design elements stand out to make this pitcher a unique find: the pouty lip, small oval pouring hole, and square hole on the top of the pitcher are bold twists. Perfect for individula beverage servings or as a creamer, this casual pitcher matches over 50 additional Fiestaware pieces in various colors, so you can mix and match pieces to create a personalized set.--Emily Wolf

title: Fiesta 5-Ounce Mini Disk Pitcher, White
description: This minidisk pitcher holds 4 3/4 ounces and epitomizes the stylized, bold art deco design of Fiestaware, first introduced in 1936 and resuscitated in 1986 after a 13-year hiatus. The body of the pitcher is accented with Fiestaware's signature concentric rings and resembles a flattened ball or disk, with one catch: the top right corner of the disk is missing, replaced by a handle completing the perimeter of the round disk. Other design elements stand out to make this pitcher a unique find: the pouty lip, small oval pouring hole, and square hole on the top of the pitcher are bold twists. Perfect for individula beverage servings or as a creamer, this casual pitcher matches over 50 additional Fiestaware pieces in various colors, so you can mix and match pieces to create a personalized set.--Emily Wolf

title: Bodum Chambord 12 cup French Press Coffee Maker, 51 oz, Chrome
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso', 'Coffee Makers', 'French Presses']]
description: The Chambord is Bodum’s original coffee press design, which the company began to mass produce in 1982 after acquiring a small factory in Normandy where craftspeople made these presses by hand. Bodum takes great care to instill the same quality in craftsmanship, and the result, according to coffee purists, is a brewing machine that produces a taste and aroma superior to any electric coffeemaker. The secret is that the grounds are able to steep in boiling water for about 4 minutes before they are pressed with the plunger, producing a richer, full-bodied flavor. The glass carafe on this Chambord model holds a maximum of 48 ounces or 12 cups of brewed coffee or tea, making it a useful size for entertaining or for all-day-long drinkers. The chrome-plated brass frame and lid and stainless-steel plunger are durable and will hold up to years of brewing. For easy cleaning, the carafe and all its parts go right into the dishwasher. Replacement parts are available from the manufacturer.--Cristina VaamondeFrom the ManufacturerWhen Bodum took over a small clarinet factory in Normandy in 1982, it was not because of the fine orchestra clarinets they were producing. In addition to musical instruments, the factory also produced the coffee of a relatively unknown brewer called "The Chambord." Bodum combined the skills of these Normandy craftspeople with modern production. The result was a unique culinary tool, affordable to the many who loved the taste of what we now know as French press coffee.Thanks to Bodum, and thanks to the increasing need for better coffee, the French press coffeemaker has become one of the most popular in the world. Yet the design has not strayed a bit from the original drawings, and Bodum still makes the Chambord with the same painstaking care and knowledge they gained from those Normandy craftspeople years ago. The ease of brewing and the delicious smell and taste of French-roasted dark coffee have remained unchanged.Awards and AccoladesIn 2004 the Bodum Chambord coffee press received the American Culinary Institute's award for best French press coffeemaker.The American Culinary Institute judges food preparation products such as mixers, waffle makers, and electric teakettles. These products are judged on criteria important to consumers such as ease of use, safety, and the quality of the food produced. The institute also judges food preparation products used in restaurants and hotels, including institutional mixers, large-volume coffee machines, and food slicers.Instructions for Use1. Place pot on a dry, flat, nonslip surface. Hold handle firmly, then pull the plunger straight up and out of the pot.2. For each 1.25-deciliter/4-ounce cup, put 1 rounded tablespoon or 1 Bodum scoop of coarse-ground coffee into the pot.Caution:Use only coarse-ground coffee. Fine grind can clog the filter and create high pressure. Place coffeemaker on a heatproof, nonslip surface.3. Pour hot (not boiling) water into the pot. Leave a minimum of 2.5 centimeters/1 inch of space at the top. Stir the brew with a plastic spoon.Caution:Metal spoons can scratch or chip the glass beaker and cause breakage.4. Place the plunger unit on top of the pot. Turn lid to close off the pour spout opening. (Does not apply to the Brazil models.) Do not press down. Let the coffee brew for at least 4 minutes.5. Hold the pot handle firmly, with the spout turned away from you, then using just the weight of your hand, apply slight pressure on top of the knob to lower the plunger straight down into the pot. Lowering the plunger slowly with minimal pressure produces best results. If the filter clogs or it becomes difficult to push down the plunger you should remove the plunger from the pot, stir the brew, and then slowly plunge again.WARNING:Using excessive force can cause scalding liquid to shoot out of the pot.6. Turn the lid to open the pour spout and then pour coffee.7. Unscrew the filter assembly and clean the plunger unit after each use. All parts are dishwasher-safe.Safety InstructionsNot for stovetop use.Check glass beaker for scratches, cracks, or chips. Do not use a pot that is scratched, chipped, or cracked. Install a replacement beaker before using the pot again.Keep children away while using. Hot water is a hazard to small children!Do not allow children to use this coffeemaker.Scald HazardExcessive plunging force can cause scalding hot liquid to shoot out of pot.Do not plunge with force.Turn lid to close spout.Use only coarse-ground coffee.Company HistoryIn 1944 Peter Bodum, the father of today's owner, Joergen Bodum, started Bodum in Copenhagen. Times were difficult at the end of World War II; there was hardly any trade and people were out of work. Peter Bodum managed to wholesale a very small variety of housewares products by Danish manufacturers.After the war Peter Bodum got an import license for kitchen and tabletop products; he traveled all over Europe and ended up importing kitchen and housewares to Denmark. As in the rest of Europe in those days, a lack of products in Denmark meant a market existed for almost anything to be sold. He specialized in glassware from Eastern Europe.In the '50s Peter Bodum started developing his own products. He collaborated with the Danish architect Kaas Klaeson for a range of coffeemakers. At the time, industrial-design-type kitchen products were very rare. The first Bodum product to hit the market in 1958 was the Santos coffeemaker--based on a vacuum coffee brewing system. It became an instant sensation not only in Denmark but in all of Europe. Bodum still produces the original Santos design to this very day.Bodum grew steadily during the '60s, but sadly, in 1967, at the age of only 57, Peter Bodum passed away. His wife managed the company until 1974, when she offered her 26-year-old son Joergen to join her in the management of the company. Joergen quickly brought on board Carsten Joergensen--then a teacher at the Danish School of Art in Copenhagen--and soon put him in charge of overall design for Bodum, including everything from products to corporate design, exhibitions, shops, buildings, catalogs, and advertising. It turned out to be a very long and fruitful collaboration. The two men began to fulfill Bodum's credo--"good design doesn't have to be expensive"--in lots of different ways.In 1974 the first fruit of Joergen and Carsten's collaboration was introduced: the French coffee press Bistro. It was also the first incorporation of the new Bodum design language--beautiful simplicity and excellent materials for everyday life. Many more variations of coffee presses followed. Since 1974, Bodum has produced over 50 million French presses, taken the leap from "coffee" to "kitchen," and developed and produced a large variety of beautiful household and tabletop designs.In 1979, when he took over the company, Joergen Bodum decided to move to Switzerland in order to be more centrally located in Europe. He chose the Lucerne area, where Bodum's head office has been located since the early '80s.In 1980 Bodum Switzerland and its design unit, Pi-Design, were founded. Then, in 1986, the opening of Bodum's first shop in London marked another milestone in the Bodum history. It was designed not only to be the perfect showcase for the large variety of Bodum products but to embody an even stronger presentation of Bodum as an international brand. Many more shops in many more cities all over the world followed: Paris, Copenhagen, Zurich, Lucerne, Tokyo, New York, Dallas, Okinawa, Auckland, and many more. To this day there are 52 Bodum stores worldwide.With more and more of its own stores in place, Bodum continued broadening its collection of beautifully designed everyday life products--from kitchen to home. Today Bodum offers its customers everything from the latest coffee- and tea-making products to tabletop, kitchen, storage, textiles, bathroom, and home office products. Some stores also have a café where Bodum's own selection of coffees and teas are served.The Bodum Group is, and always has been, a 100 percent family-owned business. Today the company operates in 14 different countries with over 700 employees worldwide. Bodum has holding companies in Denmark and Switzerland as well as 12 sales companies, 3 production companies, and a design company called Bodum Design Group, located in Switzerland.

title: Bodum Assam 17-Ounce Tea Press
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Serveware', 'Beverage Serveware', 'Teapots & Coffee Servers', 'Teapots']]
description: Who knows more about tea than the British? When the British Tea Council asked Bodum to develop a new way of brewing tea, the result was this unique press that's almost as much fun to look at as it is to use. Simply fill the strainer with tea leaves and add boiling water--a slow process, but well worth the time. (You could also use tea bags, but why would you want to?) The clear jug lets you see the tea as it's steeping, allowing you to customize its strength to your taste. When the tea is strong enough, slowly depress the plunger to stop the brewing. You won't have any tea leaves to read at the bottom of your cup, but there's no mess and no need to remove the strainer before you pour. But be forewarned: the Bodum press doesn't retain heat quite as well as a traditional teapot, so you might want to use a tea cozy if you're not drinking the whole pot in one sitting. It's a shame to cover up such a beautiful design, but that's the way the tea leaf tumbles.--Mary Park

title: CHAMBORD Coffee maker, 3 cup, 0.35 l, 12 oz
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso', 'Coffee Makers', 'French Presses']]
description: Bodum 1923-16USC Bodum Chambord 3 Cup Coffee Press 12 Oz..   When Bodum took over a small clarinet factory in Normandy in 1982. It   was not because of the fine orchestra clarinets they were producing but   because of a relatively unknown coffee maker called the Chambord which they,   by coincidence, produced as well.   They combined the skills of these Normandy craftsmen with modern   production, and the price became affordable to the many people who loved the   taste of the coffee brewed in this unique coffee maker, later known as the   French press coffee brewer. Thanks to Bodum and thanks to the increasing   need for better coffee, the French press coffee maker became one of the most   popular coffeemakers in the world. The design has not changed a bit from the   original drawings, and Bodum still makes the Chambord with the same   painstaking care and knowledge they learned from those proud craftsmen in   windy Normandy.   The ease of brewing, the delicious smell and taste of French roasted   dark coffee have not changed.

title: Kaiser Bakeware Noblesse 10-Inch Non-stick Angel Food Cake Pan
description: Made of heavy-gauge steel for gentle, uniform heat  distribution, this angel food cake pan wears an exceptionally durable,  double-layered nonstick coating inside and out. That means it readily  releases angel food cakes and other delicate baked goods and cleans up  easily. Because it's black, the pan absorbs heat for quicker baking.  The pan measures 10-3/4 inches in diameter and 4-1/2 inches deep. It's  warp-resistant and carries a 3-year warranty against defects. Though  the pan is dishwasher-safe, hand washing is recommended to extend the  nonstick coating's life.--Fred Brack

title: Kaiser Bakeware Mini Loaf Tray
description: Designed to produce six little loaves of bread or cakes at  once, this pan is made of steel for gentle, uniform heat distribution  and coated inside and out with nonstick so it quickly releases loaves  and cleans up easily. Because it's black, the pan absorbs heat for  better browning and quicker baking. It's perfect for making crusty  loaves of cornbread or banana bread, almond cakes, and even rectangular  muffins and sticky buns. The loaf forms measure 4-1/4 inches long,  2-1/2 inches wide, and 1-3/4 inches deep. Overall, the pan is 15 inches  long and 10-1/4 inches wide. Though the pan is dishwasher-safe, hand  washing is recommended to extend the nonstick coating's life.--Fred  Brack

title: Kaiser Bakeware Mini Springform Pans, Set of 4
description: Perfect for individual quiches and cheesecakes, the four little  springform pans in this set are made of heavy-gauge steel for gentle,  uniform heat distribution. They're clad in an exceptionally durable,  double-layered nonstick coating inside and out; that means they readily  release baked goods and clean up easily. The pans are 4-1/2 inches in  diameter and 1-1/2 inches deep, warp-resistant, and carry a five-year  warranty against defects. Their buckles are guaranteed for life. Hand  washing the pans is recommended to extend the nonstick coating's life.  Included with the pans are recipes for a salmon quiche and an orange  cheesecake.--Fred Brack

title: Kaiser Bakeware Madeleine Pan
description: Designed to produce 12 of the light, spongy little cakes known  as madeleines (and immortalized by Marcel Proust), this pan is made of  steel for gentle, uniform heat distribution and coated inside and out  with nonstick so it quickly releases the fragile madeleines and cleans  up easily. Because it's black, the pan absorbs heat for better browning  and quicker baking. The madeleine forms with their scallop-shell  indentations measure 3 inches long and can be used for forming any type  of bun or cake. Overall, the pan is 15 inches long and 10-1/4 inches  wide. Though the pan is dishwasher-safe, hand washing is recommended to  extend the nonstick coating's life. A recipe for madeleines is  included.--Fred Brack

title: Fein 921072K13 Step Adaptor
description: This is a step adaptor for the 1-1/4-inch hose on the Fein vacuums.  The adaptor reduces from  1-1/4-inch down to 1-inch.  This allows Fein's hose to adapt to different sized dust ports on tools from different manufacturers.  The rubber adaptor can be cut to the correct step size for the tool's dust port.

title: Wusthof 10-Inch Sharpening Steel
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Knife Sharpeners']]
description: This tool serves a vital role in the kitchen by realigning, or  resetting, a knifes' edges, which bend this way and that when  contacting a cutting surface. (Often called a sharpening steel, or  butcher steel, a steel doesn't actually sharpen a knife--unless it's a  diamond steel.) Consisting of a rod of hard steel-alloy and a tough  synthetic handle, this steel works as well as any. A loop facilitates  hanging it close at hand so the steel can be employed often: before  each use is ideal to prevent a blade from becoming dull and prolong  intervals between professional sharpenings. The rule is that a steel  should be at least as long as the knife blade being drawn across it;  this steel's 10-inch rod is sufficient for nearly all household knives.  The steel carries a lifetime warranty against defects.--Fred  Brack

title: Wusthof 4183-7 Wusthof Classic 7-Inch Santoku Knife, Hollow Edge
description: Tough polypropylene handles with full, visible tangs and the traditional three rivets distinguish Classic knives from Wusthof's other cutlery lines. Otherwise Classic knives are identical to other Wusthof knives, embodying all the virtues that have earned the German manufacturer world renown. The principal parts of a Wusthof knife--blade, bolster, and tang--are forged from a single piece of high-carbon stainless steel, and the blade is precisely tapered from bolster to tip and from back to hand-honed edge. The blades and beautifully formed bolsters are not as thick as on some knives. As a result, despite their heft, strength, and durability, Wusthof knives are pleasingly delicate and marvelously balanced in action.This 7-inch santoku is a Japanese cook's (or chef's) knife, featuring a low-tip style with a broad blade. The cutting edge is minimally curved, so it provides less rocking action than a European-style cook's knife. For straight-down slicing and precise chopping, however, it's superb. Alternating hollows on each side of the blade create air pockets, allowing slices to fall away cleanly. This knife should be hand washed.

Beautifully balanced, this cleaver has a comfortably long handle plus a blade "eye" for hanging when it's not in use.Part of the Classic series, this cleaver represents two centuries of unexcelled Wüsthof craftsmanship. Like other cutlery in the series, it's hand-forged from a single piece of stainless steel for maximum strength; the hand-polished blade is exactingly calibrated to be hard enough to resist dulling yet soft enough to take a keen edge when it's honed or sharpened. Dishwasher-safe and with a traditionally shaped, ergonomically designed handle that is triple-riveted for durability, this cleaver brings a guaranteed lifetime of low-maintenance cutting to its owners.--Arthur Boehm

title: Wusthof Classic Ikon two piece starter set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Cutlery Sets', 'Boxed Knife Sets']]
description: Forged from 1 piece of specially tempered steel. Perfectly balanced alloyed steel, exceptional sharpness. Advanced rounded handle design for comfort and control. Perfect chefs knife starter set for any kitchen job. Ultra-hard African Blackwood handle - wash by hand. Set includes 3.5-inch paring knife and 8-inch cooks knife.

title: Wusthof Grand Prix II 10-Inch Honing Steel
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Knife Sharpeners']]
description: Following a few simple steps to sharpen your valuable knives with this honing steel from Wüsthof's premier line, Grand Prix, will keep the blades as sharp as new for a lifetime. Sharper knives are safer because they don't slip and require less effort to use. To sharpen, hold the steel in your left hand (reverse if you are left-handed) and simply slide the knife blade down the steel at a 20-degree angle. It takes only a few strokes, and you won't believe the difference. This steel sharpens all blades from small to large, including shears. Peer into the private kitchens of professional chefs, and chances are you'll see Wüsthof cutlery.--Amy Adams

title: Wusthof Culinar 8-Inch Cook's Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', "Chef's Knives"]]
description: Elegant satin-finish handles sculpted from 18/10 stainless steel distinguish Culinar  knives from Wüsthof's other cutlery lines. Otherwise Culinar knives embody all the virtues  of other Wüsthof knives that have earned the German manufacturer world renown. The  principal parts of a Wüsthof knife--blade, bolster, and tang--are forged from a single piece  of high-carbon stainless steel, and the blade is precisely tapered from bolster to tip and from back  to hand-honed edge. Blades and beautifully formed bolsters are not as thick as some knives'. As a  result, despite their heft, strength, and durability, Wüsthof knives are pleasingly delicate  and marvelously balanced in action. This 8-inch cook's knife (or chef's knife) is the ideal size for  most cooks. Its curved blade makes rocking through a chopping, dicing, or mincing task a joy.  Like all fine knives, this cook's knife should be hand washed.--Fred Brack

title: Wusthof Culinar 2-Piece Carving Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Carving Knives & Forks', 'Carving Sets']]
description: Elegant satin-finish handles sculpted from 18/10 stainless steel distinguish Culinar  cutlery from Wüsthof's other cutlery lines. Otherwise Culinar knives embody all the virtues  of other Wüsthof knives that have earned the German manufacturer world renown. The  principal parts of a Wüsthof knife--blade, bolster, and tang--are forged from a single piece  of high-carbon stainless steel, and the blade is precisely tapered from bolster to tip and from back  to hand-honed edge. Blades and beautifully formed bolsters are not as thick as some knives'. As a  result, despite their heft, strength, and durability, Wüsthof knives are pleasingly delicate  and marvelously balanced in action. With its long, narrow blade, the 8-inch knife in this carving  set neatly slices a roast, ham, or turkey into serving portions, while the 11-inch fork (6-inch  prongs) holds everything firmly in place. Like all fine cutlery, this knife and fork should be hand  washed.--Fred Brack

title: Wusthof Culinar 5-Inch Tomato Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Specialty Knives', 'Tomato Knives']]

This 5-inch classic tomato knife has a serrated blade for  neatly slicing soft-skinned vegetables and fruits and spearing the slices. Like all fine knives, this  tomato knife should be hand washed.--Fred Brack

title: Wusthof Classic 3-Inch Serrated Paring Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Bread & Serrated Knives', 'Serrated Utility Knives']]
description: This knife's small size and serrated edge make it ideal for cutting citrus and other fruit peels. It can also be used for sectioning grapefruit and other small cutting chores, such as coring.Part of the Classic series, this knife represents two centuries of unexcelled Wusthof craftsmanship. Like other cutlery in the series, it's hand-forged from a single piece of stainless steel for maximum strength; the hand-polished blade is exactingly calibrated to be hard enough to resist dulling yet soft enough to take a keen edge when it's honed or sharpened. Dishwasher-safe and with a traditionally shaped, ergonomically designed handle that is triple-riveted for durability, this knife brings a guaranteed lifetime of low-maintenance cutting to its owners.

title: Wusthof Classic 8-Inch Bread Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Bread & Serrated Knives', 'Bread Knives']]
description: The pronounced serration of this knife's blade is ideal for cutting through tough crusts without undue pressure. The knife's length and triangular tip make it perfect for slicing both long and round loaves. Cooks frustrated by bread knives that tear crusts or send crumbs flying will welcome this efficient worker.Part of the Classic series, the knife represents two centuries of unexcelled Wusthof craftsmanship. Like other cutlery in the series, it's hand-forged from a single piece of stainless steel for maximum strength; the hand-polished blade is exactingly calibrated to be hard enough to resist dulling yet soft enough to take a keen edge when it's honed or sharpened. Dishwasher-safe and with a traditionally shaped, ergonomically designed handle that is triple-riveted for durability, the knife brings a guaranteed lifetime of low-maintenance cutting to its owners.

title: Black & Decker EHC650 2-Speed Food Chopper with 3-Cup Bowl
description: This electric food chopper accomplishes a food processor's principal function of chopping and mincing without having to haul out the big machine. It's just 8 inches high and 4-3/4 inches in diameter, and its 3-cup bowl is ample for many chores in a family household and most chores in a one or two-person household. At 150 watts, the motor is powerful enough to chop or mince vegetables, fruits, herbs, cheese, nuts, chocolate, cooked meats, and bread. The power head has a soft grip for easy one-handed use. The rugged, plastic bowl; its slip-resistant base, which doubles as the bowl's lid for storing food; and the stainless-steel blade are all dishwasher-safe.--Fred Brack

title: Proctor-Silex 75217F Power Can Opener Black
description: Tall enough to open a 7-inch-high can, this electric can opener is as  practical as it is stylish. It has a knife sharpener in the rear as well as  push-in cord storage, allowing for tidiness on the counter. The cutting lever  removes for easy cleanup. Clad in gleaming black plastic, the opener measures  8-7/8 inches high, 4-1/4 inches wide at the base, and 3-1/2 inches deep. When  operating, a magnet flips down and grips the top of the can, then lifts it off  when the can is removed.--Fred Brack

title: Proctor-Silex 75224F Power Opener Can Opener
description: Tall enough to open a 7-inch-high can, this electric can opener is as  practical as it is stylish. It has a knife sharpener in the rear as well as  push-in cord storage, allowing for tidiness on the counter. The cutting lever  removes for easy cleanup. Clad in gleaming white plastic, the opener measures  8-7/8 inches high, 4-1/4 inches wide at the base, and 3-1/2 inches deep. When  operating, a magnet flips down and grips the top of the can, then lifts it off  when the can is removed.--Fred Brack

title: Health-o-meter HDR900KD01 Digital scale with LED Display
description: The simple white-on-white design of this digital platform  scale from Health-o-meter makes it a fresh, clean note in any bathroom  décor. Constructed from durable steel, the 300-pound capacity  scale features a smart foot mat with horizontal ribs that wipe off  easily and keep you from slipping. Conveniently sized, the LED display  provides a large, easy-to-read digital weight measurement and alerts  you when the 9-volt battery's low. With raised bumpers to protect your  floor, the unit stands just 2-1/2 inches off the floor, for a nonbulky  profile. Though it measures a compact 10-1/4 by 10 inches, the scale's  efficient display design still leaves ample room for standing.  Health-o-meter backs it up with a five-year limited warranty.--Emily Bedard

title: Libbey 16-Piece Imperial Glassware Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Glassware & Drinkware', 'Mixed Drinkware Sets']]
description: Ideal for stylish entertaining, this set of 16 matching glasses  equips a bar to serve many cold drinks, from Scotch on the rocks to  mint juleps. The set consists of eight tall, 18-ounce cooler glasses  and eight short, 13-ounce double old-fashioned glasses in Libbey's  contemporary Imperial pattern. Made of medium-thick glass, the glasses  have slender, raised flutings that rise from the four corners of the  bases. The 6-3/4-inch cooler glasses measure 2-7/8 inches in diameter  at the tops, flare in the middle, and taper slightly to 2-1/8 inches  square at the bottoms. The 2-5/8-inch double old-fashioned glasses  measure 3-1/2 inches in diameter at the tops, also flare in the middle,  and taper slightly to 2-3/4 inches square at the bottoms. The glasses  are durable and dishwasher-safe.--Fred Brack

title: Black & Decker DCM18S Brew 'n Go Personal Coffeemaker with Travel Mug
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso', 'Coffee Makers', 'Coffee Machines']]
description: Great for commuters, office professionals, and one-coffee-drinker households, this personal coffeemaker brews 15 ounces of coffee directly into a stainless-steel travel mug. The mug has a rubber handle for a safe grip and a lid to keep coffee hot. It's tapered to a 2-1/2-inch-diameter bottom, so it fits most vehicle cup holders. The coffeemaker itself is designed for an on-the-go coffee drinker. It has a permanent filter--no messy disposable paper filters required--and shuts off automatically after brewing. The mug, filter, filter basket, and mug lid are dishwasher-safe, and the coffeemaker can also be used to heat water for tea, hot chocolate, and instant foods like oatmeal and soup. Made of gleaming black plastic, it measures 9-3/4 inches high, 7 inches wide, and 6 inches deep, and  carries a one-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Waring Pro FS800 Electric Food Slicer
description: Designed to slice almost every edible in a kitchen, this  professional quality food slicer from Waring makes quick work of meats,  cheeses, breads, fruits, and vegetables. The slicer's premium  stainless-steel and die-cast aluminum construction promises dependable,  long-lasting performance. Moreover, it's safe, with nonslip operation  and an aluminum food guide to keep hands and fingers away from the  blade. The smooth-edged 7-1/4-inch stainless-steel blade is perfectly  balanced and adjusts with a clearly marked width-control dial ranging  from 1/32-inch to 1/2-inch. You can slice pepperoni paper-thin or cut a  loaf of French bread into appetizer-size rounds. With comfortable,  textured handles, the slicer is easy to use, and Waring makes cleanup  as simple as possible with a scratch-resistant finish and a pivoting  food guide. The slicer weighs 13-1/4 pounds, has a 14-by-8-1/2-inch  footprint, and stands on suction cup feet to ensure stable operation.  The motor comes with a five-year limited warranty.--Emily  Bedard

title: Proctor-Silex Belgian Waffle Baker, Family Size, 26050
description: For those occasions when every family member clamors at once for a  Belgian waffle, this inexpensive waffle iron meets the challenge, turning out  four at once. Then it quickly heats up again (a green light shines when the  perfect temperature is achieved) and makes four more, each 4 by 4-1/2 inches and  blessed with the deep indentations that hold so much butter, syrup, and fruit.  Because the grids are nonstick and the exterior is hard plastic, the waffle iron  cleans easily. It also stands up for compact storage until the following weekend  arrives and waffle appetites again reach their peak. The 1,200-watt waffle iron  measures 11-1/2 inches wide, 5 inches high, and 12-3/4 inches deep. It carries a  two-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Libbey Stockholm Pilsner Glasses, Set of 4
description: Enjoy the full color of your favorite beer in these tall  weighted pilsner glasses. At 14 ounces, each 9-1/2-inch glass easily  holds a full bottle of ale with plenty of clearance. The smooth lip and  wide 3-1/8-inch base make these pilsners the beer drinker's elegant  answer to the wine glass. With a 1-1/4 inches of solid glass at the  base, the glasses are tip-resistant and feel comfortably weighted in  the hand. When you've drained your last drink for the evening, just pop  them in the dishwasher.--Emily Bedard

title: Libbey  4-Piece Heidelberg Beer Mug Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Cups, Mugs & Saucers', 'Coffee Cups & Mugs']]
description: Holding 16 ounces each, these heavy mugs are shaped for serving  beer in traditional style. They're made of thick glass, so you can   frost them in the freezer and then use them to keep beer cold to the  last swig. Though the mugs' insides are perfectly round, the exteriors  have 10 facets. Perfect for root beer floats as well as beer, the mugs  measure 9-1/8 inches high and 3-3/8 inches in diameter. They're durable  and dishwasher-safe.--Fred Brack

title: Wusthof Classic 5-Inch Cook's Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', "Chef's Knives"]]
description: Cook's knives are indispensable kitchen helpers. They perform a wide  variety of cutting chores, from mincing to dicing and slicing. The 5-inch blade  of this definitive example provides sufficient heft to allow the knife rather  than the cook to do most of the cutting labor; it's modest blade length makes it  particularly useful for small chopping jobs, slicing, and cubing. Many people  favor a cook's knife of this size because it combines the maneuverability of a  paring knife with the strength and weight of a larger cook's knife.Part of the Classic series, the knife represents two centuries of unexcelled  Wüsthof craftsmanship. Like other cutlery in the series, it's hand-forged  from a single piece of stainless steel for maximum strength; the hand-polished  blade is exactingly calibrated to be hard enough to resist dulling yet soft  enough to take a keen edge when it's honed or sharpened. Dishwasher-safe and  with a traditionally shaped, ergonomically designed handle that is  triple-riveted for durability, this knife brings a guaranteed lifetime of  low-maintenance cutting to any cook who owns it.--Arthur Boehm

title: Wusthof Classic 6.3-Inch Hollow Edge Euro-Utility Knife (16cm)
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Utility Knives']]
description: Tough polypropylene handles with full, visible tangs and the  traditional three rivets distinguish Classic knives from Wüsthof's  other cutlery lines. Otherwise Classic knives are identical to other  Wüsthof knives, embodying all the virtues that earn the German  manufacturer world renown. The principal parts of a Wüsthof knife-- blade, bolster, and tang--are forged from a single piece of high-carbon  stainless steel, and the blade is precisely tapered from bolster to tip  and from back to hand-honed edge. Blades and beautifully formed  bolsters are not as thick as some knives'. As a result, despite their  heft, strength, and durability, Wüsthof knives are pleasingly delicate  and marvelously balanced in action.With its narrow blade, this 6-inch utility knife neatly slices lunch  meat, cheese, vegetables, and large fruits as well as carves a roast,  ham, or turkey into serving portions. Alternating hollows on each side  of the blade create air pockets, allowing slices to fall away cleanly  and permitting thinner slicing. Like all fine knives, it should be hand  washed with the care a lifetime investment deserves.--Fred  Brack

title: Libbey 6-Piece Rhinelander Pilsner Set
description: Holding 23 ounces each, these six large glasses are shaped for  serving pilsner-style beer the proper way, with plenty of room for  creamy heads. The glasses are made of medium-thick glass and have heavy  bases for stability. They stand 9-1/4 inches high on  2-3/4-inch-diameter bases. The glasses are durable and dishwasher-safe.--Fred  Brack

title: Wusthof Carving Knife 4524-7/23
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Carving Knives & Forks', 'Carving Knives']]
description: Tough polypropylene handles with full, visible tangs and the traditional three  rivets distinguish Classic knives from Wüsthof's other cutlery lines. Otherwise  Classic knives are identical to other Wüsthof knives, embodying all the virtues that  have earned the German manufacturer world renown. The principal parts of a  Wüsthof knife--blade, bolster, and tang--are forged from a single piece of high- carbon stainless steel, and the blade is precisely tapered from bolster to tip and from back  to hand-honed edge. Blades and beautifully formed bolsters are not as thick as some  knives'. As a result, despite their heft, strength, and durability, Wüsthof knives are  pleasingly delicate and marvelously balanced in action.With its long, narrow blade, this 9-inch carving knife neatly slices a roast, ham, or turkey  into serving portions. Alternating hollows on each side of the blade create air pockets,  allowing slices to fall away cleanly and permitting thinner slicing. Like all fine knives, it  should be hand washed.--Fred Brack

title: Fiesta 6-3/8-Inch Small Pie Plate, Turquoise
description: Fiestaware splashes the table and kitchen with every color in the rainbow, and then some. Classic in design with a fluted rim, this 6-inch pie-baking dish can be matched with Fiestaware dessert plates to colorfully serve up that favorite rhubarb, chocolate chess, or coconut cream pie.Made in the USA by the Homer Laughlin China Company, all Fiestaware produced since its reintroduction in 1986 is dishwasher-, oven-, and microwave-safe, colored with lead-free glaze, and fully vitrified to result in chip-resistant china durable enough for restaurant use. Fiestaware’s timeless designs first appeared in 1936, and have been popular with collectors ever since.--Ann Bieri

title: Oenophilia Label Lift
description: Perfect for the wine lover, this Oenophilia Label Lift offers a great way to remove and save your wine labels. Label Lift splits the printed surface of the paper from the adhesive backing leaving a laminated label to place into wine journals. Contents of this pack will remove 10 labels, and it makes a great gift.

title: Wusthof Classic 10-Inch Hollow Edge Carving Knife
description: Tough polypropylene handles with full, visible tangs and the traditional three  rivets distinguish Classic knives from Wüsthof's other cutlery lines. Otherwise  Classic knives are identical to other Wüsthof knives, embodying all the virtues that  have earned the German manufacturer world renown. The principal parts of a  Wüsthof knife--blade, bolster, and tang--are forged from a single piece of high- carbon stainless steel, and the blade is precisely tapered from bolster to tip and from back  to hand-honed edge. Blades and beautifully formed bolsters are not as thick as some  knives'. As a result, despite their heft, strength, and durability, Wüsthof knives are  pleasingly delicate and marvelously balanced in action.With its long, narrow blade, this 10-inch knife neatly cuts the biggest ham into thin slices.  It also can be used for roasts, poultry, and smoked salmon. Alternating hollows on each  side of the blade create air pockets, allowing slices to fall away cleanly and permitting  thinner slicing. Like all fine knives, it should be hand washed.--Fred Brack

title: Aquis Microfiber Body Towel, Waffle, White (29 x 55-Inches)
description: Aquis towels are made of Aquitex, a super absorbent material woven from ultrafine microfibers.  The technology behind our microfiber towel enables water to be drawn from hair and skin more quickly and thoroughly than other towels.  And it's especially gentle on hair and skin.  Designed to be lightweight, compact and durable, Aquis towels are ideal for everyday use at home, at the gym and while traveling.

title: Wusthof Classic 6-Inch Flexible Boning Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Boning & Fillet Knives']]
description: The thin and narrow yet flexible blade of this knife makes it perfect for working around the delicate bone structures of small fowl, such as squab. Unlike many other boning knives, this one has a full bolster so your cutting hand is protected as you work.Part of the Classic series, the knife represents two centuries of unexcelled Wusthof craftsmanship. Like other cutlery in the series, it's hand-forged from a single piece of stainless steel for maximum strength; the hand-polished blade is exactingly calibrated to be hard enough to resist dulling yet soft enough to take a keen edge when it's honed or sharpened. Dishwasher-safe and with a traditionally shaped, ergonomically designed handle that is triple-riveted for durability, this knife brings a guaranteed lifetime of low-maintenance cutting to any cook who owns it.

title: Farberware Classic Stainless Steel Yosemite 8-Cup Coffee Percolator
description: At the first morning sip you'll say, “Forget the espresso maker!” True connoisseurs know that the best coffee comes from a freshly percolated pot. This classic stainless steel model will provide long lasting beauty. Why not start an 'old tradition' with Sunday morning coffee in bed?

title: Nordic Ware Platinum Nonstick Cast Aluminum Tartlette Pan
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Pie, Tart & Quiche Pans', 'Tart Pans']]
description: Made of heavy cast aluminum for excellent heat conductivity,  this pan bakes 12 little fluted tarts, cakes, custards, or muffins. The  pan's heat-reflective exterior ensures they will be uniformly browned.  The pan can also be used for molding individual salads and chilled  desserts. The interior is coated with durable nonstick material, so  food releases easily and hand washing in soapy water cleans the pan  quickly. Each cavity holds 1/4 cup batter, and the pan measures 13-1/2  by 9-1/2 inches. Exceptionally durable, it carries a 20-year warranty  against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Nordic Ware Pro Cast Bavaria Bundt Pan
description: Made of heavy cast aluminum for excellent heat conductivity,  this ornately fluted pan is ideal for baking festive cakes. The pan's  heat-reflective exterior ensures the cakes will be uniformly browned.  It's also perfect for molding salads and chilled desserts. The interior  is coated with durable nonstick to ensure fluting details remain when  food is released and to provide for easy hand washing in soapy water.  The pan measures 9 inches in diameter and holds 10 to 12 cups.  Exceptionally durable, it carries a 20-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Farberware Aluminum Nonstick 4-Cup Egg Poacher Skillet
description: Ideal for eggs Benedict or corned beef hash, this  pan poaches four perfectly shaped eggs at once and, when  the egg cup tray is removed, also serves as an 8-inch  skillet. For easy cleanup, the pan and the tray are  nonstick both inside and out. The cups lift out of the tray  with easy-grip handles so eggs can be served with care.  Both the lid's knob and the pan's handle are highly  polished 18/10 stainless steel. The handle is hollow to  stay cool on the stovetop, nicely rounded on its underside  for comfort, and has a notch in the end to facilitate  hanging on a hook or peg.--Fred Brack

title: Nordic Ware 2-Burner Nonstick Reversible Grill Griddle, 20 by 10-3/4 Inch
description: Made of heavy cast aluminum to heat evenly and hold heat  effectively, this big grill/griddle has one grooved side for searing  tasty marks into steaks, burgers, ribs, seafood, and vegetables, and  one flat side for cooking pancakes, eggs, and hash browns. Both sides  are coated with durable nonstick for easy food release and effortless  cleanup. The grill/griddle measures 19-1/2 by 11 inches and spans two  burners--perfect for family-size meals. The grill/griddle has handles  on two corners with holes to facilitate hanging on a hook or peg, and  each side has a well to hold draining grease. The grill/griddle won't  rust or warp, and washes up quickly in soapy water. It carries a  10-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Wusthof Classic 8-Inch Wide Cook's Knife
description: Cook's knives are indispensable kitchen helpers. They perform a wide variety of cutting chores, from mincing to dicing and slicing. The wide, heavy 8-inch blade of this example provides more heft than narrower models, which makes it a particularly efficient worker. It's large triangularly shaped blade is ideal for chopping and can be used to carry minced or cubed ingredients to waiting pans or bowls. This is the knife to buy if you want extra blade heaviness without undue knife length.Part of the Classic series, the knife represents two centuries of unexcelled Wusthof craftsmanship. Like other cutlery in the series, it's hand-forged from a single piece of stainless steel for maximum strength; the hand-polished blade is exactingly calibrated to be hard enough to resist dulling yet soft enough to take a keen edge when it's honed or sharpened. Dishwasher-safe and with a traditionally shaped, ergonomically designed handle that is triple-riveted for durability, this knife brings a guaranteed lifetime of low-maintenance cutting to any cook who owns it.

title: Bodum Santos Stovetop Glass Vacuum 34-Ounce Coffee Maker
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso', 'Coffee Makers', 'Single-Serve Brewers']]
description: As beautiful as sculpture, as fascinating as chemistry, and as  entertaining as theater, this coffeemaker from Switzerland converts the  ordinary process of brewing coffee into an artful performance. And it  makes six 5-ounce cups of full-flavored coffee while it entrances. The  coffeemaker fits together like this: water goes into the carafe, a  filter fits into the mouth of a tube in the top globe, ground coffee  goes into the globe (a scoop is included), the globe fits atop the  carafe with the tube extending into the carafe, and the carafe goes  onto the stovetop with a trivet or heat diffuser between it and  electric or gas heat. (This is all much simpler and quicker than it  sounds.)Water boils up through the tube into the globe and brews the coffee.  When brewing is complete and the carafe has been taken off the stovetop  and set into its accompanying sculpted trivet, the coffee drains  through the filter into the carafe. The globe can then be lifted off  the carafe and set on its stand, and coffee can be poured from the  carafe, which has a stay-cool handle. A stopper for the carafe keeps  second cups warm while the first cups are sipped. Fully assembled, the  coffee maker stands 11-1/2 inches high. It's made of heat-resistant  glass and durable, gleaming nylon, and all parts are dishwasher-safe.--Fred Brack

title: Wusthof Classic 10-Inch Wide Cook's Knife
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', "Chef's Knives"]]
description: Cook's knives are indispensable kitchen helpers. They perform a wide variety of cutting chores, from mincing to dicing and slicing. The wide, extra-heavy 10-inch blade of this example provides powerful heft, which makes it a particularly efficient worker. Its large triangularly shaped blade is ideal for chopping and can be used to carry minced or cubed ingredients to waiting pans or bowls. This second largest wide cook's knife in the series, this is the knife to buy if you want extra blade heaviness and size, a combination that equals fast, efficient, effortless cutting.Part of the Classic series, the knife represents two centuries of unexcelled Wusthof craftsmanship. Like other cutlery in the series, it's hand-forged from a single piece of stainless steel for maximum strength; the hand-polished blade is exactingly calibrated to be hard enough to resist dulling yet soft enough to take a keen edge when it's honed or sharpened. Dishwasher-safe and with a traditionally shaped, ergonomically designed handle that is triple-riveted for durability, this knife brings a guaranteed lifetime of low-maintenance cutting to any cook who owns it.

title: Farberware Classic Stainless Steel Teakettles 2-Quart Whistling Sonoma
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Coffee, Tea & Espresso', 'Coffee Makers', 'Coffee Machines']]
description: This gleaming teakettle brings 2-quarts of water to a boil under the attractive curve of its dome, which is complemented by the curve of the nearly round handle for an elegant touch. The handle is synthetic (to stay cool) and slightly textured, a combination ensuring safe, comfortable pouring. Because the teakettle is made of highly polished 18/10 stainless steel, the beauty of its gleaming mirror finish is long-lasting. For convenience when filling the kettle or pouring, the spout's cap is spring-loaded, with the trigger opening the cap located inside the handle. The cap contains a whistle that signals when the water boils.--Fred Brack

title: Nordic Ware Non-Stick Cast Aluminum Fleur De Lis Bundt Pan
description: Made of heavy cast aluminum for excellent heat conductivity,  this ornately fluted pan is ideal for baking festive cakes. The pan's  heat-reflective exterior ensures the cakes will be uniformly browned.  It's also perfect for molding salads and chilled desserts. The interior  is coated with durable nonstick to ensure fluting details remain when  food is released and to provide for easy hand washing in soapy water.  The pan measures 9 inches in diameter and holds 10 to 12 cups.  Exceptionally durable, it carries a 20-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: Riedel Vinum Extreme Bordeaux/Cabernet Wine Glass, Set of 4
description: Made in Europe by the world's most renowned wine-glass maker  Riedel Crystal, founded in 1756, the four large glasses in this set are  ideal for Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, and full-bodied red Bordeaux  wines like Cabernet Franc. The glasses are from Riedel's Vinum Extreme  series, which are distinguished by their bowls' dramatically flared  diamond shape. The glasses provide an exceptionally wide evaporation  surface, thereby intensifying wines' bouquet and silky texture. The  glasses are machine-blown of 24 percent lead crystal and conform to  Riedel's exacting standards: colorless, transparent, and thin-walled,  with lips cut and polished so wine flows smoothly onto the tongue.  These glasses are 9-3/4 inches high and hold 30-3/8 ounces.Though glasses shaped and sized for different types of wine seem  commonplace today, when Riedel introduced this idea in 1961 it was  revolutionary. Since then Riedel has continued fine-tuning glasses to  bring out the best characteristics in wines and spirits. Varying bowls'  shapes and sizes affects the position of the head when sipping and  where wine first contacts the tongue's various taste zones. Riedel  crystal is used by fine restaurants all over the world and thus must  stand up to frequent trips through a dishwasher. But because lead  crystal has a soft, coarse surface to convey intense aromas, Riedel  recommends the glasses be hand washed.--Fred Brack

title: Riedel Vinum Extreme Pinot Noir/Burgundy Wine Glass, Set of 4
description: Founded in 1756, Europe's Riedel Crystal is the world's  premier manufacturer of wine glasses. The Vinum Extreme series of  glasses are machine-made of diamond-shaped 24 percent lead crystal.  These glass shapes, with a unique angular look, dramatic oversized  bowls, and extra-tall stems, were introduced in 1986 to support the  increasingly dense consistency of wines. The design provides an  exceptionally wide evaporation surface, thereby intensifying a wine's  bouquet and silky texture.The glasses in this set of four were specifically shaped to highlight  the fruit in full-bodied red wines with high acidity and moderate  tannin, such as Barbaresco, Barolo, Beaujolais Grand Cru, Red Burgundy,  Gamay, Nebbiolo, and Pinot Noir. The mouth of the Pinot Noir glasses  draws wine to the areas of the tongue that perceive sweetness,  highlighting the fruit and mellowing the acidity. The large bowl  provides room for the wine's rich bouquet to unfold. Each glass stands  9-1/2 inches high with a 4-1/2-inch wide bowl and holds 29-5/8 ounces  of wine.--Cristina Vaamonde

title: Riedel Vinum Extreme Chardonnay Wine Glass, Set of 4
description: Founded in 1756, Europe's Riedel Crystal is the world's  premier manufacturer of wine glasses. The Vinum Extreme series of  glasses are machine-made of diamond-shaped 24-percent lead crystal.  These glass shapes, with a unique angular look, dramatic oversized  bowls, and extra-tall stems, were introduced in 1986 to support the  increasingly dense consistency of wines. The design provides an  exceptionally wide evaporation surface, thereby intensifying a wine's  bouquet and silky texture.The glasses in this set of four are specifically recommended to enhance  the taste of wines such as Chardonnay, White Burgundy,  Corton-Charlemagne, Montrachet, and Meursault. The large bowl provides  room for the wine's rich bouquet to unfold without becoming too  intense. Each glass stands 9-1/8 inches high with a 4-1/2-inch wide  bowl and holds 27-1/2 ounces of wine.--Cristina Vaamonde

title: Oneida Satin Sand Dune 20-Piece Stainless-Steel Flatware Set, Service for 4
description: Oneida is one of those brand names that automatically comes to mind when you think of good silverware. Buy 1 good set and you should never need another. This 5-star quality set--Oneida's highest quality rating--is made of corrosion-, rust-, and stain-resistant 18/8 stainless steel. The Satin Sand Dune pattern has a sleek contemporary look with a bright, shiny finish and a satin accent on the handles. The 20-piece set includes 4 salad forks, 4 place forks, 4 place knives, 4 place spoons, and 4 teaspoons. All pieces are dishwasher-safe, never need polishing, and come with a 25-year warranty.--Doree ArmstrongWhat’s in the Box4 place settings. Each place setting consists of: salad fork; place fork; place knife; place spoon; teaspoon. 20 pieces total.

title: Metrokane 6114 Rabbit Wine Drip Stop Ring
description: There's really nothing worse than opening a great bottle of  wine, enjoying the first glass, and then realizing that the wine has  dripped down onto the tablecloth. Metrokane's drip-stop ring lets every  enophile stop worrying about drips. The drip-stop ring is the ideal  method for keeping wine from spilling out the top of an opened bottle  after pouring, keeping your spills from becoming stains. It fits on  almost every size bottle, and has a spring action mechanism that makes  sure it stays snug around the neck. Solidly constructed of sturdy  plastic, its thick ring of felt in the interior should catch spills for  years.--A.J. Rathbun

title: WMF Easy Pour Decanter
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Bar Tools & Glasses', 'Decanters', 'Wine Decanters']]
description: Made of lead-free glass, this classic decanter holds one  750-milliliter bottle of wine. While the most common use of a decanter  is to prevent sediment in an aged red wine from spoiling the wine's  clarity and brilliance, some authorities also recommend decanting young  red wines to give them the opportunity to bloom. In either case, this  decanter brings elegance to the dinner table. And because it has an  indented well in the bottom, steady, careful pouring is possible, as  fingers fit securely into the well while the thumb grips atop the  decanter's flared base. Standing 9 inches high on a 9-inch-diameter  base, the decanter serves beautifully as a vase when it's not being  used for wine.--Fred Brack

title: Lee Pro Products Parsley/Herb Mill
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Seasoning & Spice Tools', 'Herb & Spice Mills']]
description: This kitchen tool minces handfuls of fresh herbs such as  parsley and basil in a jiffy while eliminating the need to haul out a  big, heavy food processor. Simplicity in action, the mill consists of a  hopper, a handle, and a crank with 32 tiny blades on its end. The  hopper swings open on a hinge so the crank can be inserted from either  side--for a right-hander or a left-hander--then snaps shut. Toss herbs  into the hopper, grip the handle, turn the crank, and the blades cut  the herbs uniformly and shower them, in a final benediction of flavor,  onto a dish of pasta, into a bowl of soup, or over a platter of sliced  tomatoes. Made of 18/8 stainless steel polished to a mirror finish, the  mill measures 8-1/2 inches long, and the hopper is 2-3/4 inches wide at  the top and 2 inches deep. Though it's dishwasher-safe, cleaning the  mill requires little more than a rinse under running water.--Fred  Brack

title: Commercial Grade Marinade Injector, 2-Ounce Capacity
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Meat & Poultry Tools', 'Basters & Marinaters', 'Marinaters']]
description: Turkey or chicken, pheasant or duck, beef or lamb, pork or  venison--any poultry, meat, or game benefits from being basted from the  inside out. With this tool, injecting a marinade is foolproof, easy,  and quick, and the result is increased flavor and juiciness. The  marinade goes into the syringe, and the syringe's needle delivers it  precisely where it's needed, with two holes near the needle's tip  distributing a marinade in both directions--right and  left--simultaneously. Made of stainless steel polished to a mirror  finish, the injector is heavy, durable, and a first-rate instrument. It  measures 10 inches long, with a 2-1/2-inch needle, and the needle  unscrews for easy cleanup.--Fred Brack

title: GSD Mandolin Slicer with 3 Stainless Steel Blades and Safety Guard
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Mandolines & Slicers']]
description: Use the GSD Mandolin Slicer to quickly and easily slice and julienne vegetables and fruits, just like the pros. It will quickly become one of your favorite kitchen gadgets and cooking utensils among your other kitchen tools. Save time during food preparation while creating delicious and healthy dishes, such as stir frys, casseroles and your favorite vegetarian recipe – even julienne cut zucchini spaghetti strands! Prepare healthy snacks in a jiff, like sliced fruit, salads and more. The interchangeable stainless steel blades give you precise 1, 2, and 3mm slices. Simply snap in the desired blade and hold the mandolin slicer by its handle then slice onto your work surface or over a bowl. The safety guard has prongs to hold smaller end pieces for safe-and-easy slicing while keeping fingers out of harm’s way. Dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. Made in Germany.

title: Marcato Atlas Pasta Drying Rack
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Pasta & Pizza Tools', 'Pasta Makers & Accessories']]
description: Made by the Marcato family in Italy, the Tacopasta drying rack is an essential tool for making fresh pasta.  The closeable pasta drying rack with retractable base in chrome-plated steel and polycarbonate is a sturdy well designed piece.  The rack includes a "wand" that allows you to easily transfer pasta from the machine to the rack.  Folds for convenient storage. The wand conveniently stores in the center tube of the drying rack.

title: Regency Cooking Butcher's Twine for Meat Prep and Trussing Turkey 100% cotton 1 LB cone
description: Essential for binding rolled roasts and other meat  preparations, trussing a bird, and dozens of other cooking tasks, this  cooking twine is made of 100-percent cotton and is graded 16-ply for  strength. You can stand the 1-pound cone on the counter or place its  hollow core on a post.--Fred Brack

title: Mrs. Anderson's Baking Chocolate Chipper
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Baking Tools & Accessories', 'Baking & Pastry Utensils']]
description: Martha Stewart cheerfully chops chocolate on her cooking show  with an instrument like this, and now we can as well. This sturdy tool  converts hard, thick baking-chocolate bars into chunks for cookies,  sparing good kitchen knives when a recipe calls for you to break up  chocolate before melting. It's even good for chipping ice for drinks or  buffet displays. Overall, the tool measures 9 inches long, with a  5-inch hardwood handle and six pointed prongs that deliver satisfying  blows.--Fred Brack

title: BISSELL 32032 Lift Off 3M Filtrete Exhaust Filter
description: The exhaust filter (Style 4) in this package fits Bissell's  LiftOff 3554 series vacuum cleaners. It traps allergens such as dust  mites and pollens and is more than 99 percent effective for particles  down to 0.3 microns. Instructions for installing the filter are show on  the box.--Fred Brack

title: BISSELL Lift-Off 3M Vacuum Bags, 32031
description: The two disposable paper bags (Style 4) in this package fit  Bissell's LiftOff 3554 series, and Plus 3553 series vacuum cleaners.  They trap allergens such as dust mites and pollens and are more than 99  percent effective for particles down to 0.3 microns. These bags can be  used until they're entirely full with a minimum loss of vacuum power,  thereby reducing the number of bags required over time.--Fred  Brack

title: Norpro Sunrise Cocktail Shaker with Strainer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Bar & Wine Tools', 'Cocktail Shakers']]
description: Never get a cocktail wrong with this shaker--because the recipes are right there on the bottle. With a clear sieve and an amber shot glass that doubles as a cap during mixing, this shaker is bartending at its basic best. Pop the neck off at the widest point for easy cleaning. And if this acrylic shaker gets slippery during pouring, you won't break any glass on your kitchen floor. It includes instructions for mixing tequila sunrises, screwdrivers, margaritas, and Harvey Wallbangers, and recipes and accompanying pictures are printed in cheery oranges and yellows.--Emily Bedard

title: Anolon Titanium Hard Anodized Nonstick 12-Inch Open Stir Fry Pan with Helper Handle
description: A rare feature among hard-anodized cookware, Anolon Titanium is  actually dishwasher-safe. However, it offers cooks many advantages long  before cleanup time. Constructed of extra-thick aluminum, these heavy  pots and pans conduct heat quickly and uniformly (no hot spots) and  won't warp. Their handsome, charcoal-gray exterior is harder than steel  and resists scratching and denting. Inside, they're coated with  DuPont's exceptionally durable Autograph nonstick that readily releases  food. Stainless-steel handles have an attractive satin-finish. The  handles are rounded for comfort, hollow to stay cool on the stovetop,  oven-safe to 500 degrees F, and have hanging holes. This 12-inch stir- fry pan has a helper handle and a rounded bottom that's perfect for  cooking Asian-style food.Unlike conventional hard-anodized pots and pans, this cookware is  dishwasher-safe because its titanium-composite exterior is nonporous.  Nevertheless, its virtue of being dishwasher-safe is not unlimited. To  prevent pots and pans from discoloring in a dishwasher over time--and  to prevent voiding the lifetime warranty against defects--the  manufacturer's cleaning instructions about water temperature (120 to  140 degrees F) and detergent (mild, with a phosphate content less that  7-1/2 percent) must be strictly observed. As with most cookware, hand  washing Anolon Titanium is the better alternative for ideal care.--Fred Brack

title: Progressive 3.5-Quart Asparagus Steamer Set
description: Tall and narrow, this steamer is not only ideal for cooking asparagus,  it's also great for other long vegetables like corn on the cob and carrots and  for steaming clams and boiling eggs. A sturdy, stainless-steel basket fits  inside and has a handle to lift it from the pot and feet to keep it stable on a  counter. With a 3-1/2-quart capacity, the steamer also can be used as a small  stockpot. It measures 8-1/4 inches deep, ample for standing asparagus spears  upright and boiling their tough bottom ends while steaming their tender tips for  uniform cooking. The pot and lid are made of 18/10 stainless steel polished to a  mirror-finish, and the pot's hollow handles stay cool on the stovetop. The  steamer is dishwasher-safe and carries a five-year warranty against defects.--Fred Brack

title: WMF Profi Plus 10-Inch Stainless Steel Twirl Whisk
description: This 10-inch whisk with a flexible spiral of wire is just one  of the high-quality Profi Plus tools WMF makes for every conceivable  kitchen task. The whisk is designed for twirling between the palms  inside a narrow container. Emulsifying a salad dressing in a jar is  easy with this tool, and the spiral catches liquids and spices in the  jar's bottom and scrapes its sides, too. Contemporary European in  style, the whisk is made of 18/10 stainless steel and is beautifully  balanced, with a satin-finish, cylindrical handle and a heavy-duty  hanging loop. Seamless construction ensures cleaning ease. This tool is  dishwasher-safe, durable, and a joy to use for serious cooks and  novices alike.--Fred Brack

title: WMF Profi Plus Stainless Steel Can Opener
description: This can opener is just one of the high-quality Profi Plus  tools WMF makes for every conceivable kitchen task. Capable of slitting  the tops off cans, prying the lids off jars, and popping the tops off  bottles, the opener is heavy, sturdy, and comfortable in the hand. It's  contemporary European in style, measures 9 inches long and has a  heavy-duty hanging loop on the end of each handle. The opener is made  of satin-finish, 18/10 stainless steel, with a cylindrical handle and  tough plastic turning knob that fits the fingers for maximum leverage  and ease of use. Seamless construction ensures cleaning ease. This tool  is dishwasher-safe, durable, and a joy to use for serious cooks and  novices alike.--Fred Brack

title: WMF Profi Plus 15-Inch Stainless Steel Wire Skimmer/Ladle
description: This skimming/serving ladle is just one of the high-quality,  Profi Plus tools WMF makes for every conceivable kitchen task.  Patterned after the classic tool Chinese cooks use when cooking food in  hot oil or liquid, it's also useful for skimming foam and unwanted bits  of food from simmering stocks. Contemporary European in style, the  deep-skimming ladle is 15 inches long and has a deep,  4-3/4-inch-diameter wire bowl. It's made of 18/10 stainless steel and  beautifully balanced, with a satin-finish, cylindrical handle and a  heavy-duty hanging loop. Seamless construction ensures hygiene and  cleaning ease. This tool is dishwasher-safe, durable, and a joy to use  for serious cooks and novices alike.--Fred Brack

title: WMF Profi Plus Stainless-Steel Cheese Slicer
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Graters, Peelers & Slicers', 'Mandolines & Slicers']]
description: This traditional wire cheese slicer is just one of the  high-quality Profi Plus tools WMF makes for every conceivable kitchen  task. The slicer employs steel wires (replacements available  separately) to create uniform slices when drawn through semi-hard  cheeses like cheddar and Jarlsberg. Contemporary European in style, the  slicer is 10 inches long overall and cuts 4-inch-wide cheese blocks.  It's made of 18/10 stainless steel and is beautifully balanced, with a  satin-finish, cylindrical handle and a heavy-duty hanging loop.  Seamless construction ensures cleaning ease. This tool is  dishwasher-safe, durable, and a joy to use for serious cooks and  novices alike.--Fred Brack

title: Mr. Beer Deluxe Edition Home Microbrewery System
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Home Brewing & Wine Making', 'Beer Brewing']]
description: In just 14 days, beginning and advanced brewers alike can enjoy a glass of premium, handcrafted beer with this home-brewing kit. The 2-1/2-gallon brewing keg features a pour tap and wide-mouth lid for easy cleaning by hand. Included in this starter kit are a can of Classic American Light mix, which produces twenty 12-ounce bottles of mild, full-bodied beer. The beer-making ingredients are simply mixed with water, left to brew in the keg at room temperature for a week, and then put into bottles (not included) for another week, during which time natural carbonation takes place. No carbon-dioxide cartridges are needed to enhance sparkle or beer head. Other Mr. Beer mixes and booster packs can be ordered separately. The keg is made of FDA-compliant PVC, which does not impart taste or color, and is virtually indestructible.--Ann Bieri

title: Peugeot 900818 Nancy 7 Inch Pepper Mill, Acrylic
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Salt & Pepper', 'Pepper Shakers']]
description: Nancy pepper and salt mills from Peugeot are formed in a traditional turned styling but with a modern twist-they're made from clear acrylic. As a result, one can quickly view the contents and choose the salt or pepper. The difference between the two mills lies in the grinding mechanism. Peugeot pepper mills use case-hardened-steel grinding heads with two sizes of grooves; the larger grooves crack the peppercorns in half and direct them into the smaller grooves, which grind them much more finely than most mills. The grinding mechanism in Peugeot salt mills is purposefully constructed with 18/10 stainless-steel, which won't corrode from prolonged contact with the salt. The top of each mill unscrews for adding peppercorns and salt, while the round ball nut can be loosened or tightened to vary the coarseness of the grind.Nancy pepper and salt mills, available in a range of sizes, make exceptional gifts individually or as a set. Peugeot has been a leading manufacturer of pepper mills since the 1840s, and is a brand preferred by many restaurants and chefs. Care for a mill is easy: clean the exterior and inner chamber with a damp cloth; never immerse in water; avoid putting salt in the pepper mill, or grinding green or pink peppercorns by themselves (mixed with black is fine); and avoid damp types of salt (usually pink or gray) in the regular salt mill. Made in France, Peugeot mills are covered by a two-year replacement policy, while the grinding mechanism is covered by a lifetime warranty.--Ann Bieri
