CGS Enamelware 16-Piece Dinnerware Starter Set, Red
description: Liven up the kitchen, table, and picnic spread with this colorful enamelware dinner set from CGS International. The 16-piece set includes four dinner plates, salad plates, bowls, and mugs in a cheery enamel finish. The pieces are lightweight and comfortable to handle, and the plates have a deep-dish design. The hand-applied enamel creates a splashy, marbleized effect offset by the pieces' heavy black rims. Though safe for both the dishwasher and the oven, these dishes are not designed for use in the microwave. The dinner plates measure 10-1/4 inches in diameter, and the salad plates measure 8 inches. The bowls are 6-1/4 inches in diameter, and the mugs stand 3 inches tall.--Emily BedardWhat’s in the Box4 place settings. Each place setting consists of: 10-1/4-inch dinner plate; 8-inch salad plate; 6-1/4-inch bowl; 3-inch mug. 16 pieces total.

title: Lenox Butterfly Meadow Dragonfly Accent Plate
description: Golden blossoms, green foliage and a graceful butterfly create an enchanting garden moment on this porcelain Butterfly Meadow Dragonfly Accent Plate from Lenox. Based on an illustration by artist Louise Le Luyer, the scene captures every detail of her original artwork and brings to mind beautiful butterfly meadows. The plate is designed to be mixed and matched with the Butterfly Meadow dinner and accent plates.

title: Lenox Butterfly Meadow Bone Porcelain Tiger Swallowtail Mug
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Cups, Mugs & Saucers', 'Coffee Cups & Mugs']]
description: A cup of coffee or a favorite tea in the tiger swallowtail mug from Lenox brightens any morning with its cheerful imagery. The fine bone porcelain construction supports piping hot drinks direct from the stovetop and also fares admirably when reheating lukewarm beverages. With a capacity of 12 ounces, this 4-1/2 inch high mug brings color to any dining table.The tiger swallowtail mug joins Lenox's Butterfly Meadow pattern, which gains inspiration from the artistry of Louise Le Luyer. This mug features a vibrant yellow and black swallowtail as it burst forth from a tranquil garden of trumpet flowers and cascading vines in subdued hues. The gently scalloped rim and slender handle enhance this display. The mug benefits from straightforward care and is dishwasher-, microwave-, and oven-safe. In event of breakage, Lenox offers registry for a Lifetime Breakage Replacement Program, replacing any piece in stock at 50 percent off current retail price. Pair this mug with the matching tiger swallowtail accent plate or mix-and-match with any other Butterfly Meadow piece.--Jessica Reuling

title: Euro-Pro HEPA filter for Shark EP033
description: This HEPA filter fits the dust cup of Euro-Pro's Shark EP033  handheld vacuum. It traps 99.97 percent of air impurities down to 0.3  microns in size, a marked improvement over standard dust-cup filters.  The filter is designed to be cleaned by simply tapping it against the  side of a trash can when emptying the vacuum's dust cup. It arrives  fully assembled and snaps easily into place.--Fred Brack

description: Perfect for everyday use, the four champagne glasses in this  set are part of the moderately priced Ouverture series offered by  world-renowned Austrian wineglass maker Riedel Crystal (founded in  1756). Being lead-free, they're not crystal, like Riedel's premium  glasses but are machine blown of potash glass and are dishwasher-safe.  Their thin rims are cut and polished to Riedel's exacting standards, so  wine flows easily onto the tongue. Each glass holds 9-1/8 ounces and  stands 8-1/2 inches high. Since then Riedel has continued  fine-tuning glasses to bring out the best characteristics in wines and  spirits. Varying bowls' shapes and sizes affects the position of the  head when sipping and where wine first contacts the tongue's various  taste zones.--Fred Brack

description: 81881 Size: 1.5-qt. Includes: -Includes lid. Warranty: -Lifetime limited warranty.

title: Anolon Advanced Hard Anodized Nonstick 2-Quart Covered Saucepan
description: Coated inside and out with Dupont's exceptionally durable,  three-layer Autograph nonstick, Anolon Advanced cookware provides  heavyweight, professional-quality performance and 21st-century  convenience. Pots and pans clean easily, while the rugged nonstick  readily releases food. Beneath the nonstick is heavy-gauge,  harder-than-steel anodized aluminum. Pot and pan bottoms are left  uncoated to conduct heat quickly and prevent hot spots. Bright chrome  handles have hanging holes for storage and soft, stay-cool rubber grips  for slip-resistance. Break-resistant, domed glass lids permit cooking  to be monitored without releasing heat and are oven-safe to 375 F. The  cookware's charcoal-gray, nonstick exterior has an attractive  enamel-like appearance.A kitchen workhorse, this 2-quart saucepan stands 4 inches high and  measures 6-1/2 inches in diameter. It carries a lifetime warranty  against defects and should be hand washed.--Fred Brack

title: Anolon Advanced Hard Anodized Nonstick 10-Inch Skillet
description: Coated inside and out with Dupont's exceptionally durable,  three-layer Autograph nonstick, Anolon Advanced cookware provides  heavyweight, professional-quality performance and 21st-century  convenience. Pots and pans clean easily, while the rugged nonstick  readily releases food. Beneath the nonstick is heavy-gauge,  harder-than-steel anodized aluminum. Pot and pan bottoms are left  uncoated to conduct heat quickly and prevent hot spots. Bright chrome  handles have hanging holes for storage and soft, stay-cool rubber grips  for slip-resistance. The grips are deep, narrow, and shaped  ergonomically, permitting pans to be used comfortably despite their  weight. Break-resistant, domed glass lids permit cooking to be  monitored without releasing heat and are oven-safe to 375 degrees F.  The cookware's charcoal gray, nonstick exterior has an attractive  enamel-like appearance.This 10-inch skillet (which doesn't have a lid) has sloped, slightly  rounded sides so food can be tossed and a flared rim to facilitate  dripless pouring. It carries a lifetime warranty against defects and  should be hand washed.--Fred Brack

title: Anolon Advanced Hard Anodized Nonstick 8.5-Inch Skillet
description: This 8.5-inch nonstick skillet is the perfect size for an omelet,  a burger, or salmon croquettes for one. Part of Anolon's Advanced line  of cookware, the skillet is composed of heavyweight hard-anodized  aluminum, which heats food evenly with no hot spots. The interior and  exterior of the pan are coated with three layers of DuPont's durable  Autograph 2 nonstick surface for easy release of foods. Tested by  professional chefs, the nonstick coating has proven to stand up to  extended use in a restaurant. Oven-safe to 375 degrees F, the SureGrip  handle on the pan is made of durable 18/10 stainless steel and covered  in a silicone rubber for a safe and heat-free grip. A hole at the end  of the handle allows you to hang the skillet from a pot rack. Anolon  Advanced cookware is covered by a lifetime limited warranty.--Cristina Vaamonde

title: Nambe 9-by-18-Inch Handled Serving Tray
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Serveware', 'Serving Dishes, Trays & Platters', 'Serving Trays']]
description: Sized for versatile use and beautifully styled, this handled serving tray from Nambé is simple, confident, and impeccably crafted. Created to become a classic in the Nambé collection, the piece is made from the durable and lovely metal alloy Nambé is known for. This lustrous and strong material will not crack, chip, or tarnish with use and retains its hand-polished gleam with minimal effort. It is also safe in the oven and freezer.Designed with integrated cutout handles that have a smooth, sensuous feel, the tray features arced sides to contain sauces and mobile foods like whole fruit. A striking gift or addition to the serving repertoire, it measures 9 by 18 inches and should be washed by hand. Nambé makes a larger version of the tray as well, and other coordinating Nambé serveware, such as bowls and relish dishes, are also available.--Emily Bedard

title: J.A. Henckels 17-1/2-Inch Magna Bar, Black
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Knife Blocks & Storage', 'Magnetic Knife Strips']]
description: To prolong the life of your kitchen knives, it's necessary to use, clean and store them properly. This sleek, compact designed magnet bar is handsome and efficient. The 17.5-inch Knife Holder has a magnetic strip long and powerful enough to hold your favorite knives in place. Display it wherever you prep food - over the stove, under a cupboard or near a kitchen island. Hanging hardware is included.

title: Department 56 Accessories for Department 56 Village Collections AC/DC Adapter Lights
description: Use Department 56 Cross Product accessories to enhance your Village display.  Use to power up to 3 LED lit Village accessories.

title: CucinaPro 178 Fresh Pasta Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Utensils & Gadgets', 'Pasta & Pizza Tools', 'Pasta Makers & Accessories']]
description: This set gives you everything you need to make your favorite pasta!  Make fresh spaghetti, fettuccini, angel hair, ravioli and lasagnette in the comfort of your own home.  Made of chrome coated steel.

title: WaterPik Replacement Faucet Filter Cartridge
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Water Coolers & Filters', 'Replacement Water Filters']]
description: Our Best Filter.Reduces Lead, Chlorine, Lindane*, Cysts**, Asbestos, Sediment, Bad Taste and Odor.Fits Models F-2C, F-3C, F-5, F-52, F-5C, F-6 and F-7.Contents:1 Replacement Filter Cartridge Model R-7:The easy-to-change, high performance filter cartridge has a life expectancy of three months or 200 gallons.  Filter life is directly dependent on your local water conditions and frequency of use.Step-by-step instructions:Everything you need to replace your old filter cartridge.Enjoy Maximum Filter Performance(Minimum reductions with a fresh cartridge over the life of the product as tested by NSF International.  All Particulates greater than .5 micronsLead - 93%Chlorine - 94%Cysts 99.95%Lindane - 97%Asbestos - 99%Rust, Sand (All Particulates greater than .5 microns) and Sediment - 98%System Tested and Certified by NSF Internationalagainst ANSI/NSF  Standard. 42 for the reduction of Chlorine (Class I), Taste and Odor,  Particulate (Class I) and against ANSI/NSF Standard 53 for the reduction of Cysts, Lead, Lindane, and Asbestos.The contaminants or other substances removed or reduced by this water filter are not necessarily in your water.*A common pesticide**Giardia and Cryptosporidium***Filter life is directly dependent on your local water conditions and frequency of use.Made in U.S.A.

title: Wilton 710-3460 Elmo Icing Decorations
description: Mint-flavored edible sugar shapes decorate cupcakes, cookies, ice cream and cake. Certified Kosher. Quick, colorful and festive way to dress up your cupcakes and more!

title: Wilton Elmo Standard Baking Cups
description: Elmo Baking Cups. Standard size, 2 inch diameter.

title: Vornado VH2 Whole Room Vortex Heater
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Heating, Cooling & Air Quality', 'Space Heaters & Accessories']]
description: The Vornado VH2 Whole Room Heater is not your average space heater. With Vornado's Vortex action you get the signature Vortex energy efficient technology that evenly heats the entire room at an affordable price! This is unlike most space heaters that heat the space directly in front of the unit with the heat immediately rising to the ceiling. The VH2 not only generates heat but circulates it throughout the entire room. This whole room heater has a simple to use turn-dial thermostatic temperature control knob. Simply heat the room to a comfortable level and then turn the dial back until the heater shuts off. The Vortex Heater will then maintain that temperature within 3 to 4 degrees. This household heater is whisper-quiet and has advanced safety features cool-touch exterior, automatic tip-over and over-heat protection to provide worry-free use. The Vornado VH2 was a Good Housekeeping Research Institute top safety pick in the Feb. 2008 issue. Vornado Energy Efficient Whole Room Heaters are different from traditional space heaters. Vornado portable space heaters are more energy efficient thanks to unique vortex action which disburse heat evenly throughout the room. This more efficient movement of air saves energy, allowing the Vornado electric heater to warm an entire room in less time! Most ordinary space heaters heat the space directly in front of the heater leaving the rest of the room cold, which contributes to running heaters longer and at higher temperatures and using more energy. Reduce your electricity bills this winter with a Vornado energy efficient heater, or share energy efficiency by giving a Vornado electric heater as a gift. Model is made for 120 Volts only

title: Nambé 7-inch Wine Chiller
description: Not only does this sleek, highly-polished wine chiller from Nambé look modern and sophisticated with its angled top, it really does keep wine chilled. The heavy, thick metal is excellent at retaining cold (or heat, if necessary), and can be placed in the freezer or fridge before use to get thoroughly cold. The oven-safe, durable metal will not crack, chip, or tarnish, but may not be used in a microwave or cleaned in a dishwasher. The wine chiller measures seven inches in height.Nambé was founded in 1951 in a village of the same name in scenic northern New Mexico. From the beginning, the company focused on hand-producing high-quality, functional items such as metal bowls and trays with great attention to timeless, modern design. Still made in the USA, Nambé's signature metal alloy is liquified, poured into a hand-made sand cast, and the resulting piece repeatedly polished and smoothed by hand. Exceptional gifts for the most special of occasions, Nambé metal bowls and accessories are now joined by porcelain and crystal pieces, each flawlessly crafted. Nambé ware has won numerous design awards, has been shown in or recognized by nearly two dozen museums worldwide, and is part of the permanent collections of many, including the Museum of Modern Art in New York.--Ann Bieri

title: Wusthof Classic 2-Piece Asian Santoku and Paring Knife Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Cutlery Sets', 'Knife Block Sets']]
description: The perfect starter set for hobby cooks. This Asian Cook's Set from Wusthof's Classic Series includes a 3" Paring Knife (#4000), and a 6.5" Asian Santoku Knife (#4183).Wusthof Classic Paring Knife Features:The straight edge offers close control for decorating as well as peeling, mincing and dicing.8 cm (3")Blades are high-carbon stainless steelThe W_STHOF name, TRIDENT-Logo and city of Solingen as place-of-manufacturing proudly etched onto every blade.Wusthof Classic Santuko Knife Features:Styled after the Japanese Cook's Knife this blade is just right for.17 cm (6+" ) with granton edge.The hollow edge creates pockets of air which prevent extra thin or soft slices from sticking to the blade.The W_STHOF name, TRIDENT-Logo and city of Solingen as place-of-manufacturing proudly etched onto every blade.For warranty information, please Click Here.

title: J.A. Henckels 2-Piece Mincing Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Specialty Knives', 'Mincing Knives']]
description: Mince parsley or chop walnuts effortlessly with this board and knife set from cutlery king, Henckels. The curved, double-bladed stainless-steel knife slices and chops as it rocks gently in the bowl of the hardwood cutting board. A two-band brushed-stainless-steel handle gives the super-sharp knife a sure grip and a stylish, contemporary look. Measuring 8 inches square and 1-1/2 inches thick, the wooden board features four rubber feet screwed into the bottom, so it won't slide around on the table or counter. The set comes neatly packaged in a gift-quality black cardboard box. Henckels guarantees this set for life.--Ann Bieri

title: Wusthof Classic 10-Piece Knife Block Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Cutlery Sets', 'Knife Block Sets']]
description: Known worldwide for their superior performance, Wüsthof knives  are the cutlery of choice among many professionals and by  discriminating amateur chefs. The Classic series features a traditional  styling that makes it the most popular of the Wüsthof lines. The blades  are formed with the perfect balance of high-carbon steel and a  stain-resistant alloy so they retain their edge longer and are easier  to resharpen. The blade is ground and polished by computer, ensuring  perfect tapering from bolster to tip, and the edge is then hand honed  for precision slicing. The sturdy feel of this knife is achieved by the  weighted bolster, which is considered to be Wüsthof's signature  feature. The tang runs through the synthetic handle and is secured with  three rivets.Perfect as a wedding gift, this 10-piece set has all the kitchen  cutlery basics with room to grow. The knives in the set include an  8-inch cook's knife, an 8-inch carving knife, a 6-inch sandwich knife,  an 8-inch serrated bread knife, a 5-inch serrated sausage knife, a  4-1/2-inch utility knife, and a 3-1/2-inch paring knife. A pair of  kitchen shears and a 9-inch sharpening steel complete the set.  Everything fits neatly into the rubber-footed oak block, which has  space to eventually add six steak knives and two more prep knives.Cristina VaamondeWhat's in the Box8-inch cook's knife; 8-inch carving knife; 6-inch sandwich knife; 8-inch serrated bread knife; 5-inch serrated sausage knife; 4-1/2-inch utility knife; 3-1/2-inch paring knife;  kitchen shears; 9-inch sharpening steel; rubber-footed oak block with eight extra slots.

title: Henckels International Fine Edge Pro Stainless-Steel 7-Piece Knife Set with Block
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Kitchen Knives & Cutlery Accessories', 'Cutlery Sets', 'Knife Block Sets']]
description: A great gift, this seven-piece set equips a cook with five  essential kitchen knives, a 9-inch sharpening steel to keep blade edges  aligned, and a hardwood block to store knives and steel on the counter.  The knives are a 3-1/2-inch paring knife, a 5-3/4-inch utility knife,  an 8-inch carving knife, an 8-inch bread knife to slice crusty loaves,  and an 8-inch chef's knife for rocking through chopping and mincing  tasks. The knives don't have bolsters and are stamped, not forged from  stainless steel. The steel is of lesser quality than Henckels' premier  lines. Handles are also formed of stainless steel, and their satin  finish contrasts stylishly with the blades. The knives are  dishwasher-safe and carry a lifetime warranty against defects.--Fred BrackWhat's in the Box3-1/2-inch parer, 5-3/4-inch utility, 8-inch slicer, 8-inch chef's knife, 8-inch bread knife, 9-inch steel, hardwood block

title: Le Creuset Soleil Cherry Cast Iron Bell Pepper Cocotte, 2.25 Quart
description: Beautiful enough to bring to the table, but durable enough to  outlive its 101-year warranty against defects, this heavy casserole is  shaped like a red bell pepper, perfect for preparing and  ceremoniously serving a lamb stew or other festive dish. Use it in the  oven or on the stovetop. Made of cast iron, with an exterior and  interior clad in Le Creuset's famous bright enamel, the casserole holds  2 quarts and measures 8-3/8 inches wide (with its two handles), 7  inches high, and 6-7/8 inches deep. Cast iron is unexcelled for heat  distribution and retention, so this casserole cooks foods evenly and  gently without hot spots. The knob on its heavy, tight-fitting lid is  oven-safe to 450 degrees F. Loop handles facilitate carrying, and the  casserole is dishwasher-safe. Like all Le Creuset products, the bell  pepper casserole is made in France.--Fred Brack

title: Caleca Margherita 16-Piece Dinnerware Set, Service for 4
description: Handpainted in Italy with a blue checked pattern and greenery, the 16 pieces in this casual dinnerware set present bright, festive place settings for four people. Each place setting consists of an 11-1/2-inch dinner plate, an 8-1/4-inch salad/dessert plate, an 8-1/2-inch pasta bowl, and a 16-ounce mug. The set displays Caleca's vividly colored San Remo pattern of greenery and a tablecloth-like background of checkered blue. Made of heavy, chip-resistant stoneware, the dinnerware is dishwasher-safe.--ReviewerWhat’s in the Box4 place settings. Each place setting consists of: 11-1/2-inch dinner plate; 8-1/4-inch salad/dessert plate; 8-1/2-inch pasta bowl; 16-ounce mug. 16 pieces total.

title: Riedel Sommeliers Montrachet/Chardonnay, Single Stem
description: Handmade of mouth-blown full-lead crystal, this wine glass is  from Riedel's top-of-the-line Sommeliers collection and is for those  who take their wine seriously. The classic design is understated enough  for an after-work glass of wine and elegant enough to dress a holiday  table. The glass is specifically shaped to balance the fruit and  acidity in white wines such as Chardonnay, Montrachet, white Burgundy,  New World Chardonnay, Pouilly-Fuisse, and Meursault. The wide mouth is  intended to draw wine to the edges of the tongue, which are more  sensitive to sourness. The wide bowl gives room for the wine's rich  bouquet to unfold without becoming too intense. Each glass weighs a  substantial 11 ounces and holds 17-3/4 ounces of wine. It stands 7-7/8  inches high with a 4-inch wide bowl.--Cristina Vaamonde

title: Riedel Sommeliers Series Chablis-Chardonnay Glass, Packed in a Gift Tube
description: Handmade of mouth-blown full-lead crystal, this wine glass is  from Riedel's top-of-the-line Sommeliers collection and is for those  who take their wine seriously. The classic design is understated enough  for an after-work glass of wine and elegant enough to dress a holiday  table. The glass is specifically shaped to balance the fruit and  acidity in white wines such as Chablis, Chardonnay, Chenin Blanc, white  Burgundy, white Bordeaux, Pinot Grigio, or Viognier. Each glass weighs  a substantial 10 ounces and holds 12-1/4 ounces of wine. It stands  8-1/2 inches high with a 3-inch wide bowl.--Cristina Vaamonde

title: 4400/00 Sommelier Bordeaux Gran Cru
description: 4400/00 Features: -Cru glass.-Material: Lead crystal.-Hand made.-Mouth blown.-Prop 65 Applies.-Comes with padded gift box.-Capacity: 30 oz.. Color/Finish: -Color: Clear. Dimensions: -10.63'' H. Collection: -Sommeliers collection.

title: Cuisinart WM-PZ2 Pizzelle Press
description: Crisp, sweet, and decoratively imprinted, pizzelle cookies make  a wonderful holiday gift--as does the press itself. To use, simply  scoop a spoonful of batter on each round nonstick surface of the press,  close and latch the lid, and in only 60 seconds two perfect pizzelle  are ready. Roll the warm pizzelle around the included wooden dowel to  make cannoli, or shape over an inverted custard cup to make a tiny  dessert bowl. Pizzelle harden as they cool, and can be eaten flat like  crisp cookies or shaped and filled with chocolate mousse, whipped  cream, or fruit. A five-setting switch on the press adjusts the  temperature for browning preference, and recipes in the instruction  booklet offer variations on flavors. A measuring spoon is included. Red  and green lights indicate readiness, and a quick reheat time means  three dozen of these four-inch cookies can be cooked in no time. The  press measures 9 by 8 by 4 inches, is easily wiped clean, stores  upright to save space, and comes with a three-year warranty against  defects.--Ann Bieri

title: KitchenAid KSM150PSCB Artisan Series 5-Quart Mixer, Cranberry
description: KitchenAid's Artisan stand mixer is a substantial piece of equipment: 325 watts of mixing power make child's play of creaming butter, kneading dough, and whipping cream. The kid in you will appreciate how quick and easy it is to mix up a batch of cookie dough. This model comes with three attachments: a flat beater for making batter, meat loaf, and all textures in-between; a wire whip for egg whites, mayonnaise, and more air-infused creations; and a hook for mixing and kneading yeast doughs. All three are solidly constructed and easily secured to the beater shaft with a simple twist. This model also includes a pouring shield for guiding ingredients to their proper destination, and the bowl itself locks tight to the base. Standing about 15 inches high, jutting out a foot, and weighing more than a grown woman's bowling ball, this stand mixer isn't the sort of appliance you'll wipe down and put away. Better to find a square foot of free counter space for easy access; besides, this machine is as pretty as it is rugged--you'll want to show it off.--Betsy DanheimFrom the ManufacturerThe Artisan mixer's strong 325-watt motor delivers the power to handle the heaviest mixtures, and mix large batches easily.The 5-quart polished stainless steel bowl with ergonomic handle is big enough to handle large batches of heavy mixtures. Its ergonomically designed handle is contoured to fit the hand and makes lifting the bowl more comfortable.Unique Mixing ActionThe beater spins clockwise as the shaft spins counter clockwise; moving the beater to 67 different points around the bowl. This unique mixing action creates a thorough blend of ingredients and eliminates the need to rotate the bowl.Multiple Speeds10 speeds allow the user to select the right speed for the mixing job; from very high to very slow stir. It's easy to select the precise speed needed for a perfect mix.Versatile AccessoriesThe flat beater, dough hook, and the professional wire whip add to the versatility of the mixer. The flat beater is the ideal accessory for mixing normal to heavy batters. From cake mixes to firm cookie dough, the flat beater mixes quickly and thoroughly.The dough hook mixes and kneads yeast dough, saving both time and the effort of hand-kneading. The wire whip incorporates the maximum amount of air in whipped mixtures for fluffier whipped cream and angel food cakes.All attachments are solidly constructed, and attach easily to the stand mixer.Easy Clean UpThe pouring shield fits around the top of the bowl and prevents ingredient splash-out. The chute makes it convenient and easy to add ingredients.The tilt-back mixer head allows for easy access to bowl and beaters. A lock lever holds the mixer head securely in place and the bowl fastens tightly to the base.Optional AttachmentsOptional attachments (sold separately) complete the package to make cooking a pleasure. From citrus juicer to sausage stuffer, KitchenAid stand mixers can handle just about any job in the kitchen.

title: Cuisinart Dual-Sandwich Nonstick Electric Grill
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Small Appliances', 'Specialty Appliances', 'Sandwich Makers & Panini Presses']]
description: Lunch takes on a whole new dimension with this sandwich grill.  Layer cheese, tuna, veggies, mushrooms, or whatever is desired between  slices of bread, set on the deep-pocket grill, and close and lock the  lid. Sandwiches come out perfectly browned and sealed, with a diagonal  indentation making them easy to slice in half. The grill cooks one or  two sandwiches at a time, and also turns out waffles and omelets. The  nonstick finish keeps food from sticking, although a little butter or  oil also helps. A red light comes on when the grill is plugged in and  heating up; a green light announces the grill is ready to use. To  clean, simply wipe off the grill plates when cool. The grill measures 9  by 9 by 3-1/2, and is covered by a three-year warranty against defects.--Ann Bieri

title: Presto 07037 Jumbo Cool Touch Electric Griddle, Black
description: Cooking breakfast for a crowd? This huge 10-1/2-by-20-1/2-inch griddle can handle French toast, hash brown potatoes, and sausages all at once, without requiring you to dirty several pans. The griddle isn’t limited to breakfast either--it grills up plenty of hot dogs, hamburgers, or grilled cheeses for a kid’s birthday party or serves as a warmer for adult buffet-style entertaining. The heat control ranges from 200 to 400 degrees Fahrenheit (in 50-degree increments) and automatically maintains the proper heat setting so foods cook at the same rate as they would on the stove but in a more energy-efficient manner than a range or oven. The griddle’s surface is made of heavy cast-iron aluminum, which heats evenly and is resistant to warping. The nonstick surface ensures that food lifts off the griddle effortlessly and that cleanup is easy. A built-in ledge around the entire griddle surface provides a backstop for flipping pancakes or eggs, and a drip tray beneath the griddle catches grease from bacon or other meats and slides out easily for emptying. The griddle rests within a base that remains cool to the touch on all sides during cooking. With the heat control removed, the griddle is fully immersible in water and dishwasher-safe. Presto covers this electric griddle under a two-year limited warranty.--Cristina Vaamonde

title: Wilton Jimmies 6 Mix Sprinkle Assortment
description: Six fun shapes and colors to energize your goodies. Flip-top bottle lets you shake or pour in just the right spot. Certified Kosher. .42-Ounce each Pink, Orange, Green, Red, Yellow, Blue.

title: Oster 3883 Belgian Wafflemaker, Chrome
description: Start your morning out right with the Oster Belgian Wafflemaker.  With a non-stick Belgian surface and drip rim for easy cleaning, fresh, homemade waffles have never been easier.  Adjustable temperature control helps create light & fluffy waffles everytime.

title: Wilton Clear Party Bags
description: Wilton clear party bags.  Each pack contains 25 bags and 25 ties.

title: Epson Enhanced Matte 24 x 30 Poster Board, 10-Pieces (S041598)
description: For photographers seeking a flat matte surface with the stiffness of a mounted product, EPSON Enhanced Matte Poster board is the ideal choice. This bright white poster board is perfect for short term signage and display. It yields highly saturated images, while maintaining excellent highlight and shadow detail. Designed primarily for use with EPSON Ultra Chrome and Archival Inks, this versatile poster board can also be used with dye-based inks. Hobbyists, professional photographers and digital artists alike will find EPSON Enhanced Matte Paper a remarkable solution for any project.

title: Wilton Candy Mold - Stars
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Candy Making Supplies', 'Candy Making Molds']]
description: Create fun shapes with great detail using these candy molds to make el egant gifts or spice up the holiday.

title: Wilton Primary Candy Color Set
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Candy Making Supplies', 'Candy Making Molds']]
description: Primary Candy Color Set. Concentrated oil-based colors blend easily with candy melts.

title: Wilton Regular Melting Decorating Squeeze Bottle
description: Melt candy with ease, then fill your mold with no mess! so you can melt just the amount of Candy Melts® you need. Melt candy right in the bottle, then squeeze out into molds. Great way to store and reheat leftover candy. Wilton Regular Melting Decorating Squeeze Bottle.

title: Wilton 8 Inch lollipop Sticks, 25 Count
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Candy Making Supplies', 'Candy Making Accessories']]
description: Wilton 8 Inch lollipop Sticks, 25 Count

title: Wilton Harry Potter Cake Pan
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Cake Pans', 'Specialty & Novelty Cake Pans']]
description: The contouring of the pan outlines the form and provides a generous backing to hold the cake. Crafted of quality aluminum, this bakeware heats evenly and keeps interiors moist while allowing surfaces to gently brown. Lightweight yet durable, it also retains its shape and transfers detailing clearly to the food surface. When the party is over, the pan cleans easily so there's less time spent in the kitchen washing up. The pan holds one box of cake mix and comes complete with baking and decorating instructions.

title: Meyer Anolon Professional Double Burner Griddle
description: Set this griddle across two burners and you're all set to cook up a jumbo breakfast or grilled cheese for six! The triple-coated Dupont non-stick surface ensures that delicate pancakes and gooey cheese will not create problems when it's time to flip, serve, or clean up.

title: Wilton Featherweight 16 Inch Decorating Bag
description: Essential for cake decorating, and also handy for filling cannolis with mascarpone, or piping decorative mashed vegetables. Strong and flexible polyester won't get stiff and is reusable.  Use with couplers and tips for cake decorating.  16 inch in length.

title: Wilton 2104-4003 Max Cookie Press
description: Discover the cookie press that takes convenience and comfort to the max. with the cookie max you'll see the difference from the first batch. an easy pump action gives you more control one click of the plunger equals one perfect cookie, every time. the handle is cushioned, for a sure, comfortable grip. the see through barrel and raised bottom let you see the cookie and your remaining dough as you press. no clogging, easy cleaning. perfect for making spritz cookies.

title: Wilton Aluminum Performance Pans Set of 2 9-Inch Round Cake Set
description: The classic aluminum pans. Durable, even-heating and built to hold their shape through years of use. We named them Performance Pans because they perform beautifully. These are great all-purpose pans. You’ll use them for casseroles, entrees, baked desserts and more. Performance pan 2 piece round set, 9 x 2 inches deep.

title: Wilton Cake Release
description: No need to grease and flour your baking pan - Cake Release coats in one step. Simply spread Cake Release lightly on pan bottom and sides with a pastry brush and fill with batter. Cakes release every time, giving you the ideal surface for decorating. Now in convenient dispensing bottle. Certified Kosher. Each 8 oz. container is enough to prepare 17 pans. Especially great for use with any of the Wilton character or shaped pans, too!

title: Wilton Round Cookie Treat Pan, 3 1/2 in. Diameter x 1/4 Inch Deep
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Bakeware', 'Pie, Tart & Quiche Pans', 'Tart Pans']]
description: Cookie Treats on a stick are so easy! Just press cookie dough into pan, insert cookie stick, then bake, cool and decorate. Create your own cookie blossoms for that special someone; also great for rice cereal treats and candy. Recipe included. Each pan makes 6 individual treats, 3 1/2 in. diameter x 1/4 in. deep.

title: Wilton 2811-9135 4-Piece Race Car Molded Candles
description: Fast and easy candle decorating sets from Wilton are a quick way to add fun to your cake! Hand-painted, clean-burning. Approximately 1 3/4 inch high.

title: Wilton Parchment Paper
description: Use Wilton silicone-treated non-stick parchment to line baking pans and cookie sheets - a non-fat alternative that saves cleanup time. Roll out cookie dough between 2 sheets for no sticking and easy transfer to your cookie sheet. You can even reuse it for the next batch. Oven safe to 400°F, parchment is great for conventional ovens, microwaves and the freezer. Professional grade.

title: Sterling 6001566 Adderley Traditional Asian Hardwood Cocktail Table, 20-1/2-Inch, Vintage Mahogany
description: This Sterling Adderley traditional cocktail table features rich inlaid veneers and detailed stretcher. Made of medium density fiberboard and Asian hardwood material. Suitable for many decors. Available in vintage mahogany finish. Measures 23-1/2-inch length by 47-inch width by 20-1/2-inch height.

You can easily remove the SpinScrub brushes and the two water tanks from the C3820 for easy cleaning. The Hoover C3820 offers an automatic shut-off feature that turns off the carpet extractor once the recovery tank is full. With a 11" cleaning path and an impressive 12 amp motor, the C3820 carpet shampooer from Hoover provides more suction for quicker dirt extraction. This SteamVac carpet cleaner comes with 3 brush roll settings: off, low, and high. These different speeds allow you to clean many different types of carpets.

title: Fiesta 18-1/2-Ounce Sauceboat, Plum
categories: [['Home & Kitchen', 'Kitchen & Dining', 'Dining & Entertaining', 'Serveware', 'Gravy Boats & Stands', 'Gravy Boats']]
description: First manufactured in 1936 during Art Deco's later, less ornate phase, Fiestaware went out of production in the 1970s but returned in the 1980s and now enjoys unprecedented popularity. Older pieces fetch hundreds or even thousands of dollars at auction. The new line offers the original designs in contemporary colors at affordable prices. To complete a set of juniper Fiestaware or complement your collection of multicolored Fiestaware, this curvaceous sauceboat is essential. Made of vitrified china with a gleaming, lead-free glaze, the sauceboat holds 12 to 14 ounces, measures 8 inches from spout to handle, and is both dishwasher- and microwave-safe.--Fred Brack

title: Farberware Cookware Glass Replacement Lid, 10-Inch
description: Keep this lid on hand to cover your Farberware pots and pans. Made from tempered glass, this lid features a black phenoilc handle that is oven safe up to 350 degrees Fahrenheit. This lid makes a great replacement and fits most Farberware 12 inch cookware. The transparent design lets you see the cooking progress without losing moisture and nutrients, and it is dishwasher safe for easy clean up.10" diameter

title: Farberware Nonstick Aluminum Egg Poacher with Glass Lid
description: Convenient, tidy, and nonstick to boot, this 8-inch egg  poaching pan from Farberware poaches eggs singly or up to four at a  time. Constructed for convenience and excellent conductivity, the  Farberware nonstick aluminum line combines an aluminum core with  nonstick coating inside and out. Together, the two materials deliver  quick heat distribution and consistent, easy food release. When you  choose to fry instead of poach, the nonstick surface lets you cook with  less oil for lighter, more healthful meals.The poacher includes a removable aluminum poaching ring with a  heat-resistant handle, four steam holes, and four cup notches. Each of  the four egg cups has its own heat-resistant handle and lifts out  individually. The pan's riveted phenolic handle features a  heat-resistant rubberized grip and hanging hole. The tempered glass lid  seals in heat and lets you track cooking progress without losing steam.  Its phenolic knob is also heat-resistant. All parts of this set can go  in the dishwasher and are oven-safe to 350 degrees F.--Emily  Bedard

title: Farberware Classic Stainless Steel 15-Piece Cookware Set
description: "Prepare favorite meals from start to finish with this Farberware Classic Series 15-Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set. Farberware has been trusted by families for over 100 years, and this cookware set continues that tradition for a new generation. From a stockpot to saucepans for preparing soups, sauces and stews, to a trio of convenient nylon tools to start the cooking right away, this convenient collection has meal making covered. The cookware’s full cap bases feature stainless steel layered over thick aluminum cores to provide rapid, even heating. The heavy-duty construction is finished with mirror-polished exteriors for a classic touch. Two aluminum nonstick skillets are included as well. Each cookware piece features comfortable handles to offer iconic styling and a confident grasp. And stainless steel, snug-fitting lids boast attractive bell shapes, eye-catching knobs and rolled rims for added durability. Oven safe to 350°F, the cookware is dishwasher safe. Add even more versatility to this cookware set with the griddles, steamers, and other specialty items from the Farberware® Classic Series collection. Simmer, sauté, and stir delicious foods to create complete meals using the essential pieces in the Farberware Classic Series 15-Piece Stainless Steel Cookware Set."

title: Farberware Classic Stainless Steel 5/8-Quart Butter Warmer
description: Melt butter, warm chocolate, or reheat single servings with  this convenient little butter warmer from Farberware. Durable, easy to  clean, and corrosion-resistant, Farberware's Classic pieces are crafted  from professional quality 18/10 stainless steel with a layered Full Cap  base. The three-ply construction—-a highly conductive aluminum core  sandwiched in stainless steel—-creates even heat distribution across  the bottom and protects glass stovetops.The warmer has a classic belled shape with a narrow pouring spout and a  .625-quart capacity. Built with a ring for hanging storage, the riveted  phenolic handle is heat-resistant on the stovetop and oven-safe to 350  degrees F. The pot's tidy design makes it comfortable to handle during  use, and Farberware's shining mirror finish is safe for the dishwasher.--Emily Bedard

title: Fiskars 1845201001 Original Stainless Steel Scissors,  Left/Right Hand
description: These scissors feature precision-ground, corrosion-resistant, adjustable stainless steel blades. Equipped with comfortable, orange handles molded to blades. Global Product Type: Scissors; Scissor Type: Scissors; Material(s): Stainless Steel; Handle Type: Straight.

title: Paper Towel Holder
description: Durable, paper towel holder is designed to hold standard rolls of paper towels. Easily mount this plastic towel holder with screws or adhesive. Towel holder includes adhesive and hardware.

title: Presto 22-Quart Aluminum Pressure Cooker/Canner
description: Pressure canning, the only method recommended safe by the USDA for canning low-acid foods, allows you to preserve meats, vegetables, and fruits. Presto pressure canners feature an easy-to-read dial gauge for accurate pressure control and extra strong, warp-resistant aluminum construction. The air vent/cover lock allows pressure to build only when the cover is closed properly and prevents the cover from opening until pressure is safely reduced. Includes cooking/canning rack and complete instruction/recipe book. 22-quart liquid capacity (20.9 liters).

title: Presto 01282 8-Quart Aluminum Pressure Cooker
description: Pressure cookers have experienced renewed popularity over the last several years because cooks have rediscovered what some cooks (particularly grandmas) have known for a long time--they're really fast. And it's easy to cook healthfully with pressure cookers, since the food retains so much more of its nutrients and flavor. Presto's 8-quart pressure cooker is a multi-purpose pot that can stand in as a conventional soup pot as well as perform the kitchen magic that pressure cookers are famous for. Chicken Cacciatore cooks in 8 minutes! And it's big enough for home canning, too. (The USDA recommends pressure canning as the only safe method for low-acid foods such as vegetables, meats, and poultry.) This durable, polished-aluminum pressure cooker is an economical addition to any well-rounded set of kitchen tools.The heavy-duty lid locks down during cooking; an inner sealing ring keeps the steam in. In addition to a pop-up pressure indicator and a simple steam release mechanism, there is an overpressure plug that will let off steam if it builds up excessively. This pressure cooker is useful for weeknight dinners or for any meal that needs to come together quickly. An accompanying booklet contains more than 65 recipes, ranging from basic soup stocks to stews and pot roast--even desserts like Oatmeal-Apple Crisp! Tenderize lean cuts of beef or pork; or cook chicken, fish, or vegetables faster than you can in a microwave, and without losing moisture.Nonabrasive cleansers are best for cleaning this polished aluminum pressure cooker, though occasional use of a fine metal polish will help the exterior keep its shine. The Presto 8-quart aluminum pressure cooker is fully immersible; in addition, the sealing ring should be removed after each use to allow cleaning of the inside rim of the lid. The vent pipe is simple to keep clean with a small brush or pipe cleaner, and both the air vent/cover lock and the overpressure plug are removable. The pressure cooker measures 11-1/2 inches in diameter (17 inches including handles) and 9 inches tall (including lid). Presto guarantees this pressure cooker with an extended 12-year warranty. A detailed instruction and recipe booklet is included; special safety issues that pertain to pressure cookers are clearly explained.--Garland Withers
